Indeed, these beverages possessed remarkable strength.

"Indubitably, Bene's has become an integral component of my culinary experience, as I have grown accustomed to frequenting the establishment for a plethora of delectable victuals and beverages. However, upon learning that my maternal figure had procured a novel abode in close proximity to the city, thereby necessitating my relocation thereto, I felt a pang of dismay, as I had presumed that my access to Bene's would be curtailed due to its relative distance from my new domicile. Nevertheless, my consternation was assuaged by Maria's revelation that they proffer delivery services, thereby obviating the need for me to physically visit the restaurant. Indeed, this development has afforded me the opportunity to relish their gastronomic offerings without any further ado."

We managed to secure last-minute bookings for a Friday evening at 8:30 p.m., which afforded us the opportunity to indulge in an exquisite culinary experience at a quaint, tastefully embellished eatery illuminated to a degree surpassing the customary level of brightness associated with upscale dining establishments during the evening hours.

Upon being seated, we opted for two glasses of Cabernet, a superior quality wine that proved to be an excellent beginning to our delectable journey. Subsequently, we relished a fresh mozzarella dish accompanied by heirloom tomatoes, which was further enhanced by a touch of coarse salt and balsamic, thus rendering it utterly scrumptious. Additionally, we sampled a chopped salad adorned with a modicum of cheese, salami, and a remarkably flavorful vinaigrette; although I am not typically a devotee of salads, this particular creation tasted unquestionably fresh and warranted high praise. Furthermore, we ordered a salad dressed with balsamic, which, despite not being as exceptional as its chopped counterpart, remained palatable and satisfying.

Moreover, we relished a half-portion of fresh pasta, skillfully prepared with Parmesan, zucchini, and tomatoes, thereby constituting the ideal quantity for a lighter repast. Notwithstanding my initial concerns regarding the potential heaviness of pasta as a late supper option, the smaller serving size proved to be a judicious decision.

Our culinary excursion continued with an order of skirt steak, which regrettably did not meet the same lofty standards as the preceding dishes, primarily due to the fact that the balsamic component, which was the third instance of this flavor profile throughout the meal, seemed somewhat superfluous and detracted from the overall quality of the dish. Nevertheless, the meat was cooked flawlessly, and its generous portion made up for any deficiencies. Lastly, we indulged in a delightful tiramisu and paired it with expertly brewed French press coffee and cappuccino, both of which demonstrated the establishment's commitment to excellence in beverage preparation.

In conclusion, our dining experience at this meticulously appointed restaurant was truly outstanding, and the judicious selection of dishes allowed us to sample a diverse array of flavors from the menu. The fact that the menu undergoes periodic changes in accordance with the seasons and weeks ensures that future visits will afford us the opportunity to partake in novel gastronomic adventures, thereby making our return visits eagerly anticipated.

"This esteemed eatery, specializing in premium cuts of beef, provided an exceptional dining experience, characterized by attentive and proficient service. The delectable Porterhouse for two, priced at a moderate $100, showcased a harmonious union of succulent New York strip steak and tender filet mignon, both boasting optimal levels of tenderness and a judicious seasoning of salt. Generous portions easily satisfied two discerning diners, complemented by a duo of savory mushrooms and a fresh, flavorful appetizer salad. A total expenditure of approximately $160, factoring in a gratuity, did not deter from the enthusiasm to revisit this culinary establishment."
Sushi/ Sashimi/ Appetizer or Hot dishes, anything is good! They come with a reasonable price too.\nWill come back again! :)

Haven't had the wings yet, I will post review for that shortly, however I just place my carry out order and I must say the gentleman on the phone was great! Very polite and perfect customer service! Excited to finally try the wings!

"Indubitably, this establishment offers an authentic and delectable pizza experience, one that has garnered my unwavering approbation due to its adherence to the stringent standards I have established subsequent to my numerous visits to Manhattan, where I have had the privilege of partaking in the city's renowned pizza offerings. Mama Gina's proficient staff, marked by their cordiality and expediency, and Sammy, the affable and courteous bartender, have orchestrated an atmosphere that is both welcoming and conducive to an enjoyable dining experience. Moreover, the pizza itself boasts an unparalleled flavor profile, one that warrants an unequivocal five-star rating and ensures our future patronage."

"My enthusiasm was palpable when I learned that Torched Goodness would be joining the Ahwatukee Farmers Market, as their presence signified an opportunity to indulge in their delectable offerings without having to venture to the Downtown market, where I've been yearning to sample a Shortleash Hotdog for quite some time, but alas, my schedule has precluded me from doing so thus far. Upon sampling their assorted flavors, I was thoroughly impressed by their culinary prowess, particularly their cappuccino flavor, which elicited an unbridled euphoria, as its rich, velvety texture and judicious balance of sweetness perfectly replicated the sublime taste of Haagen Dazs coffee ice cream, while also boasting an unparalleled creaminess that left me utterly satiated. Moreover, I must commend Chef Eric for his ingenuity in devising a convenient, portable creme brulee format, which allowed me to relish every spoonful without worrying about diminishing the enjoyment of my gustatory experience. Therefore, I wholeheartedly recommend that anyone who encounters the Torched Goodness truck treat themselves to a portion of their divine creme brulee; it will undoubtedly be a choice that will leave one's taste buds in raptures."

I have been wanting to try this place since I heard about it on the radio...we had the lunch special, create your own pizza for $6.95...the staff was awesome and were excited to tell us the easiest way to order.  Our first pizza came out before were done with the third pizza...absolutely amazing!  We loved it!!! We mixed the pesto and white sauce...mmmmmm.  We will be back!

VERY authentic Japanese in an elegant, clean, and inviting atmosphere. The sushi is always fresh and their exotic specials (ask chef as they're hidden from the general crowd) are excellent. Don't expect Americanized super rolls here. This is the real deal folks.

"It's a hamburger-oriented sports bar, but it's a superior one. I surmise that the personnel was experiencing a trifling sense of being overpowered on New Year's Day and in anticipation of the impending athletic contest, but they promptly regrouped and the culinary offerings more than compensated for any minor shortcomings. We opted for the animal fries and burgers. I thoroughly relished my burger. They possess some inventive combinations. I am grateful that they do not have an establishment of this nature in close proximity to my domicile, but if anyone happens to be in the vicinity, I would unhesitatingly recommend a visit!"

It is truly remarkable that I had not composed a review for Lon's prior to this moment, given the frequency with which we visit this esteemed establishment, which is to say that we are veritable regulars, indulging in their delectable cuisine at least once a month for an impressive number of years. The Patio, specifically during the spring and fall seasons, is a highly sought-after reservation, one that demands a call be made several days in advance in order to secure a table.  

My personal preference is to partake in the culinary delights offered by Lon's on Sunday evenings, when they typically offer a price fixe menu that features an array of mouthwatering meats, including, but not limited to, entire pigs slowly roasting on a spit, the aroma of which wafts through the air, tantalizing the senses and heightening anticipation. Saturday evenings, on the other hand, offer a live band, providing the perfect ambiance for an enjoyable dinner. 

In the event that the Patio area is occupied and we find ourselves without a reservation, we take great pleasure in dining at the bar, where the friendly bartenders expertly craft an array of refreshing cocktails certain to satiate our thirst and complement the exquisite fare. 

I wholeheartedly recommend Lon's to visitors from out of town, as it embodies the essence of the Southwest in a stylish and cultured atmosphere that is sure to leave a lasting impression. As for the food itself? My absolute favorites from the menu include, but are not limited to, the sublimely flavorful Jidori Chicken (a dish so extraordinary that even those who do not customarily order chicken will find themselves eager to sample it); the rich, creamy truffle macaroni and cheese; and any of the delectable fish options that grace the menu. And, of course, no meal would be complete without sampling the heavenly Cowboy candy bar, a sweet treat that is sure to satisfy even the most discerning palate.

"An amicable and hospitable team, proffering delectable edibles, and an unparalleled beverage experience, courtesy of a half-dollar cup of coffee, served either steaming hot or refreshingly iced, depending on one's preference. A welcoming ambiance permeates the establishment, attracting a loyal clientele who frequent the premises with alacrity, whether it be prior to embarking upon their daily work routine or during leisurely weekend hours. Furthermore, the baked goods available are truly exceptional, boasting distinctive flavors that set them apart from the norm, particularly in regards to scones, muffins, and cookies."

"Jaleo provided an exceptional dining experience, characterized by superlative service and culinary offerings of unparalleled quality. Our server expertly curated our meal, selecting dishes that showcased the restaurant's proficiency in both creativity and flavor profile. The meal commenced with a delightful endive salad, adorned with succulent mandarin almonds and an additional component that escapes my recollection. Subsequently, we indulged in croquettes served within an unconventional vessel, specifically a shoe; although the presentation may have been perceived as contrived cuteness by the chef, it remained a captivating aspect of the dining experience. Furthermore, we sampled an array of delectable dishes, including shrimp, steak, and bruschetta, each one rivaling its predecessor in terms of gastronomical excellence. However, the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance was undoubtedly the carne asada steak, which boasted a complexity of flavors that elevated it to a status of gustatory supremacy. Lastly, the French toast dessert concluded the meal on a resoundingly sweet note, leaving an indelible impression upon our collective palate. Based on my experience, I would enthusiastically recommend Jaleo to even the most discerning gourmands among my acquaintances, as the restaurant's commitment to providing exceptional service and cuisine is undeniably comparable to the finest establishments in New York City."

"Drs. Libby and Beanstalk are utterly remarkable! Dr. Libby exudes an unparalleled level of kindness and compassion. Their proficiency in interacting with children is truly impressive. My admiration for them was only solidified when my son had a regrettable accident, falling and fracturing one of his front teeth into four separate pieces. Despite Dr. Libby's office being closed at the time, she readily accommodated us and personally attended to my son's emergency, expertly extracting the fragments while we restrained him (owing to his tender age of 18 months and the necessity for a local anesthetic). What followed was a display of their exceptional bedside manner; as I endeavored to soothe my distressed child by singing 'Itsy Bitsy Spider,' Drs. Libby and her assistant harmoniously joined in, creating a moment of levity amidst the traumatic situation. Such a harrowing experience would have been unbearable without the capable hands of Dr. Libby and her team. My esteem for her was already well-established, stemming from her exceptional care of my daughter, and this incident merely reinforced my conviction that their practice is unequivocally the finest. In fact, I would enthusiastically award them a rating of 100 stars, as they genuinely merit such an accolade."

My husband is from Raglan, NZ and he said Lola's had the best lattes he has ever had! My mocha was delicious too :) chocolate didn't over power the coffee.\n\nIf you get there early, they usually have banana bread or zucchini bread that tastes yummy.

I possess an unwavering predilection for fastidiousness when it comes to selecting an individual capable of rendering satisfactory services regarding the coiffure of my cranial appendage. Consequently, prior to visiting this establishment, I conducted a thorough examination of the opinions expressed by previous patrons on the popular review platform known as Yelp. Following my perusal of these testimonials, I opted to grant this salon the opportunity to demonstrate its proficiency in the art of tonsorialism. Permit me to express my utmost satisfaction with the exceptional quality of service I received during my visit. Nicholas, the skilled tonsor who attended to my needs, executed his duties with meticulous precision, employing a square-shaped implement to sculpt the posterior aspect of my hair and utilizing a straight razor to delineate the contours of my neck with remarkable dexterity. In conclusion, I must aver that this salon offers extraordinary services, and I would enthusiastically recommend it to anyone seeking an exemplary haircutting experience.

I had the most extraordinary encounter at this salon! They offered a special promotion on Groupon for their Amnesia Retreat hot stone massage at the unbelievably discounted price of $39, which typically retails for $90. Furthermore, all the revenue generated from this offer was donated to a cancer charity, which I found incredibly commendable of the salon. From the moment I entered the establishment, I was treated with exceptional care and professionalism by the receptionist, who presented me with a refreshing glass of water. My appointment was handled promptly and efficiently, and my massage therapist, Tweety (real name Thuy), was simply remarkable. Her warmth, friendliness, and down-to-earth demeanor immediately put me at ease, dispelling any apprehensions I may have harbored about receiving a massage from a stranger. This was my first experience with a hot stone massage, and I must say, it was nothing short of enchanting. I relished every moment of it and was thoroughly disinclined to see it conclude. While the distance between my residence and the salon poses a minor drawback, the exceptional quality of service I received there makes me more than willing to make the journey again in the future. Kudos to Amnesia Salon!

"Savor the delectable flavors of our culinary creations! Our proficient and hospitable servers will ensure a seamless dining experience, while our meticulously curated menu boasts an array of innovative dishes sure to tantalize your taste buds. Of particular note is our sushi tostada, a hidden gem not listed on the menu yet certain to impress even the most discerning palate. Personal preferences notwithstanding, our Kimmy roll and almost hot roll are equally deserving of acclaim, with each bite showcasing the artistry of our skilled chefs."

I absolutely love this gym. The staff is always friendly! It's always really clean in here! The trainers are very knowledgable and have a genuine concern for all of their clients. 

I am a fan of the "No towel, no workout". I wish there was a full basketball gym but still very accommodating. 

I love the cardio theater is amazing! Very great experience for those who need a little distraction while their running.

Check this place out!

"A remarkably hospitable team, complemented by an immaculate setting, proffered an unpretentious ambiance that exuded warmth and welcome. The expansive layout of the establishment further contributed to its appeal, rendering it an idyllic destination for a casual visit while in the vicinity of Scottsdale. The menu offered an array of delectable options reminiscent of traditional Chinese cuisine, including an egg roll that elicited nostalgic memories of its New York City counterpart, earning rave reviews from this patron. The Wor Won Ton Soup, enriched with a medley of savory ingredients such as chicken breast, shrimp, beef, cabbage, mushrooms, and broccoli, proved to be the culinary highlight of the meal, rivaled only by the sesame chicken in terms of popularity among the diners. Although the Mongolian beef was not sampled by this reviewer, its reputation preceded it, as those who partook of it expressed unanimous approval. The Happy Family dish, boasting an impressive assembly of fresh components, lived up to its name by eliciting contentment and satisfaction from all members of the dining party. Lastly, the Combination Fried Rice, while not quite comparable to the exemplary standards upheld by establishments in the eastern region, still managed to impress with its palatable flavors and satisfying texture."

"Utterly exceptional! Our nuptials at this establishment were presided over by an individual impersonating the legendary Elvis Presley, and we experienced a truly remarkable and memorable time. Thirty-eight individuals from Connecticut traveled to Las Vegas for the occasion, and each one of them unanimously agreed that it was the most superb wedding they had ever had the pleasure of attending. Every member of the staff demonstrated a warm and welcoming demeanor, and we extend our sincerest gratitude to Olivia for her tireless efforts and meticulous attention to detail. Not a single aspect of our wedding celebration could be described as in poor taste or excessively sentimental; on the contrary, it was a joyous and exquisite experience."

This place is a hidden gem in Chandler.  I was refered by a coworker and brought 3 friends my first time it was amazing $30 for an hour.  we all have gone back on a regular basis a must to go and relax...

"Prior to delving into the primary subject matter, allow me to momentarily digress and express my unbridled enthusiasm regarding the availability of Pacquiao t-shirts at this establishment. It is truly a remarkable find, one that quenches my unwavering thirst for all things Filipino. Now, permit me to redirect your attention to the main point of discussion, which revolves around Manila Sunrise's reputation as my premier source for Filipino products. Their inventory boasts an array of items that cater to my discerning taste, including - but not limited to - fishball sauce, a condiment that has proven elusive in my quest for authentic Filipino flavors in the East Valley. Furthermore, their prices are reasonable and, in some instances, downright economical. A cursory comparison with LeeLee's reveals that select items are available at Manila Sunrise for a lower cost, much to my delight. Moving on, their assortment of goods encompasses a diverse selection of delectable treats such as fried chicken skins, Chicharon, Chippy, Clover Chips, Sarsi in glass bottles, Tocino, Longanisa, and other Filipino delicacies. Additionally, they offer a wide range of Filipino-themed attire that caters to my penchant for cultural expression. Lastly, I must commend the staff at Manila Sunrise for their warm and welcoming demeanor, as they consistently demonstrate their gratitude for my patronage."

After enduring an interminable wait of approximately sixty minutes to settle the bill and queue up for the Wicked Spoon buffet, I hastened my steps towards Va Bene Caffe, donning heels, no less, in order to assuage the hunger pangs that were becoming increasingly insistent.

Everything in Las Vegas tends to be rather costly, but the culinary offerings at this establishment were, in my opinion, well worth the expenditure. In fact, I found the blueberry muffin to be so delectable that I opted to sample it on two separate occasions. Unlike many others of its kind, this particular muffin boasted a delightfully crunchy exterior, complemented by a fluffy, tender interior. Quite simply, it was divine!

The hot cocoa served at Va Bene Caffe is truly exceptional, possessing a richness and depth of flavor that renders it highly addictive. So much so, that my companion and I playfully referred to it as "CoCocaine," such was our unbridled enthusiasm for its sublime taste.

Furthermore, I must commend the server for their warmth and helpfulness, as they provided me with insightful recommendations and exhibited a genuine interest in ensuring my dining experience was nothing short of satisfactory. Additionally, the modern ambiance of the eatery itself was quite appealing, imbuing the atmosphere with an air of contemporary sophistication. While one may not expect a lavish feast, per se, Va Bene Caffe undoubtedly delivers a superlative snacking experience that is sure to satiate even the most discerning palates.

"This unquestionably represents the most exceptional hotel brunch buffet we have had the pleasure of experiencing, according to both myself and my spouse. The vast array of options available is truly astounding. It is advisable to avoid this establishment if maintaining a lean physique is a priority, particularly for those planning to engage in aquatic activities. For guests residing at the Cosmopolitan, we highly recommend opting for the breakfast inclusion, as missing out on this delectable spread would be nothing short of lamentable. The brunch hours, spanning from 8am to 2pm, conveniently accommodate the schedules of all Las Vegas visitors."

I unequivocally adore Vegas Hot, as it has ascended to become my preferred destination for practicing hot yoga. Throughout my exploration of diverse hot yoga studios, Vegas Hot has demonstrated itself to be the optimal choice, principally due to the extensive array of class options available. I thoroughly relish the prospect of alternating between classes of disparate durations and intensities, which Vegas Hot accommodates with proficiency. Moreover, their scheduling system is meticulously designed to align with my hectic timetable, permitting me to participate in either brief yet intensive sessions or more prolonged classes, according to my ever-changing commitments. Furthermore, I must commend Vegas Hot for their judicious pricing strategy, as they regularly present an assortment of frugal packages and promotions, rendering their services accessible to a broader spectrum of enthusiasts. Notably, the flooring utilized in Vegas Hot's studios is an additional aspect that contributes to my fondness for them; its superior quality and comfort enhance my overall experience. In conclusion, I would unhesitatingly endorse Vegas Hot to anyone seeking a top-tier hot yoga facility, as they deliver an exceptional value through their complimentary introductory week.

"Our initial foray to this esteemed eatery transpired during the previous evening, in the company of my parental units (who were visiting from afar). Upon arriving at Houston's, we were met with a considerable delay of sixty minutes; thus, we opted to venture forth and explore alternative dining options in the immediate vicinity. Our culinary quest ultimately led us to the doors of Veneto Trattoria, whereupon we were promptly accommodated and indulged in an exquisite gastronomical experience. As a resident of this vicinity, I must confess that this restaurant ranks among the most exceptional Italian establishments I have had the pleasure of patronizing. The cost of their offerings is eminently reasonable, the fare itself is delectable, and the hospitality we received was truly flawless. My own culinary selection consisted of a succulent pork chop, whereas my fellow diners sampled an array of seafood, pasta, and salads; unanimously, their satisfaction with the meal was evident. Consequently, I foresee frequent returns to this gastronomic haven in the future."

"I have had the pleasure of partaking in the culinary delights offered by this esteemed bistro on multiple occasions, and I must say that the overall experience has been nothing short of exceptional. The ambiance of the establishment exudes a certain je ne sais quoi, an air of sophistication that permeates every aspect of the dining experience. The service, too, has been consistently impressive, with the servers exhibiting a level of professionalism and courtesy that is sadly uncommon in today's dining scene. Of particular note is a certain server named Tim, whose effervescent personality and unwavering dedication to ensuring the satisfaction of his patrons made for an especially memorable visit. On our most recent excursion to this gastronomic haven, we opted to sample the stuffed mushroom appetizer, which proved to be a veritable delight; the flavors were rich and well-balanced, with just the right amount of seasoning. For my entree, I selected a dinner salad with grilled chicken, paired with the sweet serrano dressing, which I found to be utterly delectable. My companion's margherita pizza, too, was devoured with relish, and we both agreed that it was among the finest examples of Neapolitan-style pizza we had ever had the pleasure of consuming. Furthermore, the staff demonstrated a commendable lack of urgency in their efforts to turn the table, allowing us to linger and savor our meal at a leisurely pace. In conclusion, this bistro remains one of my preferred destinations for a satisfying repast with friends."

"Enamored with this commercial establishment, I find myself frequenting its premises with great regularity. However, I must admit that the culinary offerings within the confines of its food court leave much to be desired, bordering on the unpalatable. Yet, it would be unfair to expect gourmet fare in a setting primarily designed for mass consumption. As a word of advice to those seeking to reduce their financial expenditure, I suggest utilizing the monorail transportation system to arrive at the Las Vegas Hotel (LVH), subsequently queuing for a taxi cab at said location, which should result in a relatively reasonable fare of approximately $15, inclusive of gratuity. On one particular occasion, I witnessed an individual becoming irate due to the delayed opening hours of a specific retail outlet, Puma; it was quite an amusing spectacle, really, juxtaposing the mundane act of shopping with the theatrical display of indignation."

"This diminutive eatery boasts an unassuming faÃ§ade, with a minuscule entrance that leads to a cozy interior comprising two compact tables capable of accommodating a mere two patrons each, in addition to a modest counter. The culinary preparation area is positioned prominently in plain sight, thereby offering customers an engaging visual experience of the food's meticulous preparation. The fare served at this establishment is of exceptional quality, possessing an abundance of freshness and a profusion of flavors that are judiciously balanced. The piquant salsa, in particular, is a masterclass in flavor profiling, its fiery essence tantalizing the taste buds and leaving an indelible impression on one's palate. The liberal incorporation of fresh avocado, onion, and cilantro serves to further elevate the gastronomic experience, rendering each bite a symphony of flavors that harmoniously meld together in a culinary crescendo."

"I have an unwavering affection for this establishment, and I must admit, the allure of beverages served in unique containers has played a significant role in fostering my ardor. Specifically, I have been eager to sample their 1L mason jar cocktails for an extended period. By happenstance, I visited this venue at approximately 5 pm on a Thursday, which proved to be an optimal time, as the atmosphere became increasingly vibrant an hour later, with a sizable contingent of patrons. It is worth noting that the bar's diminutive size, coupled with its prime location directly in front of a cegep, contributes to its perpetual popularity among students. It is worth mentioning that the establishment takes the verification of age quite seriously, as my companion and I, both in our mid-twenties, were promptly requested to present our identification upon entry.

Their extensive mason jar drinks, available for $17, are, in my opinion, reasonably priced, and one can enjoy a discount of $3 during the blissful hours of happy hour. Among the various options, the Chupa Chupa, a refreshing concoction featuring mango, stood out as my favorite. I observed that the menu featured a helpful rating system, ranging from 1 to 5, to assist patrons in gauging the potency of each beverage. Additionally, I noticed that the menu was dated October to December 2013, leading me to infer that the selection is updated intermittently.

Furthermore, the establishment offers a complimentary snack, in the form of Goldfish crackers, for patrons to enjoy while imbibing their beverages. While there are a few minor drawbacks, such as the lack of complimentary Wi-Fi and debit card acceptance, the presence of an ATM on the premises partially mitigates these issues. In conclusion, this venue boasts an impressive array of attributes that make it an exceptional destination for those seeking a delightful beverage experience."

"This particular venue serves as the quintessential epicentre of Montreal's renowned smoked meat experience, thereby rendering it an indispensable component of any Montreal itinerary. The savoury delight in question has been extensively lauded for its distinctive flavour profile, while the rib steak option is equally deserving of acclaim, boasting a tenderness and richness that will undoubtedly satiate even the most discerning palate. For those with hearty appetites, the Schwartz's combo platter is emphatically endorsed, as it promises to satisfy hunger to the point of surfeit, necessitating the remainder of the meal to be transported back to one's lodgings. An unwavering recommendation for this establishment is warranted, despite its reputation as a tourist hotspot, given that its enduring popularity among visitors and locals alike substantiates its merits."

"It is not customary for me to compose reviews, but I am compelled to express my profound satisfaction with this particular salon, as it has become my preferred establishment for hair care services in Arizona. The entire staff exudes a warm and welcoming demeanor, and their exceptional level of professionalism is truly commendable. I have had the pleasure of receiving my haircut and color treatment from Milana on multiple occasions, and each experience has been an absolute delight. Her endearing personality and unwavering dedication to her craft make her one of the few individuals in whom I repose complete trust with regards to the maintenance of my tresses. Moreover, she demonstrates a fastidious attention to detail during the deep conditioning process, ensuring that my hair is left feeling revitalized and looking utterly radiant. My affection for this salon knows no bounds, and I eagerly anticipate my forthcoming appointment."
Really like this place- good food, nice employees, and fast delivery! We have dined in several times and it's nothing fancy, but our waitress was super nice and we have had only good experiences here

"An exceptional dining experience awaits patrons at this unique grocery store/restaurant combination, conveniently positioned along the light rail line in Tempe, east of the Arizona State University campus. For lunch or dinner, indulge in delectable Mediterranean cuisine, featuring pita sandwiches that generously suffice as a single serving. If your appetite demands more, opt for a dinner plate, complete with an entrÃ©e, Greek salad, and rice. Emphasizing freshness, all menu items are skillfully prepared in-house. While the hummus boasts the expected high quality, we recommend exploring the distinctive flavors of the eggplant baba ghanoush for a truly memorable culinary excursion."

I arranged for a sixty-minute therapeutic massage session with Claudio, a licensed massage practitioner who holds a Bachelor's degree in Sports and Exercise Science. As a barber, I tend to spend extended periods of time standing and utilizing my upper body strength, which often results in muscular tension and fatigue. Therefore, I opted to treat myself to a massage to alleviate the stress and discomfort in my shoulder and leg muscles. Claudio's extensive knowledge of human anatomy and physiology enabled him to expertly manipulate and release the tension in previously uncharted muscle groups, inducing a profound sense of relaxation and rejuvenation that I had not experienced prior to this encounter. The intensity of the massage was offset by the tranquil ambiance of the spa, creating a truly unique and revitalizing experience that I highly recommend to anyone seeking a genuine respite from the stresses of daily life.

"I have an immense fondness for this all-you-can-eat establishment, as it offers an extensive variety of culinary options and they are of exceptional quality. Furthermore, I derive even greater pleasure from the fact that due to my residential status, I am eligible for a fifty percent discount on the standard price, which renders it even more appealing. Needless to say, I hold this eatery in extremely high regard."

"Oh my, what an immense respite! I was utterly apprehensive about the prospect of dining at a lackluster Vegas buffet, but fortunately, my culinary endeavors led me to the esteemed Fremont, whereupon I chanced upon the Second St Grill. Upon entering the edifice, I was instantaneously cognizant of the fact that this establishment was of superior quality. The hospitality and gastronomy herein were truly exceptional, with the service staff exhibiting consummate professionalism and the cuisine rivalling that of the renowned Billagio. The ambiance was also remarkably tidy and well-maintained, in stark contrast to the typical downtown establishments and even the Fremont Casino itself. The menu presented an impressive array of options, encompassing prime cuts of beef, fresh seafood, delectable pasta dishes, and crisp salads. Furthermore, the cost of our repast for two, sans beverages, was a mere $55. Although I am not typically enamored with the downtown area, I would unhesitatingly venture back to partake in the culinary delights offered by this esteemed eatery. Indeed, a most welcome reprieve from the boisterous street spectacle."

When an unfortunate vehicular collision transpires, necessitating restorative measures, it is not uncommon for a multitude of individuals to be involved in the repair process, often resulting in bewilderment and a breakdown in communication. However, such chaos is conspicuously absent at INVISION, where a harmonious and streamlined approach prevails from inception to culmination. The absence of miscommunication, which has regrettably been a recurring issue in my past experiences, is a refreshing departure from the norm. Kudos to this exceptional team for their dedication to restoring my damaged vehicle with such impressive proficiency and reliability.

Last month, my spouse arranged a visit to this restaurant as a surprise for my birthday celebration, and it turned out to be an exceptional and unforgettable experience, as it was my first time trying Moroccan cuisine, and the six-course meal was a novel experience for me as well; the atmosphere was captivating, with a romantic ambiance, delectable dishes, and live entertainment provided by a friendly belly dancer, making it an ideal venue for momentous occasions, although the prices are steep, the quality of the experience renders it worthwhile.
Love this place I always buy my boys clothes shoes and socks from here and all the little extra stuff. The staff is so nice and helpful they rock

"I underwent my maiden visit to Sumits today, precipitated by my acquisition of a Groupon for the studio. My excursion yielded an exceptional experience, characterized by a commodious, spotless, and welcoming atmosphere. The class diverged from my customary routine, but the educator's amiability and assistance facilitated my adaptation. I appreciated the logical sequence and fluidity of the lesson, rendering me eager to partake in future sessions."

"Triumphant! Heavy D (Imperial Devils Ale) and the Sonoran Dog, when consumed in unison, transcend the mundane and ascend to celestial heights, constituting an unparalleled culinary odyssey. Local artisanal brew, delectable fare, and an enchanting ambiance coalesce to create an unforgettable sojourn. Oh, and did I mention that this veritable gastronomic nirvana is nestled within a captivating neighborhood, further augmenting the allure of this gustatory adventure? Incontrovertibly, a visit to this esteemed establishment is imperative."

"I am under the conviction that this is, indeed, the precise location where one can procure an exceptional dining experience at the Port of Subs, specifically when placing an order for a delectable submarine sandwich at the establishment situated on the intersection of Stephanie and Sunset Boulevards, adjacent to a financial institution operated by Wells Fargo; irrespective of the method of preparation, my spouse and I had the pleasure of partaking in a culinary excursion that far surpassed our expectations, as we were accorded an unanticipated level of hospitality, including a cordial greeting and expressions of gratitude, in addition to the exemplary quality of the ingredients utilized in the preparation of our repast, which were freshly sliced and expertly assembled, resulting in a conspicuous absence of any unpleasant, watery residue on my sandwich, thereby rendering it vastly superior to its counterpart at Subway; thus, we shall unquestionably continue to patronize this eatery and extend our sincerest appreciation to the staff for their exceptional service."
i got a really good trim of the beard, probably the best I have had. The prices are a tad high, but are totally worth it considering both the high quality of the work and the customer service.

This is my home away from home. I probably would have been ashamed to say this in the past, but I'm a regular, and I'm damn proud of it. This place is wonderful, granted you can find a place to sit. Don't get me wrong, there are a couple dozen tables, but it gets busy, and it gets busy often. I always get the coffee of the day; today it's a creme brulee. Sometimes it's a chocolaty blend from Nicaragua or something strong from Peru. I'm probably making this up. There's Wi-Fi, obviously. There's a decent food selection, too. I love their pita and hummus. They also have Everything bagels, which I like lightly toasted and plain. I get weird looks when I tell them to hold the butter and cream cheese. Anyway, what really makes this place great is the staff. Hands down--the friendliest bunch of baristas in town. I have no shame in spending every waking hour in this coffee shop. I get all my work done, and I see friendly faces. I feel like one of them. Lol. Okay, I'll stop now. Try the latte or the tea. Great selection of herbal teas--my goodness. Excellent stuff.

Oh My Gawd ! Sooo delicious ! This is a Las Vegas Landmark.  Old school Vegas entertainers dine there (I always hope to spy one!!) & its so cozy!
$65.95 for a couple !!!!!!
Hell yes ! We had the 1.5 pound lobster each, salad, garlic bread, baked potato, ear of corn & a BOTTLE of wine.  Bargain !

Now for those of you classy folk that have written 1 star reviews of this place.If you are offended by bargains, smoking, or Vegas 1970's style.  Get in your Prius, drive your WASP ass down to Green Valley or Town Square.  Probably there, someone   will give 2 shits about your cardiovascular health & whether your veggies came from Costco or not.  Sorry there wasn't a yard boy picking your veggies fresh for you. 

The Staff was superb.  Rose was a fantastic waitress.  She even cracked my Lobster claws for me...since I'm not real smart like that.  She "field stripped" them faster than anything Id ever seen.  

I'm going to try Pups on the Patio next.

"It is patently evident that this culinary establishment merits a perfect quintet of stars in terms of its gastronomical offerings and overall experience, as we had the pleasure of partaking in their all-you-can-eat option and were thoroughly impressed by the diverse array of delectable dishes presented before us, with the sole exception being the Yakisoba, which did not align with my expectations of a soba-style dish, but such minor shortcomings are more than forgivable given the nature of this sushi-focused eatery."

Bill is the first person you want to call. After figuring out we had a problem with our pool, Bill was at our door within minutes. He worked efficiently to fix our problem and went above and beyond in terms of his service and hospitality - all at a great rate. I would definitely recommend Bill to anyone needing pool repair.

My 2001 Audi was enduring an array of functional deficiencies (air conditioning system non-operational, windshield wiper fluid deployment dysfunctional, trunk hatch malfunctioning), prompting me to visit Zimbrick for a comprehensive diagnostic evaluation; the projected cost of rectifying the issues, as conveyed to me by their representatives, was in excess of $1000, encompassing the replacement of various components. Contrastingly, upon transporting my vehicle to Dunn's, their team rapidly deduced that only minimal adjustments were necessary, rendering the previously estimated expenses unnecessary. Not only did they earn my trust through their transparent and honest business practices, but they also demonstrated extraordinary flexibility in accommodating my busy schedule, facilitating my ability to seamlessly coordinate their services with my daily commitments. As a result, I have remained a loyal patron of their establishment, unwavering in my recommendation of their exceptional expertise and customer service to my acquaintances and peers alike.

This eatery boasts an exceptional ambiance, offering an extensive array of delectable options that cater to diverse palates, thereby making it an optimal destination for a satisfying repast. Our visit transpired mere minutes prior to the establishment's closing hour, yet the staff displayed no signs of impatience or annoyance, which garnered them an additional star in my assessment. Upon requesting a vegetarian canine, I received an accommodating response, as the server informed me that any item on the menu could be tailored to meet my dietary preferences, earning another star. The expedited preparation and reasonable price point of the beverage complemented the convenience of the locale, thereby warranting a third star. However, it was not until I sampled their gourmet hot dog delicacy that I truly appreciated the culinary mastery of this venue, as it elicited a profound sense of nostalgia and satisfaction, reminiscent of my alma mater, the University of California, Berkeley. The Windy City dog, adorned with celery salt and neon green relish, presented a flavor profile akin to a warm embrace on a chilly day, evoking memories of Top Dog, a beloved eatery from my collegiate years. Thus, I highly recommend paying a visit to this esteemed establishment and indulging in their extraordinary fare, despite their somewhat premature closing time in comparison to the city's vibrant nightlife.

"The culinary experience we indulged in at this unplanned dining establishment was utterly remarkable, particularly in light of the fact that we happened upon it by chance while exiting the Ka Show at MGM. Our arrival time was approximately 9 PM, and we were seated within a mere 10 minutes of our entrance, despite not having made any prior arrangements. My better half partook of a delectable pork chop, while I savored a tender and flavorful cut of beef, which I thoroughly relished. We also shared a fresh and crisp salad, which complemented our meals nicely. Furthermore, the restaurant offered an impressive selection of beverages, including Stella on tap, much to our delight. The service we received was attentive, cordial, and proficient, contributing to an overall ambiance that was both welcoming and sophisticated. Lastly, the specialty cheesecake we sampled for dessert was truly exceptional, providing a satisfying conclusion to our repast. Needless to say, we are eagerly anticipating our next visit to this esteemed eatery."

"The Old Fashioned restaurant was the inaugural dining establishment I had the pleasure of visiting upon my relocation to Madison, and subsequent to a year of exploring the diverse culinary offerings within the city limits, it remains my preferred eatery. Perhaps it is the delectable cheese curds, unquestionably the most exceptional specimens on the isthmus, complemented by the savory paprika dipping sauce that elicits an unbridled 'YUM' from my person. Or maybe it's the ambiance; Old Fashioned exudes a vibrant yet laid-back vitality, synonymous with the city's character, despite the prolonged waiting period customary on Fridays and Saturdays. Undoubtedly, the cuisine plays a significant role in my affection towards this establishment, boasting an impressive array of mouthwatering delights, including their acclaimed Mac and Cheese, Fish Fry, and an assortment of burgers and brunch items that never fail to satisfy my gastronomical inclinations. Furthermore, the beverages served here are equally impressive, as evidenced by my initial visit, during which the bartender graciously offered us a sampling of various locally brewed beers, thereby initiating my enduring infatuation with Lake Louie's Scotch Ale. However, it is conceivable that my fondness for Old Fashioned stems from its capacity to provide visitors with an authentic Madison experience, encompassing delectable fare, convivial company, superior libations, and above all, an abundance of exceptional cheese."

Stopped in to Gallaghers before our Cirque du Soliel show at the N.Y N.Y.
We started the meal with a shrimp scampi app. 
My husband had the Cesar and I had the gazpacho, which was amazing. 
We also had the shrimp scampi for an app. It had a delicious warm spicy sauce..not your usual butter scampi sauce... 
I ordered the queen cut prime rib, and Ben had the surf and turf with the hugest lobster I've ever seen. 
I hardly put a dent in my prime rib..It was huge. I wish I could have taken it with me. 
We also had the lobster mashed potatoes and creamed spinach, both were awesome but we could not finish. 
The servings here are HUGE.
The food was excellent for the money (I think this meal would have cost me more at home in S.F.)  I think our total was around $200 before tip..not bad..
The highlight of our meal was our server Norman. 
Norman's service was phenomenal. I hope he is working  next time we are visiting.

"AZ Celebrity DJ boasts an unparalleled proficiency within their respective domain, thus constituting an optimal choice for any event organizer seeking exceptional entertainment services. We eagerly anticipate the prospect of collaborating with them on future occasions, as their commitment to meticulousness, as exemplified by the trio of Stephanie, Juan, and Joe, is truly remarkable."

I infrequently become satiated with merely two slices of pie; however, Pizza Rock successfully accomplished that feat for me. We arrived at this establishment after a short walk from our nearby lodgings, harboring a yearning for pizza, and the locals' effusive recommendations led us to this venue. Upon entering, we were taken aback by the captivating ambiance, as the spacious interior featured a pick-up and to-go window at the forefront, accompanied by a fully-fledged restaurant situated at the rear.

The establishment boasts an array of televisions scattered throughout, catering to diverse sporting interests, while music videos featuring renowned artists are played, further enhancing the lively atmosphere. Moreover, Pizza Rock offers a comprehensive bar, supplemented by generous happy hour discounts, constituting an additional advantage.

The culinary offerings at this eatery are truly impressive. We initiated our dining experience with a salad dressed with delectable blue cheese, and the waitstaff ensured that our needs were consistently met throughout our visit. Notably, the courteous and attentive service extended beyond our designated server, as other waitresses would readily assist us, even when it wasn't their assigned table. Such thoughtfulness and helpfulness are uncommon in casual dining settings.

Our order of the classic pizza, augmented with select additional toppings, yielded an exquisite flavor profile, a satisfying crunch, and an overall dining experience that exceeded expectations. My satisfaction with Pizza Rock was undoubtedly elevated by the superlative fare and exceptional service.

I wholeheartedly endorse Pizza Rock to anyone in the vicinity, whether they are local patrons or mere passersby. This establishment is an optimal destination for gatherings of friends, families, large groups, and even children, owing to its welcoming atmosphere and superior quality.

I have had the privilege of visiting an array of nightclubs across the globe, spanning from the illustrious city of Paris, to the bustling streets of Seoul, and extending to the culturally rich Quito, Shanghai, Taipei, and the vibrant NYC. However, my experience at this particular venue has elevated my expectations to an unprecedented level, providing an unparalleled encounter that has redefined my perception of a nightclub experience. The DJ boasts an impressive proficiency in their craft, seamlessly blending an eclectic mix of tracks that cater to the diverse tastes of the patrons. Furthermore, the performers and entertainers showcase their exceptional talent, engaging the audience with captivating displays of artistry. Notably, the sound system strikes an optimal balance between audibility and intensity, allowing for an immersive experience without jeopardizing the integrity of one's hearing faculties. In conclusion, this nightclub stands out as the premier destination for those seeking an extraordinary and transformative nightlife experience in Las Vegas, unequivocally earning its reputation as the best club in the city.
YUMMY! The pasta was very well done. The shrimp were larger than I expected and blended well with the cheese sauce. Definitely better than Olive Garden any day of the year.

Becky furnished my spouse and me with an extraordinary nocturnal experience at the tavern, as she concocted a unique potion for my better half, inspired by one of her proprietary formulas, thereby manifesting her unwavering commitment to providing exceptional customer service and fostering a memorable sojourn for us.

"I must say that I was thoroughly impressed with the student stylist who attended to me, Chelsea, whose proficiency and expertise in her craft were evident in the exceptional quality of the services she provided, which included a relaxer, trim, blow dry, and straightening treatment. My hair has been styled by numerous salons and stylists in the past, but I must concede that this particular experience was unequivocally the most satisfactory and impressive one I have had the pleasure of enjoying. Although the ambiance was slightly boisterous due to the youthful energy and conviviality of the students, the superior quality of the work performed by Chelsea more than compensated for any minor inconvenience caused by the noise. I am positively inclined to return and avail myself of their services again in the future."

"My excitement knew no bounds when I became cognizant of the arrival of a novel French bakery in our community, and I promptly proceeded to investigate this purported haven for coffee and pastries; suffice it to say that my expectations were not only met but indeed surpassed by the delectable offerings presented before me, thereby cementing this establishment as my preferred venue for indulging in such gastronomical delights. Furthermore, the personnel employed at this esteemed eatery exhibited a level of hospitality and amiability that served to further enhance my overall experience; thus, I extend a warm welcome to La Belle Terre and eagerly anticipate partaking in their culinary creations for lunch in the near future."

"C&R Tire boasts an exceptional team of professionals who exemplify consummate expertise and unwavering dedication to their craft. Last evening, I encountered an unfortunate predicament involving a screw lodged within my tire, rendering it perilous to venture forth onto the highway for fear of jeopardizing my safety and the safety of others. Following a diligent search online, I chanced upon C&R Tire, whose operating hours commenced at the crack of dawn. At approximately 6:45 AM, I placed a call to the establishment and had the privilege of speaking with Tracy, whose benevolence and willingness to assist me in locating the shop alleviated my apprehensions. Upon arriving at the premises, I was promptly attended to and my vehicle was expeditiously repaired within a span of thirty minutes. The courteous personnel at C&R Tire went above and beyond by meticulously reinstating my spare tire and securing all extraneous components that I had removed during the process of elevating my automobile the previous night. It is unequivocal that C&R Tire harbors exceptional individuals who execute their duties with unparalleled proficiency and ardor. I shall unhesitatingly return to avail myself of their services whenever the necessity arises."

My spouse and I embark on frequent excursions to Las Vegas, with an average frequency of 2-3 times per annum, and our culinary exploits invariably involve discovering novel eateries that we grow fond of, albeit to varying degrees. However, our most recent escapade proved to be a remarkable deviation from the norm, as we encountered Soho and became instantaneously enamored with its gastronomic offerings.  
Both my partner and I shared the unwavering conviction that the consummate Japanese repast we relished at Soho eclipsed any previous dining experience, with every dish we sampled boasting exceptional quality. The pinnacle of excellence was exemplified by the salmon, whitefish sashimi, and Twin Dragon Roll, each of which merited unreserved acclaim. In point of fact, it would be a gross understatement to purport that these dishes were merely satisfactory; rather, they were utterly sublime.  
The hospitality we received at Soho was tantamount to the exquisite fare, as our server was affable, helpful, and well-versed in the nuances of the menu. She offered us sound guidance, which we embraced with unbridled enthusiasm, and our resulting dining experience was nothing short of euphoric.  
In light of the preceding, I feel compelled to wholeheartedly endorse this diminutive eatery, and I implore potential patrons to pay it a visit at the earliest convenience. It is my fervent hope that Soho will continue to thrive and retain its present location, as its culinary prowess and hospitable ambiance are truly deserving of widespread recognition and appreciation.

"Indulged in a culinary extravaganza at this esteemed establishment on the occasion of my recent birthday celebration. The allure of the delectable fare proved impossible to resist, rendering a repeat visit an unavoidable necessity. The seafood offerings, in particular, boasted an exceptional level of freshness, with each dish being meticulously prepared to accentuate the delicate flavors of the marine delicacies. For an optimal dining experience, I highly recommend securing one of the limited tables situated in the intimate lower level bar, as it affords an atmosphere conducive to relaxation and rejuvenation after a hectic week."

This apothecary establishment aligns precisely with the expected standards of such an institution, embodying the essence of a national chain while concurrently providing the convenience of acquiring prescribed medications at any affiliated location, thereby obviating the necessity for an extensive search for a local pharmacy during periods of travel or urgent need. Although the level of personalized consultation may not parallel that offered by a community pharmacy, this facility's proficiency in expeditiously preparing and dispensing prescriptions fulfills my principal requirement. Additionally, the personnel consistently display a courteous demeanor, despite the occasional sense of hastiness in their interactions.

This place has the best food around. The people here are kind the service is quick and well the tacos are awesome especially the shredded beef ones. Oh the rice and beans are out if this world. I highly recommend. Oh and Friday nights are the best. There is free mariachis on Friday nights and the atmosphere is fun and more fun without the pressure of \"pick-up\" night at the other establishments. Oh, did I mention the food is great? And the people are fantastic, kudos to the cooks, the servers and the owner are all great--I highly recommend this place to anyone with a heart and a sense of fun.

This establishment undoubtedly reigns supreme as our most beloved sushi restaurant, with an unwavering reputation that has captivated our taste buds for over eight years. Our group of friends has frequented this culinary haven with unrelenting enthusiasm, and we have yet to experience a single moment of discontentment. The all-day happy hour, available from Monday through Thursday, offers an extraordinary opportunity to savor premium quality fare at a remarkably affordable price point. The delectable cuisine, coupled with exceptional service, creates a truly unforgettable dining experience that consistently surpasses our expectations.

"The macaroni and cheese-infused canine culinary creation, affectionately denoted as'mac n cheese dog,' is utterly remarkable. It is imperative to acknowledge that the eatery's diminutive stature, coupled with its immense popularity, tends to result in an extended waiting period and a dearth of personal space for patrons. Prepare thyself accordingly."

Ruth.... You have turned me into a blonde bombshell. There is nothing this lady can't do. I've been coming here since December, and every 8 weeks I am happy as a clam. We've been transitioning me from deep red to blonde (tough challenge), but she goes out on a limb and aces it every time. I've been getting compliments all week! I'm thinking of making my blue-haired sister drive all the way from Flagstaff for Ruth's amazing color correction... I'm sure she could figure something out! lol :) Thank you Ruth! You're amazing!

"My culinary experience at this eatery was nothing short of a pleasant astonishment, as the hospitality was proficient and the beverages were of exceptional quality. Specifically, the hot rocks and chicken dishes showcased remarkable flavor and texture, while the adult tater tots, although not particularly impressive in terms of taste, possessed an agreeable crunchiness. Notwithstanding, the Caesar salad, accompanied by a side of adequately cooked salmon, demonstrated freshness and a commendable preparation. Lastly, the banana cream dessert proved to be an excellent conclusion to the meal."

"Exceptional customer service was exhibited by this establishment, as evidenced by my recent interaction with them. Although I did not utilize their self-storage facilities, I did opt to rent a Penske truck from their location, and the entire process, from initial contact to final execution, was characterized by seamless communication and extraordinary service. Upon arriving at the designated time, I was pleased to discover that the proprietor had thoughtfully positioned the vehicle outside, awaiting my arrival, and had taken the liberty of preparing all necessary documents and materials in advance. A thorough examination of the truck's condition was conducted, followed by a detailed explanation of optimal driving techniques and safety guidelines. Notably, the owner also generously provided an assortment of complimentary furniture pads, a gesture that spoke volumes about their commitment to customer satisfaction. Furthermore, I had requested a hand truck, which was promptly made available, along with all other requisite equipment, all of which were in pristine condition. This encounter served as a stark contrast to my previous experiences with U-Haul and Budget, and I would unhesitatingly endorse this particular location to anyone seeking similar services in the future."
Best coffee in town. Friendly staff and free wifi! Large cafe with plenty of seating and non-pretentious atmosphere. Good prices, $2.50 for a cappuccino.

This establishment has the potential to become my secondary domicile, owing to its exceptional ambiance, impressive selection of refreshingly chilled beverages, hospitable personnel, and an expansive, technologically advanced recreational area featuring colossal televisual displays. Furthermore, the culinary offerings here are quite satisfactory, making it a worthwhile venture for anyone seeking a convivial and satisfying dining experience.

Last night, I celebrated my birthday in the company of six other friends and family members at an establishment renowned for its delectable fondue dishes, and I must begin by expressing my sincerest apologies to any fellow patrons who may have been seated in close proximity to our table, as, after indulging in four of their exceptionally delicious chocolate martinis, my voice may have risen to levels that could be considered disruptive or intrusive; however, I assure you that I did not wear a hat, unlike some members of our party who shall remain nameless. The culinary offerings, as per usual, were truly sublime, and we began our gastronomic journey by sampling their delightful dessert selection before progressing to other menu items; furthermore, our server, Jeremy, provided exceptional service and exhibited an endearing charm that led me to speculate that he may be a closet player for the female gender, although this notion remains purely speculative. The staff, as a whole, contributed significantly to the overall enjoyment of our dining experience, and thus, I extend my heartfelt gratitude to every member of the Melting Pot team for their efforts.

The affection that I harbor towards this particular establishment of Starbucks is immense, as they possess the proficiency to concoct my preferred beverage, Passionfruit Iced Tea Lemonade, in a manner that aligns with my discerning taste preferences, which, regretfully, was not consistently achievable by the Starbucks locations in California, whose efforts, although well-intentioned, were somewhat short of the mark; furthermore, the staff members at this venue exhibit a commendable level of cordiality, helpfulness, and attention to detail, all of which contribute to an overall pleasant experience for patrons such as myself.

"Purchased three distinct varieties of e-liquid from this esteemed establishment, as my initial exposure to their innovative juice bar precipitated an unwavering fondness for their exceptional offerings. The assortment of flavors showcased remarkable diversity and depth, compelling me to acquire both the exotic lychee and jolly rancher melon variants. Unfortunately, I failed to commit the name of the third flavor to memory, but such an oversight did not detract from the overall quality of my experience. This enterprise boasts a superior reputation for providing patrons with an extensive selection of premier vaping products, as well as a spacious and welcoming physical location. Moreover, the staff exhibits a fervent dedication to assisting novice enthusiasts like myself, rendering them a veritable fount of knowledge and guidance within the realm of vaporization."

"Perform an immense service for your acquaintances by recommending they partake of a meal at this establishment, be it during the day or evening hours. I have successfully persuaded two additional individuals to indulge in the culinary delights offered here, who are now eagerly anticipating their subsequent visits. When placing your order, consider selecting two distinct pizza options, as it is likely that you and your companion will desire to sample both varieties, thereby necessitating the creation of a single dish containing both halves. Be aware that any dissatisfaction with the quality of the food would be attributable to your own actions, as the responsibility for making informed choices rests with the patron. This eatery has earned my highest endorsement, with a rating of ten stars."

"I elected to proceed as a walk-in patron on a whimsical Wednesday, opting to avail myself of Tom's expertise despite his preoccupation with an array of appointments. Following a brief interval of approximately fifteen minutes, during which I provided minimal articulation of my preferences, Tom accomplished an exceptionally precise and aesthetically pleasing fade, one that rivaled any comparable style within the region bounded by the Mississippi River. Observing his dexterous technique was indeed captivating, as he demonstrated consummate proficiency in his craft. My monetary investment in subpar salons featuring transient stylists now strikes me as lamentable, particularly when juxtaposed with the exceptional quality offered by Tom for a mere fourteen dollars."

"It is practically unanimous that Chick-fil-A's poultry offerings, specifically their chicken sandwiches, are of exceptional quality and undoubtedly delectable. However, it is crucial to note that the establishment's customer service is equally impressive, boasting a team of friendly and accommodating staff members who ensure a seamless dining experience for all patrons. Additionally, the restaurant's maintenance crew deserves accolades for their meticulous attention to detail in maintaining an immaculate environment, evoking comparisons to upscale eateries rather than a fast-food chain. Notwithstanding, it is advisable to disregard the directions provided by Google Maps, as they may lead to confusion due to the restaurant's location south of 202 at E. Ray Road. Instead, it is recommended to rely on alternative means of navigation or seek guidance from knowledgeable locals, as personal experience has demonstrated that reliance on Global Positioning System technology can be misleading and unreliable."

"The dining experience at BYOW & Beer was utterly remarkable, as they presented us with an ice jug for our adult beverages, in addition to serving scrumptious cuisine in copious amounts. Although the prices were slightly elevated, it was a negligible concern given the absence of exorbitant expenditures on potent potables. We would unquestionably revisit this establishment."

"David is utterly remarkable! I have been experiencing persistent discomfort in my cervical region, shoulder, and ankle for an extended period, and he dedicated ample time to comprehend my concerns, exhibited various physical activities to enhance my muscular strength, and provided a detailed explanation throughout the therapeutic encounter, enlightening me on the techniques he employed and their correlation with one another. His approach incorporated instruction as a fundamental component of the recovery process, imparting straightforward yet practical strategies that can be executed at home, which I greatly appreciated. For the initial time in numerous months, I can maneuver my neck without encountering pain, and the nodules have vanished. Although I have undergone massage therapy previously, David distinguishes himself as a genuine master of his craft, possessing extensive expertise and demonstrating an exceptional ability to detect even the most minor imperfections."

All I can say is that this is the best buffet I ever had in Vegas...each dish tasted like it wasn't cooked for the masses but came from a fine dining restaurant. The Wynn buffet ruined all the other buffets for me. I totally loved their cheese, charcuterie, dried fruits and olives selection...it made me very happy to find cerignola olives (olives as big as my thumb) as part of their offerings. mmmm cheese and olives....

Also I loved their king crab legs- fresh not too salty...just so tasty and so finger lickin good with some lemon and a dip in that warm butter. I was also surprised that I liked the lamb. Im not a lamb person but theirs were cooked perfectly and not gamey at all. I was even impressed that they had a panang station where you order what ingredients you want to add in your panang and that they offer tandoori and naan bread. I dont think I have seen panang and tandoori offered in any other buffets, this was an unexpected surprise. 

All in all, my family and I think that this is the best buffet...I don't think I can go to any other buffet after this. LOVE IT and definitely a MUST TRY!

I eat eggs but I'm not a fan of them.  Today I had the best eggs ever on the Brunch Flat Bread at Timo's.  Now I understand why people eat eggs.  The crust was remarkable.  The burrata cheese was a new taste surprise.  Fruit bowl was mostly cantaloupe but that was OK because the quality of the fruit was great.  Service was on point.  Loved the inside vibe.  Can't wait until it cools down to check out the outside vibe.  Only helpful hint...Mimosa was too tart.  Would have preferred more orange juice.  I was there with a brunch group and everyone else had great food too.

The personal epicurean experience that I had the pleasure of indulging in, specifically with regards to the consumption of a certain type of red meat, was one that I shall not soon forget, as it was nothing short of a culinary masterclass in terms of both the preparation and presentation of the dish in question. To elaborate, the medium-rare rib eye that I had the privilege of partaking in was not only cooked to an impeccable standard, but it was also seasoned with a subtle yet discernible array of herbs and spices that served to enhance the natural flavors of the meat without overpowering them. However, it was not the aforementioned rib eye that truly stole the show, but rather the pork chops that followed shortly thereafter. Bone-in and tender, these chops were cooked to a barely pink doneness, which allowed the juices to flow freely and the texture to remain succulent and firm. Furthermore, they were blanketed in a light, velvety sauce that added an additional layer of depth and complexity to the dish without overwhelming the palate. Suffice it to say, the mere thought of this delectable culinary excursion is enough to leave me in a state of gastronomic arousal.

"Our culinary steward, Michael, exhibited exceptional proficiency in his role, providing attentive and knowledgeable service. My dining companion and I opted for the roasted prime rib, which, despite some excessive marbling, was cooked to perfection and boasted an impressive depth of flavor. Supplementing our meal with an order of pork belly macaroni and cheese bites proved a judicious decision, as these bite-sized delights were both satisfying and rich, thereby necessitating the relinquishment of a portion of the prime rib to facilitate optimal enjoyment. A garden variety Caesar salad rounded out our repast, its quality falling somewhere between mediocrity and excellence. Notwithstanding the prevalence of vacant tables during what customarily constitutes the busiest period of the year, we capitalized on an advantageous Groupon offer, thereby enabling us to sample the establishment's wares at a reduced cost. Furthermore, the Jameson ginger weather cocktail we indulged in prior to our meal was truly exceptional, its potency pleasantly surprising this particular Hibernian patron; meanwhile, the fastidious attention devoted to maintaining spotless tablecloths and an immaculate floor contributed substantially to the overall ambiance of refined sophistication that permeated the dining area."

"We effectuated a residential relocation in December 2013, transferring our domicile from Camden Del Mar Apartments to a private dwelling situated approximately 15 minutes away. The process was facilitated by Warren's moving services, who demonstrated exceptional proficiency and dedication in their work. The initial stage of the move involved transporting smaller items, which we accomplished through numerous trips in our personal vehicles. Subsequently, we engaged Warren's team for the transportation of larger furniture pieces and several substantial boxes. The entire operation required three hours to complete and incurred a cost of $390, which we considered reasonable given the quality of service provided. 

The moving crew arrived punctually at 7:00 a.m., and their efficiency was impressive. They handled our belongings with care, exercising caution to avoid any damage or breakage. Notably, the two individuals who comprised the team were affable and courteous, which contributed significantly to a positive experience. Their willingness to accommodate our unique needs was particularly noteworthy, as they readily agreed to suspend our sizable couch from the balcony to facilitate its removal. This flexible approach alleviated our concerns about potentially having to disassemble the couch, which would have been a considerable inconvenience. 

Additionally, Warren's exhibited adaptability in scheduling, allowing us to arrange an appointment with minimal notice. When we unexpectedly completed our preparations ahead of schedule, a simple phone call enabled us to reschedule the move for the following day without incurring any issues or penalties. This flexibility was greatly appreciated and contributed to a seamless transition."

A museum that proffered a pithy and meticulous examination of a perturbing theme, the consequence of which was an immersive experience for its patrons. As an affiliate of the esteemed Smithsonian Institution, the museum showcased a level of excellence in its curation that was commensurate with its association. The subject matter itself was rife with contradictory sentiments, eliciting both dread and captivation in equal measure. The museum's presentation adroitly juxtaposed these emotions, offering a historical account of both atmospheric and subterranean testing. An array of artifacts from the era, complemented by visual media and personal narratives, contributed to a comprehensive understanding of this peculiar aspect of American history. Notably, the museum afforded visitors a unique perspective on the diverse reactions of individuals, including those who, surprisingly, derived enjoyment from observing atomic tests from a distance, outside the confines of casinos. Ultimately, the experience proved to be both intellectually stimulating and thought-provoking, providing visitors with a profound appreciation for a singular episode in the nation's past.

"My sentiments regarding this establishment are unequivocal and effusive, as it has managed to surpass my expectations with its culinary prowess, meticulously curated ambiance, and unwavering dedication to excellence. The fare served here is of unparalleled quality, with each dish showcasing a harmonious symphony of flavors that tantalize the palate and satiate even the most discerning of appetites. Furthermore, the coffee served here is a masterclass in extracting the perfect shot, with each cup exhibiting a rich, velvety texture and an aroma that tantalizes the senses. The staff, too, have distinguished themselves with their warmth, cordiality, and unwavering commitment to ensuring that each patron feels welcome and valued. Such is their proficiency that I have never once encountered a moment's hesitation or uncertainty in their service. Moreover, the surroundings are a testament to the owners' fastidious attention to detail, with every aspect of the dÃ©cor and furnishings carefully selected to create an atmosphere that is at once inviting, sophisticated, and redolent of elegance. In short, this venue represents the apogee of gastronomic excellence and hospitality, and I would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone seeking a dining experience that is truly exceptional."

After conducting an exhaustive assessment of the multitude of endorsements, I arrived at the conclusion that a visit to Grimaldi's was imperative this month. The pizza, with its culinary excellence, did not disappoint; the crust, in particular, was remarkably thin and crisp, akin to a delicate cracker, which happens to be my preference. Furthermore, the service we received was exceptional, making it an ideal venue for socializing with acquaintances or enjoying a memorable evening with one's family.

I love coming here! The staff is fantastic, there's a huge chalkboard wall, candy, ice cream, shaved ice, drinks, plus water and ice of course. It's an amazing atmosphere. They have a wall filled with photos of customers. Best place to get great tasting water!

I have been patronizing Ken's establishment for approximately three years at this point, and during that time, I have observed that they consistently maintain a high level of occupancy...owing to their exceptional work ethic and dedication to client satisfaction, which keeps customers returning in droves. Despite the large volume of patrons, they strive to be as accommodating as possible, endeavoring to accommodate both scheduled appointments and walk-ins in a timely manner. However, as a result of their popularity, brief waits of five to ten minutes are not uncommon, although I have on occasion experienced longer delays. Notably, I once had to wait for twenty-five minutes, at which point I decided to depart. Nonetheless, I persist in frequenting this salon, as the quality of their services and the amiability of their staff are truly exceptional. To minimize unexpected delays, I plan my manicure and pedicure appointments during off-peak periods. I wholeheartedly endorse this nail salon to anyone seeking top-notch treatments.

I love love love Smash burger. Everything is made fresh to order.

Try the SIN CITY burger it divine.

The buns...omg the buns!!

Must eat veggie frites with yummy ranch.

Eat HERE.. 

Service is quick and friendly every time

That is all

"I indulged in a delectable sausage, egg, and cheese on an English muffin for my morning repast today, opting for the convenience of having it served 'to-go.' The dimensions of this gastronomic delight far surpassed those of its contemporaries offered at popular fast-food establishments such as McDonald's or Burger King, making it a truly satisfying experience for my taste buds. The generous portioning of the egg and sausage patty, complemented by an ample amount of cheese, elevated this culinary creation to a level that was simply superb. Furthermore, I also requested a cup of coffee to accompany my meal, which, while not extraordinary, was still a respectable brew. The ambiance of the cafe was pleasingly tidy, and the cashier's warm demeanor added a touch of hospitality to the overall enjoyment of my dining excursion."
