"It would be a challenging endeavor for me to articulate any additional accolades beyond those that have already been expressed in regards to our exceptional experiences at this esteemed establishment. My spouse and I have had the pleasure of lodging at this opulent resort on two separate occasions, and it would be a formidable task to consider alternative accommodations for future visits. The Bellagio boasts a rating of five stars across the board, with every aspect of its operations exuding luxury and refinement. While I would suggest modernizing the guest rooms to enhance their aesthetic appeal, it is important to note that the cost of indulging in such finery is commensurate with the quality of service and amenities provided. In conclusion, I highly recommend this iconic hotel to discerning travelers seeking an unparalleled level of excellence, and may opt to explore other upscale options in the city, such as the Wynn or Venetian, during future visits."

"Chocolate and alcohol have historically not agreed with me, perhaps due to an unfortunate incident involving chocolate wine. Nonetheless, Max Brenner appears to have mastered the ideal blend. My companion and I arrived thirty minutes prior to happy hour, which allowed us to experience the ambiance in a timely manner. My companion opted for a chocolate martini known as Satisfaction, while I selected a chai tea infused with white chocolate ganache. 

The chocolatini possessed a surprisingly palatable taste, closely resembling a lighter milkshake in terms of consistency. 

The chai tea was equally impressive, showcasing a richer, more complex flavor profile compared to other chai teas I have sampled. Notably, it was served in a unique tea contraption that allowed the beverage to flow smoothly into the cup. If this establishment were not located within Caesars, I would unquestionably return for an exceptional chai experience. 

I am eager to revisit this venue and explore additional menu items."

Mob museum is very well thought out. You work your way down from the 3rd floor and it's very interactive. My girlfriend and I had a good time here. Very educational and cool at the same time. You may want to split the tour in half because it's said to take approx 3hrs and from what I remember you can go out n come back as long as you have your wristband on. Check on that prior! It shares history in a historical building! A must when your in Vegas to learn about old Vegas.

"Creative Formalwear is a luxury tuxedo rental enterprise that offers its services to the Las Vegas area, providing an extensive array of stylish ensembles for clients to peruse through its virtual catalog. The company's customer service is exceptionally responsive and accommodating, readily addressing any queries or concerns that may arise. Upon request, Creative Formalwear will deliver the attire to the client's preferred location, exemplifying the epitome of convenience. In addition, the quality of the merchandise is unparalleled, as each item is meticulously tailored to ensure a flawless fit. To further enhance the overall experience, complementary accessories such as socks are sometimes included with the rental package. It is worth noting that some individuals opt to rent their tuxedos in advance and transport them to Las Vegas, only to discover that Creative Formalwear's services are far more practical and economical. By choosing to rent from this esteemed establishment, clients can save themselves the burden of unnecessary stress, financial expense, and valuable time."

This place is amazing!!! Absolutely one of the best burgers I've ever had. Those sweet potato tots are to die for. Several items are marked as spicy, but I don't recall the symbol next to the burger I ordered and it definitely was spicy. Luckily the waitress kept my drink filled the whole time. \n\nReally cool atmosphere, definitely fits in downtown Charlotte. Obviously it's hard to find parking, but if you want to spend a night downtown this is the place to eat. Its sophisticated but not too pricey. Will eat here again.

The absence of sufficient temporal availability precluded us from indulging in a culinary experience at this establishment during our recent visit, however, a telephonic conversation with the maÃ®tre d' afforded us the opportunity to glean insight into their menu, specifically pertaining to their oyster offerings, which, we were delighted to discover, could be savored at a relatively economical price during their 'happy hour' time frame, spanning from 2 p.m. to 6:30 p.m., for which we extend our gratitude to the maÃ®tre d' for his forthrightness and exceptional customer service, surpassing our expectations and rendering it a five-star experience, leading us to regret not choosing to dine at this venue instead of Joe's Seafood and Steak.

Frank's does not engage in the practice of applying excessive pressure to customers in order to sell additional services, unlike certain other establishments such as Jiffy Lube, et al. The ambiance of the facility is well-maintained, the staff members are congenial, and they offer gratis refreshments to patrons while they await their vehicles. A thorough cleansing of both the interior and exterior of my automobile was performed, and upon completion, I was thoughtfully presented with a bottle of potable water situated within my beverage receptacle for my journey. This considerate gesture served as an appreciated token of their dedication to providing exceptional customer service.

"This location is utterly magnificent! Its existence obviates the necessity of placing an online order for coffee and awaiting its arrival via shipping. Each and every individual who is employed at this establishment exhibits exceptional cordiality and offers a gratis coffee, espresso, or latte with unwavering generosity. In the event that you possess a Nespresso machine, this venue serves as an optimal destination for procuring your coffee. I possess a pair of machines from Nespresso, one designed specifically for espresso and the other for coffee, and I would never consider parting with them."

This establishment formerly known as Bobby McGees has undergone a transformation, as conveyed by the waitstaff, and now operates under the moniker Bobby Q's, offering an exceptional dining experience with an impressive array of delectable barbecue options that are certain to gratify even the most discerning palate. The culinary excellence is complemented by a commodious setting, featuring both indoor and alfresco seating arrangements, as well as a dynamic dance floor, all of which contribute to a captivating ambiance that exudes a modernized essence while still paying homage to its predecessor's unique charm. A departure from the erstwhile format, which had become somewhat stagnant, this revamp has proven to be a salutary move, as it has enabled Bobby Q's to flourish and distinguish itself as an exceptional eatery worthy of high praise.

I recently relocated to the Phoenix region and have been conducting a thorough search for a grooming salon that meets my stringent standards, and upon discovering this establishment, I decided to bring my two Shih Tzus here for their grooming needs last week, having previously inspected the premises and been impressed by its cleanliness and tranquility, which was evident in the lack of canine commotion typically associated with such facilities; I must say that I am quite fastidious when it comes to the grooming and well-being of my canine companions, and I was pleased to observe that the staff here was attentive to my instructions regarding their clipping, resulting in a most satisfactory outcome, furthermore, I noticed that my dogs exhibited significantly less anxiety and apprehension during their visit, both when I dropped them off and upon their return, which was a refreshing change from my previous experiences at other salons, thus, I am compelled to express my gratification with this discovery and shall unquestionably be patronizing this establishment again in the future.

"During our recent sojourn in Las Vegas, my beau and I opted to utilize his parents' timeshare accommodations at this establishment, and we must say, it thoroughly met our expectations. Its location was indeed ideal, boasting proximity to an array of hotels, casinos, and other amenities, while still maintaining a tranquil atmosphere. Our spacious one-bedroom villa was equipped with a palatial bathtub featuring state-of-the-art hydrotherapy jets, a luxurious sleeping space with a plush bed, and a fully-equipped kitchen. Additionally, the property offers a diminutive rooftop pool and hot tub, which provided us with a serene and secluded setting, relatively unfrequented by other guests during our stay. All things considered, we thoroughly enjoyed our time here and would unhesitatingly consider returning in the future."

We tried the teriyaki chicken and Asian spicy chicken. Both were very good!  If this was located a little closer to us, we'd definitely come back on a regular basis. Wide variety to choose from on the menu including crab puffs, edamame, etc. If I could rate 4.5 I would - the only downside is that it's small inside so not the most welcoming place to eat, but if you want something delicious on the go, this is it.

"Peter is an exceptional individual who possesses a remarkable proficiency in pool maintenance, as evidenced by the fact that my aquatic recreational area remains in a state of immaculate cleanliness throughout the entire year, attesting to his exemplary work ethic and dedication to his vocation; thus, I am able to enjoy a worry-free experience, devoid of any anxiety or apprehension regarding the upkeep of my pool, thanks to his expertise and commitment."
This is the best Dunkin' Donuts I've ever been in town... Everybody who works in the morning is really cool, and always has the best customer service! I'll come back every day just because of them

"This Toyota dealership is unequivocally the optimal choice for prospective purchasers within the locality. If you seek to acquire a vehicle, it is imperative that you get in touch with Gay, an exceptional sales representative whose proficiency and dedication to providing exemplary customer service are unparalleled. As a result of our extensive experience working with her, we can confidently attest that no other individual can match her remarkable aptitude for facilitating a seamless and satisfactory car-buying experience. 

Our unwavering loyalty towards the Toyota brand stems from their consistent delivery of high-quality vehicles that have consistently met and surpassed our expectations. The reliability and durability of their automobiles are unmatched, and the after-sales assistance provided by this dealership is truly impressive. By scheduling an appointment, patrons can significantly reduce their waiting time and enjoy a more efficient and organized experience. 

It is worth noting that the inherent value of a Toyota vehicle lies in its ability to perform optimally with minimal upkeep, thereby rendering the necessity for extensive servicing largely obsolete. However, should you encounter any issues, rest assured that the knowledgeable staff at this dealership will competently address your concerns and ensure a prompt resolution. Based on our unequivocal endorsement, we strongly advise potential buyers to visit this dealership and engage the services of the exceptional Gay, who will undoubtedly provide an unforgettable and satisfying car-purchasing experience."

I had an exceptionally enjoyable experience at this venue during a recent Friday night excursion! 
  1) There was no entrance fee, which was greatly appreciated. 
  2) The establishment boasted three separate rooms, each featuring a distinct DJ and an appreciable musical selection. 
  3) Additionally, there were scantily clad male individuals performing on stage, contributing to the lively ambiance. 
  4) Furthermore, my beverage expenses were remarkably minimal, allowing me to fully indulge in the festivities without fiscal concern. 
  5) Although the dance floor was somewhat diminutive in size, it afforded ample space for socializing and engaging with fellow patrons. 
  6) In conclusion, I thoroughly enjoyed myself, sensing an palpable jovial atmosphere that will undoubtedly draw me back to this destination in the future.

"Remarkable nightlife venue. My enjoyment was palpably enhanced, as it had been an extended period of time since I had experienced such unadulterated amusement. Kudos to the event organizers for their proficiency in creating an atmosphere that fostered unbridled merriment, resulting in a capacity crowd that endured until my departure at 10 am. Notably, I had the pleasure of making the acquaintance of an affable individual, and I must say, the notion of a road trip from Los Angeles did momentarily cross my mind, albeit facetiously; however, I hasten to clarify that it was merely a playful notion, not meant to be taken seriously."

"This picturesque location presents an optimal setting for an excursion on foot or by horseback, and offers an economical alternative to traditional venues. I am acquainted with an individual who selected this site for their nuptial celebration, which transpired without incident, despite the lack of climate control within the rustic structure. For those who may not share an affinity for equine-themed matrimonial festivities, the surrounding area boasts an array of captivating attractions."

My husband and I ate here on our way home from Vegas. I looked for an Indian restaurant on Yelp with good reviews and Yelp saved the day again by leading us to this wonderful gem. They have meat, vegetarian and vegan options. The buffet was huge and delicious. Everything is clearly labeled whether it's vegan or vegetarian, too, which was so helpful. I could only wish to find this wonderful of a vegan friendly Indian restaurant in L.A. I am on the hunt! I will be eating here everytime I visit Vegas!

Last weekend, my entire family fell victim to a virulent gastrointestinal virus, leaving me as the sole member who appeared to have escaped its grasp; however, my fortuitous reprieve proved fleeting, as I began experiencing symptoms of vomiting and a pulsating headache mere days later. Following the sighting of Hangover Heaven's mobile medical unit in my vicinity, I opted to avail myself of their services. Dr. Burke, a seasoned medical practitioner, arrived promptly at my domicile within a forty-five minute timeframe, administering an intravenous solution of anti-emetic medication that yielded palpable results within sixty minutes, effectively alleviating my discomfort and leaving me feeling revitalized. Considering the efficacy and convenience of this service, I would unhesitatingly utilize it again in the future, and advocate for its benefits to both visitors and residents seeking rapid rehydration and relief from the debilitating effects of a hangover or other maladies. Indeed, I can only lament the fact that we did not conceive of such an ingenious concept during the previous week, when our family was plagued by illness.

Awesome food.  The hanger steak is irresistable.  Really enjoy that they usually have live music and it's free.  Great beer selection and serves food late.\n\nUnfortunately it can get packed on some nights (popular bands/events) and hard to get a table or even seat at the bar.

This establishment offered an exceptional dining experience, boasting a proficient and hospitable service staff who catered to our needs with alacrity. Partaking in an early evening repast, we indulged in an assortment of delectable fare, including juicy cheeseburgers, crispy fries, rich milkshakes, and savory biscuits and gravy. While the cuisine may have been reminiscent of traditional diner fare, its quality and presentation belied its affordability, with the entire meal costing less than $20. Moreover, the restaurant's proximity to the campus made it an ideal destination for students seeking a satisfying and economical dining option. Based on our thoroughly enjoyable experience, we would highly recommend this venue to anyone seeking a casual, yet satisfying dining experience.

"A tranquil and refined setting in which to partake of tea, this eatery is nestled within a secluded nook of the Four Seasons Resort, which is accessible via a brief stroll from the Mandalay Bay parking area. It is advisable to arrange your visit with at least 24 hours' notice, as they adhere to a stringent reservation policy. Their delectable scones, crafted with meticulous attention to detail, are complemented by an array of organic teas that cater to diverse palates. The hospitable staff members exhibited remarkable courtesy and adaptability, even indulging my request for additional scones to enjoy on my departure. For a comprehensive assessment of my experience, please peruse my blog entry at the following link: http://thirstyfortea.com/2013/07/09/tea-on-the-strip-verandah-las-vegas/"

Tasty, good value sandwich selection.  Great coffee.  And I've just this morning discovered they make a mean bacon roll too, and I'm so fussy about bacon rolls I rarely buy them.  Very friendly staff.

"The culinary artisan specializing in sushi preparation has demonstrated exceptional proficiency in their craft, prompting my utter astonishment at the dissatisfaction expressed by certain patrons; it is conceivable that such individuals are basing their evaluations on arbitrary and inappropriate criteria. Nonetheless, the gastronomical offerings here are of superior quality, and the sushi expert's dexterity and skill are truly remarkable. I would unhesitatingly confer upon them a perfect rating of ten stars, were it feasible. Moreover, I eagerly anticipate my next visit."

"Indubitably, for aficionados of sushi, this establishment serves as an unparalleled culinary paradise! Upon discovering Hokaido, I was compelled to frequent it as my preferred sushi destination, primarily due to the exceptional proficiency of the sushi artisans! Their mastery in crafting unique, delectable creations has consistently astounded me, to the extent that I have relinquished the need to peruse the menu, opting instead to entrust the chefs with the task of creating singular, unforgettable specialty rolls that never fail to impress! \n\nThe quality of the sushi at this venue is invariably exceptional, complemented by the attentive and hospitable service of the staff. For those seeking to make a lasting impression on their companions, the presentation of the sushi, with its fastidious attention to detail, is truly remarkable and certain to leave a memorable impression."

Menu's culinary offerings have undergone a transformative renovation, precipitated by the acquisition of a new proprietor who evinces a profound dedication to gastronomical excellence. Consequently, this establishment has ascended to the status of my preferred dining venue within Chandler Fashion Square, owing to its delectable array of epicurean delights, including but not limited to, expertly prepared grilled turkey and chicken dishes that elicit unadulterated delight from my taste buds. Furthermore, I must commend the exceptional quality of service delivered by the restaurant's staff, whose cordial demeanor and attentive attention to detail have fostered an atmosphere of unpretentious hospitality that greatly enhances the overall dining experience.

I have seen La Nouba, Love, Mystere, Zumanity, Totem and O. They all get a 5 star review if you ask me but for the record this was my favorite. This particular show is fun and has lots of audience participation especially at the beginning of the show. In the Vegas area I think Zumanity is my favorite and when it comes to the traveling shows I really liked Totem but this is definitely one to put on your list as a must see.

"Appreciation for the convenience of these establishments, which operate on a 24-hour basis, thereby obviating the necessity of traveling to an alternate location subsequent to engaging in physical exercise, and enabling me to procure a nutritious beverage without further effort or inconvenience."

"This establishment represents the inaugural culinary experience that has piqued my interest to such an extent that I am compelled to sample a diverse array of their offerings, opting for a varied selection during each visit. The quality of service is commendable and the cuisine is truly exceptional, thereby establishing this eatery as one of my preferred destinations for a satisfying breakfast."

My daughter got a groupon for her birthday this year to try archery (she just turned 7). From the moment we stepped through the door we were greeted by smiles and welcomes. She fell in love with the sport and every chance we get we take her down to practice. Not only do they make you feel comfortable and like family but they take time to make sure she's using good form and make her feel good about herself even if she misses and gets down on herself. Gabe and his staff are top notch and everyone I come across who's interested in archery gets referred to them because I know they'll get nothing but 5 star treatment. We love you guys! Sasha and shakira :-)

"O'Kelley's is an establishment that offers an enjoyable experience, featuring live music performances by talented artists who showcase their skills in playing instruments and singing, with a focus on genres that deviate from the conventional and overplayed classic rock, thereby providing a refreshing change of pace for patrons seeking a unique and memorable nightlife experience. Additionally, the venue offers a menu with reasonably priced food and beverages, further enhancing the overall appeal of the establishment. Of particular note is the exceptional quality of service provided by the waitstaff, with Meghan being a standout member of the team, known for her warm and welcoming demeanor, as well as her ability to effectively address the needs of customers in a timely and attentive manner."

"My sentiments regarding the exceptional quality of our recent dining experience are unequivocal. It is utterly implausible that I could adequately convey the extent to which our culinary expectations were surpassed by the exquisite fare presented before us. Suffice it to say, the service we received was of an unparalleled standard; the staff's proficiency and dedication to ensuring a seamless dining experience for their patrons was nothing short of remarkable. Their extensive knowledge of the menu and willingness to share it with us, coupled with their warm and welcoming demeanor, left an indelible mark on our collective consciousness. It is without hesitation that I confidently assert the value of this establishment far exceeds the cost of admission. Needless to say, whenever fate brings me to Las Vegas in the future, I shall unwaveringly return to this esteemed eatery."

"This gastronomical establishment specializing in Japanese cuisine truly epitomizes excellence in its culinary offerings, providing an unparalleled dining experience for those seeking an authentic taste of Japan. The tofu, in particular, is a notable highlight, boasting an unprecedented level of freshness that elevates it to a league of its own. Furthermore, the sushi served here is equally impressive, with each piece expertly crafted to showcase the delicate balance of flavors and textures that have become synonymous with this beloved Japanese dish. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly endorse this restaurant to anyone seeking a genuine Japanese culinary adventure that will leave their palate thoroughly satiated and their senses delightfully stimulated."

Amazing experience!! My wife and I had the best couples massage. We are staying at the  Pallazo and decided to go there first for our day at the spa. When my wife and I went to see about using their services the staff was very rude and the lady at the desk even rolled her eyes at my wife. We turned around looked up Best couples massage on Yelp and saw the Bellagio reviews were fantastic. The staff was amazing and the services were outstanding. I would highly recommend this to all my friends and family.

"My frequent excursions to Edinburgh have invariably included a visit to Cafe Keno, strategically positioned on the Royal Mile, thereby offering an optimal confluence of convenience and accessibility. On multiple occasions, I have taken advantage of their welcoming ambiance, indulging in a brief respite from my peregrinations, savoring a hasty cup of coffee, while simultaneously absorbing the vibrant atmosphere. Moreover, I have spent extended periods within their hospitable confines, partaking in delectable repasts and capitalizing on their complimentary Wi-Fi amenity. The initial draw of their robust wireless connectivity has evolved into a sustained affinity for the warmth and cordiality of the proprietors and staff, who exhibit an unwavering dedication to ensuring a genial and inclusive environment for patrons. The prevalence of local regulars constitutes a ringing endorsement, and although the tariffs may align with the elevated standards of a tourist hotspot, the generous portion sizes more than compensate for the cost. My personal predilection gravitates towards their lamb koftas, which elicit unwavering approbation. In summary, Cafe Keno earns my unequivocal recommendation as an exceptional eatery."

"Sunday's brunch at this establishment was nothing short of extraordinary. My spouse and I partook in a delectable shrimp tamale appetizer, which served as an ample precursor to the culinary masterpieces that were to follow. My companion opted for the swordfish club, while I decided on the Mesa burger, both of which were enthusiastically endorsed by our attentive server. It is worth noting that the quality of the latter dish improved with each successive bite, rendering it a truly unforgettable epicurean experience."

Origano provided a truly delightful initiation to our culinary escapades in Edinburgh, as we partook in a delectable repast that encompassed an array of flavorsome delights. To initiate the gastronomic journey, my spouse and I opted for the Bruschetta Crudo, a piquant appetizer that effectively whetted our palates for the delectable fare that was to follow. For the primary course, we elected to share a pair of personal pizzas, with my companion selecting the Vesuvio, a spicy variation that lived up to its name, while I opted for the Caprino, a savory concoction that harmoniously married the richness of cheese with the subtle tang of tomato sauce. Throughout the meal, our server proved to be an affable and accommodating host, offering insightful explanations of certain unfamiliar menu items, such as rocket, a leafy green that, regrettably, does not grace the gastronomic scene in Canada. The overall experience was further enhanced by the judicious wine pairings, which masterfully complemented the diverse flavors of the dishes, thereby elevating the entire dining experience to a truly stellar level. Based on this exceptional encounter, it is emphatically advisable to pay a visit to Origano for a delightful and sophisticated evening out.

I love this place, I'm not a regular but the few times I've came it's been great!! I only get pedicures and they are very thorough and take their time. I come on Mondays and it's never an issue getting helped right away!! This is the place to go :)

"I must admit that I am utterly astonished to be expressing such effusive praise for Poppy Seeds Bagels, as they truly epitomize the quintessence of excellence in both quality and taste, thereby eclipsing my preconceived notions of what a genuinely authentic New York-style bagel should embody. It is indeed fortuitous that my sibling relocated to a relatively remote area, thereby affording me the opportunity to partake in and savor the delectable offerings of this esteemed establishment. Upon entering the premises, my senses were immediately assailed by the tantalizing aromas and sights of an array of freshly baked goods, complemented by an impressive selection of artisanal cream cheeses, ranging from the traditional variety to the more piquant jalapeÃ±o-infused option. It is worth noting that the popularity of Poppy Seeds Bagels is undeniable, as evidenced by the lengthy queue that had formed by 7:30 am on a Monday morning, which speaks volumes about the unwavering dedication of their clientele. In conclusion, I fervently implore the powers that be to consider expanding the reach of Poppy Seeds Bagels by establishing additional locations in closer proximity to my own abode, as I am eager to indulge in their culinary masterpieces with greater frequency."

(Prior to proffering my assessment of this establishment, allow me to preface my remarks by divulging that my experiences at the Ivory Room have been limited to a mere two instances, and my exposure to the realm of bar-hopping remains relatively nascent. Therefore, please take my opinions with a grain of salt, as they are inherently subjective and potentially lacking in comprehensive insight.)

Notwithstanding the aforementioned disclaimer, I must confess that the Ivory Room holds a special place in my heart as my unwavering favorite among the plethora of watering holes I have had the pleasure of patronizing. Following their recent expansion, the venue now boasts an even more spacious area dedicated to patrons who wish to indulge in vigorous dance sessionsâan amenity that I personally find most appealing. For those seeking an unbridled, exhilarating experience replete with merriment and camaraderie, I wholeheartedly recommend partaking in the Dueling Piano nights, which take place every Thursday through Saturday evening. Although a nominal cover charge of $5 is levied upon entry (albeit, astute patrons may circumvent this fee by first visiting Capital Tap Haus and presenting their receipt as proof of prior patronage), I assure you that the entertainment afforded by the dueling pianists and the ensuing communal sing-alongs will prove well worth the pecuniary investment.

Furthermore, I would be remiss were I not to extol the virtues of their potent yet refreshing $3 sweet tea vodka lemonade, best savored during the prime hours of Friday and Saturday nights. Be forewarned, however, that the cacophony of melodic revelry may reach such heights that you risk sacrificing your vocal faculties in the process; nonetheless, I can confidently attest that the experience will leave you utterly bereft of regret.

In light of the fact that my interactions with the staff and service at the Ivory Room have been cursory at best, I feel unqualified to comment on the criticisms leveled against them by others. Notwithstanding, my affection for this establishment endures, and I eagerly anticipate the prospect of revisiting it on numerous future occasions.

It had been an extended period of time since I had the opportunity to partake in the services of a traditional barber shop, and the prospect of acquiring a haircut anywhere else besides a chain establishment seemed highly unlikely. My appearance was disheveled and unkempt, and my previously well-maintained beard had become unruly and unmanageable. Furthermore, my emotional state was one of frustration and disappointment. However, through the auspices of a popular review website, I was able to locate an exceptional barber shop situated in a trendy area of central Phoenix. Upon entering the establishment, I was greeted by one of the most affable and cordial barbers I have had the pleasure of encountering, who offered me a warm welcome and directed my attention to an assortment of complimentary refreshments, including soft drinks and popcorn. The waiting area was appointed with luxurious seating, and every aspect of the shop was adorned with intriguing embellishments that captured my interest and held it captive. Moreover, a state-of-the-art home theater system, replete with an extensive collection of DVDs, was available to ensure that my wait was both enjoyable and memorable. As for the haircut itself, I must say that it was undoubtedly the most impressive and satisfactory one I have received throughout the entire year of 2014. Matt, the talented barber responsible for my transformation, executed an exceptional job of shaving my head and imbuing my once-again magnificent beard with an additional element of stylishness and panache.

I indulged in a gastronomical excursion at La Scala on the evening of December 31st, 2011, and relished every morsel of their delectable Italian culinary creations, which unquestionably rivaled those savored during my previous sojourns to Italy. The seafood delicacies, in particular, boasted an unparalleled freshness, reminiscent of the day's catch from the Mediterranean Sea. Our hospitable server, Brian, exhibited consummate attention to detail and an unwavering commitment to ensuring a pleasurable dining experience. The cozy ambiance, enhanced by the subtle lighting and an intimate setting, harmonized beautifully with the melodic strains of the live Sinatra-style singer and pianist, thereby creating a romantic atmosphere ideally suited for momentous occasions or significant dates. Furthermore, the prices charged for these gastronomical masterpieces were eminently reasonable, with the most exorbitant dish available for a mere $30, a veritable bargain considering the unquestionable quality and generous portions. Suffice it to say that my palate was thoroughly satiated, and I shall unhesitatingly return to La Scala upon my next visit to Las Vegas.

Today, I arose feeling unwell; extremely so, in fact. It seemed that nothing short of acquiring an entirely new physiology might alleviate my discomfort. Berocca and Beechams, those stalwart champions of pharmaceutical relief, proved ineffectual in mitigating my symptoms. Furthermore, an intense yearning for hob nobs possessed me, rendering me utterly bereft of any semblance of mental clarity or emotional equilibrium. In essence, I found myself at a loss, struggling to cope with the severity of my malady.  

Enter Louise C, a veritable angel of mercy, bearing a delivery of vitamin tablets, my coveted hob nobs, andâwhatâs this?âa modest brown paper bag adorned with the insignia of âPeterâs Yardâ? My stomach, still recovering from its previous revolt, could not accommodate anything substantial or richâ¦and lo, Louise C presented me with a gift from the culinary gods themselves! Two pear, blueberry, and sour cream scones materialized before my eyes, their heavenly aroma and tantalizing appearance elevating my spirits instantaneously. In my darkest hour, Peterâs Yard, via the benevolent hand of Louise C, came to my rescue. A small cup of tea, a delicate smear of butter, and a taste of the freshest, most ethereal, fruit-filled, and moist scone imaginable revived me, imbuing me with a renewed sense of well-being. Peruse my earlier reviews (listed below) for a comprehensive understanding of the various delectable factors contributing to my ardent admiration for Peterâs Yard. However, today, my affection for them stems solely from that transcendent sconeânothing more, nothing less.

"Culinary paradise on terra firma. The evening repast adheres to the conventional hipster menu, albeit with a slight dearth of piquancy that I would have preferred, yet still of superior quality; the cheesecakes, however, transcend mere mortal desserts and ascend to celestial heights of gastronomic brilliance. Beverages are priced at a level that, while not exorbitant, slightly exceeds my parsimonious budget, but the abundance of Scotch and Bourbon varieties, in addition to an array of cider-based cocktails, each one meticulously prepared and presented with a unique twist, renders the establishment an unparalleled drinking haven for even the most discerning imbiber. The ambiance, characterized by an artful blend of modernity and vintage charm, serves as the perfect backdrop for entertaining out-of-town visitors and leaving a lasting impression, particularly when situated amidst the picturesque, historical row houses that define MontrÃ©al's rich heritage. A consistent team of mixologists, with whom a convivial rapport can be easily established, frequently man the bar, and on a certain anniversary of my birth, one such bartender, with an acute awareness of my preference for Jameson, indulged me with a complimentary shot, graciously augmenting the celebratory atmosphere."

"My affection for this establishment knows no bounds, as it offers an array of delectable dishes that cater to my refined taste buds, such as the succulent lobster quesadilla, the flavorsome pollo poblano, and the rich, velvety mole, all of which are served with a generous portion of freshly prepared table-side guacamole, augmented by unexpected yet delightful ingredients like cranberries or pomegranate seeds. Furthermore, the ambiance of the restaurant is enhanced by the presence of unique and visually arresting artwork, while the welcoming and attentive staff members contribute to an atmosphere of warmth and hospitality, making it an ideal setting in which to savor not only the exquisite culinary offerings but also the exceptional sangria, which is undoubtedly the finest in the entire city."

"I have recently had the pleasure of utilizing the services of Green Cab, and I must say that my experience was thoroughly satisfactory. Despite the fact that the individual who received my call informed me that it could potentially take up to an hour for a driver to arrive, I was delighted to discover that it actually took a mere 15 minutes for the driver to reach my location. Additionally, the driver mentioned that he was fortunate enough to be in the vicinity, which further enhanced my overall satisfaction with the service. As a former resident of New York City, I can confidently attest that this particular ride was notably more enjoyable, cleaner, and boasted a higher level of technological sophistication compared to similar experiences in the past. Furthermore, I was pleased to learn that Green Cab offers a convenient payment option via credit card."

Beautiful location on the mountain. Beautiful rooms. Probably our family second favorite to the Hilton Squaw Peak. Perfect for an in-town getaway. The pool is huge -- actually called a Water Village -- and tons of fun for kids and grown-ups alike. And, durring the summer, you can stay for around 100 bucks!

Great and honest service, after wrestling with two dealers to replace my flat tire I came into discount tire and Mike Weston helped to get back on the road. \nHe was able to talk to the insurance company with the dealer to make things happen. \nThe guys at the dealer would just tell me to call this number and then go to website before they could do anything and make about 21 excuses why they could not do it. Anyway I will definitely recommend discount tire and will come back in the future when I am need.

"As a neophyte in the realm of canine proprietorship, I must preface my remarks by acknowledging that my dearth of experiential knowledge relative to this subject matter renders my assessment susceptible to potential disparagement by those who have had the privilege of familiarity with such establishments; however, I must aver that my initial visit to this veterinary facility has been an unmitigated delight, characterized by a marked absence of protracted waiting periods, a scheduling process that was intuitive and efficient, and a team of professionals whose cordial demeanor and unwavering dedication to their vocation have left an indelible impression upon myself and my canine companion. During my maiden appointment, I confess that apprehension and self-doubt had begun to insinuate themselves into my consciousness, fearful that my unfamiliarity with the norms and conventions governing dog ownership might betray my novice status; yet, Dr. K, with his consummate bedside manner and unwavering commitment to client satisfaction, swiftly dispelled such misgivings, offering salient counsel and guidance that served to bolster my confidence and instill a sense of composure, thereby enabling me to navigate the nuances of puppy parenthood with greater aplomb. Subsequent visits have only served to reinforce my initial impression, as Dr. K and his staff have consistently demonstrated a profound dedication to their craft, imparting valuable insights and advice that have proven invaluable in ensuring the optimal health and well-being of my furry companion."

amazing hotel!!! My new place to stay when I go to Vegas. Fantastic rooms! Its all about the one bedroom suite with the japanese soak tub! Amazingly friendly and helpful staff and fantastic food! Only place I gambled in the whole time. Don't miss out on the chandelier bar, great drinks, incredible atmosphere and a great place to have a date.

Great coffee, great service, great atmosphere, and even better prices. I'm so glad to have found this coffee shop near UNLV. Way better than Starbucks and the prices beat both Starbucks and the Coffee Bean. I'll definitely be back!

This particular site, albeit somewhat diminutive in stature relative to its Western counterpart, maintains an equivalent level of cleanliness and offers an array of sugary treats that are comparable in scope and quality. The female attendants manning the counter, who were observed to be in an exceptionally jovial state during our visit, demonstrated an impressive capacity for memory retention by recalling our customary order with remarkable accuracy. Following a rigorous hiking excursion, we were acutely famished, and thus, we proceeded to devour a sizable red chili burrito with great haste and enthusiasm, indulging in its flavorsome contents within the confines of the parking area. It is worth noting, however, that those seeking tortillas fresh from the belt, still steaming from their recent fabrication, would need to venture to the aforementioned Western location, where such culinary delights are readily available. Additionally, it is advisable to bring personal butter for optimal enjoyment. Payment options are limited to cash only, and electronic cards are not accepted.

"I suffer from an advanced stage of osteoarthritis in my manual extremities, which has resulted in considerable discomfort and impairment in my daily activities. Upon discovering that OSR employs a specialized hand therapist, I decided to schedule an appointment in the hopes of alleviating my symptoms. The contrast between my previous experiences with other healthcare providers and the exceptional care offered by this trained professional was nothing short of remarkable. For the first time in numerous years, I am experiencing minimal discomfort, thanks to the tailored approach adopted by the therapist. Moreover, I have been diligently adhering to the techniques imparted to me during the sessions, which has enabled me to maintain my improved state. So impressed am I with the quality of service rendered by OSR that I have enthusiastically endorsed their services to both my acquaintances and loved ones, a recommendation I seldom bestow upon healthcare facilities. Kudos to OSR for their dedication to excellence; may their commendable efforts continue unabated."

"Hong's Chinese takeaway is undoubtedly one of the finest I have had the pleasure of indulging in. Not only is the service prompt and efficient, but the culinary offerings are truly delectable, with a perfect balance of flavors and textures that avoid the pitfall of excessive oiliness. As an ardent devotee of Hong's, I would enthusiastically recommend their shredded crispy chicken in chili sauce, satay chicken, salt and pepper chicken wings, ribs, and pad thai. Moreover, this esteemed establishment offers a diverse array of Thai dishes in addition to their Chinese cuisine, thereby catering to a wide range of palates and preferences. Furthermore, Hong's pricing policy is eminently reasonable, making it an ideal destination for a group of friends seeking to sample a variety of menu items without breaking the bank. I assure you that Hong's will not disappoint."

"I have developed an unwavering fondness for this establishment, as the prices of their beverages are so remarkably reasonable that it defies comprehension. In fact, I was compelled to procure a package of alcoholic beverages to-go, solely to enable me to utilize my credit card and meet the minimum purchase requirement of ten dollars. Patrons can also opt to order culinary delights from Little Chicago Pizza, which shares a common location within the same retail complex, and have them delivered directly to the Roadrunner for their enjoyment. The ambiance is characterized by dim lighting, refreshing air conditioning, a pool table, darts, a jukebox, and the ubiquitous sporting events displayed on television. The bartender provided exceptional service, while the clientele exhibited warm hospitality. I would highly recommend either cycling or utilizing a taxi service to arrive at this destination, as the potency of the libations served here cannot be overstated."

"Commencing with an unequivocal expression of my profound affection towards Jamba Juice, permit me to elaborate on the unwavering quality of their products, which consistently tantalize my taste buds with their unparalleled freshness and delectability; specifically, their acai berry bowl has secured a paramount position among my culinary preferences. Furthermore, I must commend Miss Veronica, a staff member whose exceptional customer service and amicable demeanor have fostered a sense of familiarity and trust, as she has become acquainted with my customary order and even exhibits a playful awareness of my inclination towards Jamba Juice's offerings. Although occasional lapses in efficiency may occur, I remain steadfast in my loyalty to this establishment, and the reward system they have implemented serves as a token of appreciation for my patronage. Despite the rare occurrence of errors in my order, I persist in cherishing the overall experience that Jamba Juice provides, and thus, shall continue to frequent this venue with unwavering dedication."

"It was my maiden visit to this culinary establishment, and I must confess that I became instantaneously enamored with their delectable offerings, particularly their assorted pastries. The Matcha-flavored sponge cake, the succulent Strawberry Shortcake, and the traditional Italian coffee-soaked ladyfingers known as Tiramisu, were all consumed with haste and relish by my offspring and myself shortly after bringing them home. Among these, the Tiramisu stood out for its authentic preparation, which is a rarity in my experience, as many establishments tend to compromise on the quality of ingredients used in its creation. Suzuya's rendition, however, was nothing short of sublime, and I shall unquestionably return to partake in their gastronomic delights on a daily basis henceforth."

"Tacos of unparalleled excellence are served at this esteemed establishment, with no other Phoenix-based taco purveyor able to rival the exceptional quality of their culinary offerings. A considerable delay in being seated is a necessary inconvenience to partake in the delectable fare, but the duration of the wait is more than compensated for by the superior taste and satisfaction that these tacos provide. For those seeking an unrivaled taco experience, this venue is the optimal destination."

Finally, I managed to return to this establishment once again, and upon perusing the menu, I noticed that it had undergone some changes since my last visit.  I proceeded to place an order for a bowl of chicken noodle soup and the fish amok, which I had heard great things about.  As I was beginning to feel rather peckish, I decided to also order a mango drink, which, much to my surprise, was more akin to a dessert beverage, boasting a sweet and tangy flavor profile reminiscent of a mango soda.  Upon consuming approximately half of the beverage, my soup arrived, and I must say, it surpassed my expectations in terms of both taste and presentation.  Feeling rather satiated after enjoying the soup and still eager to sample the fish, I requested that the waitstaff package the remaining portion of the fish to-go.  Subsequently, I savored the fish the following day, and let me tell you, I was absolutely hooked!  The initial two bites left me somewhat uncertain, as the flavors were somewhat unfamiliar, but by the third bite, I was completely smitten.  Needless to say, I must make a point to return to this eatery at an earlier date, preferably within the next year.

My husband's Shih Tzu, Hunter, was in dire need of a grooming appointment. His last two grooming appointments at our previous home in Santa Cruz, Ca. were dismal failure. He just was not as styling as he could be!! My daughter recommended Scooby-Do's which is where she takes her Pug, Daisy and Shih Tzu, Rhyse. So off we go on Saturday morning with Hunter to his \"spa\" appointment as we call it!! Scooby-Do's did a excellent job at finding out how we wanted Hunter cut and what exactly their services included. The price was excellent and when we picked Hunter up he looked like the King he is , minus his Shih Tzu eyelashes..:-( that's okay they'll grow out!!

"The significance of historical awareness is particularly pertinent in the context of Pittsburgh's tumultuous past, making it essential for residents and visitors alike to engage with the city's rich heritage. This tour offers an exceptional opportunity to gain insight into the local culture and history, providing an enriching experience for those who appreciate nature, knowledge, and a respite from the mundane routine of daily life. Our guide was delighted to address any queries, offering detailed explanations and fascinating anecdotes that further enhance the educational value of the excursion. Moreover, the chance encounter with fellow inquisitive individuals on the tour added to the overall enjoyment of the day."

I have been frequenting this establishment for an extensive period of time, and on numerous occasions, I have opted for the Wolf Pack Special, which consists of a Wineburnger and a Coors Lite, as my culinary selection. Despite my repeated visits, I have consistently enjoyed the unpretentious ambiance and proficient service that this dive bar offers. Notably, their ghost pepper cheese wine burger is an exceptional delicacy. On my most recent visit, I opted for the Super, which boasted two patties and proved to be more than sufficient to satiate my hunger until the following luncheon. Irrespective of the ongoing construction, I highly recommend visiting this Phoenix landmark, as its walls are embellished with captivating memorabilia, creating a unique and suitable setting for viewing sporting events.
The best service you going to get in the Queen City .. The staff is great and they answer your question

"This appraisal pertains to Oscar, a mixologist who has demonstrated unwavering dedication and exceptional proficiency in his craft, rendering him an exemplary figure behind the bar. It is my conviction that he surpasses the standards of other bartenders I have had the privilege of encountering, and I must emphasize that my experiences have afforded me extensive exposure to an array of establishments where alcoholic beverages are served."

A acquaintance purchased a meal for me at this establishment on the most recent Saturday.  He has been enthusiastically recommending this venue for quite some time, and interestingly, I was also informed of its existence by a previous colleague.  My companion was adamant that I sample various dishes, hence we opted to divide two platters.  We were served a combination sandwich, the flavors of which fused together in an exceptionally delectable manner.  Although I am not typically a devotee of sandwiches, the harmonious blend of tastes was spot on.  The subsequent dish was the Cm B\u00f2 Nng; the beef was unbelievably tender and brimming with flavor, prompting a yearning that persists even two days later.  Subsequently, we each enjoyed a bowl of pho that ranked among the finest I have had the pleasure of consuming within the state of Arizona (I have had the privilege of savoring truly remarkable pho in California).  My stomach was so satiated that completing the bowl proved unfeasible.  I would thoroughly enjoy revisiting this eatery in the future.  The staff exhibited extreme politeness and cordiality throughout our visit.

The best park in the community! Well taken care of by the HOA. Plenty if space to have fun and see other families enjoying themselves as well. Such comfy grass. The hike up the peak is not bad. Plenty of dog stations for people to pick up their dogs crap. The only bad thing is the bats that fly around at night during the movies at the park!

"Nom Nom Nom. A culinary haven, conveniently nestled in close proximity to the bustling South Park Mall, thereby offering a relatively convenient parking experience for patrons. As an ardent devotee of this esteemed establishment, I have had the pleasure of partaking in their delectable offerings on numerous occasions, with each visit replete with an unwavering commitment to excellence. The management team, cognizant of the importance of customer satisfaction, has consistently demonstrated a proactive approach towards ensuring a gratifying dining experience for all patrons. On occasion, the restaurant has become quite crowded, necessitating a brief wait; however, the hospitable staff has always accommodated me graciously, even extending an invitation to indulge in a complimentary cocktail at the bar while awaiting the availability of a table. The Avocado Tini, an inspired creation that showcases the inventive flair of the mixologist, holds a special place in my heart and remains my beverage of choice. Furthermore, the musical selections played within the restrooms have piqued my curiosity, prompting me to inquire about their origin; alas, the details escape me at present, but they serve as a testament to the eclectic ambiance that permeates this beloved eatery."

"Restaurant of unparalleled excellence.  I had the privilege of partaking in a work-related luncheon at this esteemed establishment, during which I sampled their delectable mango salad complemented by the chef's confidential recipe dressing, in addition to a dish of garlic shrimp that left nothing to be desired in terms of flavor and presentation.  Subsequently, I opted to treat my beloved family to a culinary excursion to this gastronomic haven two days subsequent to my initial visit, and it is with great pleasure that I report that every item we ordered from the extensive menu, replete with 151 mouth-watering options, met and indeed surpassed our elevated expectations.  Of particular note was my spouse's effusive praise for the clay pot containing an abundance of succulent seafood and tofu, a dish that struck the perfect balance between flavors and textures.  Moreover, we chose to commemorate my mother-in-law's milestone birthday at this exquisite eatery, and while the steamed chicken with rice did not quite live up to our lofty standards, the remaining dishes we sampled left us in a state of unadulterated culinary bliss.  Furthermore, we were afforded the opportunity to engage in a warm and cordial conversation with the charming Wendy, whose hospitable demeanor and kind disposition served to enhance our already extraordinary dining experience."

Whenever I ponder a delectable Sunday morning repast or leisurely midday meal, my thoughts inevitably gravitate towards the rich culinary traditions of France, which have consistently piqued my gastronomic curiosity and satiated my epicurean inclinations with their exquisite nuances and flavorful complexity; having had the pleasure of partaking in this establishment's offerings on multiple occasions, I must confess that each dining experience has left me utterly enchanted by the symphony of flavors that grace my palate, with the salmon and brioche dish being my unwavering favorite - a heavenly union of buttery richness and artistic presentation that effortlessly transports my senses to the picturesque boulevards of Paris.

I own a home that Dane has rented for me. He is soooo nice and his staff is super accomodating. The last review is bogus!  I've used Dane for a while here and have had nothing but great follow up, detailed voice mails, constant email updates, and calls at work if needed. I think I can say he always responds to me same day, and always personally. It really doesn't get much better than having someone like Dane.\n\n-Tory

"A novel dining establishment, barely six weeks old, was discovered through a culinary review website, courtesy of my cousin's significant other's desire for an Asian-inspired celebratory meal. Unquestionably, the most exceptional birthday dining experience I have had the pleasure of partaking in. Our sextet opted for the sharing format, sampling five initial courses and four primary dishes. Approximately three-quarters capacity, the venue maintained an impressive level of service, ensuring our glasses remained consistently replenished. A well-orchestrated procession of culinary delights, each dish arriving promptly as its predecessor neared completion. The fare was scrumptious in its entirety, compelling me to eagerly introduce this eatery to future visitors."

"Culinary delights of the soul that elicit euphoric responses from the gastronomical cognoscenti. 

Each time my professional endeavors necessitate a sojourn to the southern precincts, my epicurean inclinations are piqued in anticipation of discovering novel barbecue and soul food establishments. This particular eatery not only met but exceeded my expectations, rendering my culinary expedition a resounding success. 

My gustatory indulgences included the delectable jumbo wings, served in conjunction with a scrumptious macaroni and cheese, accompanied by a side of succulent collard greens and complemented by a slice of flavorsome cornbread. Each item on the menu boasted an unparalleled quality and a distinctive flair that set it apart from its counterparts. The collard greens, in particular, were the most palatable and satisfying iteration I have had the pleasure of savoring. 

The assortment of comestibles and the attentive clientele service at this establishment were truly exceptional, rendering the overall dining experience a veritable delight. Furthermore, the restaurant has developed a mobile application, thereby facilitating the convenience of ordering and heightening the level of sophistication associated with their patrons' dining experience. 

I eagerly look forward to my next visit, when I shall relish the opportunity to partake in more of Mert's delectable offerings."

I was a walk in customer at david and friends, luckily Rylee was available :) she was awesome and loved the way she did my hair! I recommend you to go see her if you're thinking about going. On their website there is also a discount 25% off services :) definitely going back to see Rylee.

"The most scrumptious and delectable hamburger I have had the pleasure of consuming, can be found at this esteemed establishment. I enthusiastically partake in their take-out option, transporting the culinary masterpiece to the comfort of my hotel pool, where I relish every bite. The expert combination of blue cheese and caramelized onions creates a flavor profile that is simply divine. My taste buds are perpetually tantalized by the thought of this gastronomic delight, compelling me to crave it whenever I visit Las Vegas. It is with immense gratitude that I attribute my discovery of this edible treasure to my friend and his spouse, who have unwittingly become the architects of my unwavering loyalty to this eatery. A visit during the noontide hours is highly recommended, as the experience will undoubtedly transcend your expectations and leave you in a state of epicurean bliss."

This is my anniversary spot.

Amazing atmosphere with the finest foods and beverage!

I recommend grabbing a rooftop table on a beautiful night. 

This is a high roller type of place with class and will not disappoint.

Shine your shoes and give it a shot!

Best Philly in Las Vegas I've ever had! Sad that geris closed on trop but once I discovered this place it's no question and a lot better. They use fresh and expensive meat the rolls are a lot better than great buns and amorosos. You can tell easily. It makes Pops on Decatur and what you get at the San gennaro feast taste like garbage. This is the real deal the owners are very cool from Philly and taught me what a real Philly is.dont waste your money at the canival ever again go to Hanks!

"With the advent of favorable climatic conditions, the prospect of enjoying leisure activities in an outdoor setting becomes increasingly alluring, thereby rendering it imperative to relinquish one's grasp on indoor amusements and venture forth into nature's embrace. At Freestone Park, a diverse array of recreational pursuits awaits, including but not limited to, perambulation along the railroad tracks, observation of aquatic fowl, angling, utilization of pristine picnic areas, and participation in ball-striking activities at the batting cages or carousel. My own experiences at this locale, shared with both my immediate family and extended kin, have consistently been characterized by enjoyment and satisfaction. The approaching pleasant weather serves as a harbinger of further opportunities for delightful excursions."

I do not know why this place has such a low rating. I love this place, the food is great the portions are more than generous, they use white meat chicken, and the service is attentive. Also, the prices are very cheap, $5.50 and $6.50 for lunch is perfectly acceptable. They will change the heat level for any dish and make special arrangements for you. I wanted honey walnut shrimp with chicken instead of shrimp and they did not bat an eyelash they just said no problem. I also like that the plain lo-mein is truly plain, no vegetables or anything. Really give this place a try, and for other posters who have not been here in a while, you may reconsider coming back to this place. The decor is a little odd, 50's Chinese diner chic? Kind of strange but who cares? The place is good, clean, cheap, and the service is good. What more could you want?
I go there a few times a month and i never get tired if it. Great food, friendly staff, low prices for quality foods.

"My daughter's educational institution recently hosted a financial support event at this establishment, and I must say, considering the substantial number of patrons and the extensive queue that nearly reached the entrance, they managed to maintain an impressive level of efficiency in their service!  Chipotle is indeed a culinary gem; their burrito bowl is a satisfying and flavorful delight, brilliantly conceived to cater to my personal preference for a balanced and adequate portion size, as opposed to the conventional burrito, which often leaves me feeling excessively satiated.  Moreover, their chips are consistently fresh and their guacamole boasts an ideal balance of piquancy, providing a pleasurable dining experience.  The children's menu option is also a commendable value, offering my daughter's favorite cheese quesadilla, accompanied by rice, beans, and a refreshing beverage.  This particular location is distinguished by its cleanliness and warm hospitality, ensuring a positive encounter regardless of the length of the wait."

The food is GREAT!!!

I've just moved to LV , and I try to find good food is this town .. and this is one of them.

It was worth the drive from Summerlin to them. Whole in the wall .. ARE THE BEST!!

I've had the beef, fish and chicken tacos ...

The beef and fish were to die for, the "fusion" for the beef taco was a great new taste for me, the fish was also great, but the chicken .. for my taste was not so great ...Maybe because I had first the beef and fish taco's?? Maybe ..

Planet Hollywood earns a 5-star rating for multiple reasons; here's my top ten list explaining why PH stands out as the most fabulous hotel experience. Firstly, it belongs to the Starwood group, allowing me to redeem a complimentary stay using my accumulated loyalty points. Secondly, it surpasses its competitor, the Aladdin, in terms of aesthetic appeal, boasting an opulent ambiance. Thirdly, each guest room is tastefully adorned with movie and television-themed decor and memorabilia, which resonated perfectly with my friend, a devoted fan of the soap opera Days of Our Lives. Fourthly, the accommodations are spotless, featuring comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms that can easily accommodate four individuals preparing for a night out. Fifthly, there are no restrictions on room service orders, permitting us to indulge in their extensive menu throughout the day, resulting in three separate room service experiences. Sixthly, the hotel staff is friendly and helpful, with the concierge going above and beyond to assist us in finding a reasonably priced steak and lobster dinner. Seventhly, the atmosphere at Planet Hollywood makes guests feel like celebrities, adding to the overall luxurious experience. Eighthly, the hotel features the Miracle Mile Shops, catering to visitors who enjoy shopping. Ninthly, complimentary bottled water in each room helps prevent dehydration and hangovers. Lastly, Planet Hollywood offers reasonable rates for its exceptional accommodations, making it an unbeatable value. Cheers to an extraordinary hospitality experience!

"An exceptional smorgasbord, unquestionably ranking among my most cherished in the vicinity, with its gastronomic offerings rivaled solely by the esteemed establishments of Aria and Bellagio...The culinary selections are meticulously prepared, with the freshness of each dish contingent upon the time of arrival, thereby ensuring an invariably satisfying experience for patrons. Of particular note was the fried chicken, distinguished by a maple-infused batter that imbued it with the delectable flavors reminiscent of chicken and waffles, evoking nostalgia for the halcyon days spent indulging in such epicurean delights."

Thanks Neny! Very calming and relaxing atmosphere. I can't believe I have had 4 massages in 4 months, definitely a first for me.  I was hesitant to buy into the membership, but very glad I did. I am glad to be going on a regular basis. It has made all the difference in the world. Since I work on a computer all day, I found that this is important to be able to prevent the stiffness and discomfort that occurs over time. My neck and shoulder feel so much better. After 4 treatments my sciatica symptoms have disappeared. \nI would recommend this Elements location to everyone. Best thing I have done for myself.

"Love this place! If you have not tried this out yet, then I highly recommend doing so, especially during the sweltering AZ summers. 

I have had the pleasure of sampling a variety of their delectable flavors, including the Mango with Chile, Roasted Pecan, Strawberry Cream, Orange Cream, and the Watermelon with Mint. Each one has been an absolute delight, with my favorite being the one that I happen to be enjoying at any given moment - they are truly that exceptional. 

Furthermore, if you decide to partake in the indulgence of consuming your popsicles within the establishment itself, you'll be pleased to discover that their water cooler is consistently stocked with an assortment of distinct fruit flavors! On my most recent visit, it was strawberry and orange flavored water, which I must say was nothing short of pure genius."

"Our optimal yogurt destination, unparalleled in its excellence!  The amiable staff, proficient in their demeanor, provides an exceptional customer experience, complemented by an extensive array of yogurt flavors and a plethora of toppings, all served with a touch of whimsy via the vibrant pink and green utensils. Furthermore, the absence of restrictive sampling policies, so prevalent in certain competing establishments, only adds to the overall enjoyment of this superior yogurt venue."

Carrot Top elicits such a negative knee jerk reaction from so many.  It's like asking people at a pizza joint if they want anchovies.  When was the last time you actually had anchovies??  The guy has been a Vegas headliner since 2005.  There's got to be a reason why he's been able to stick it out on the strip and fill seats in that theater for the long haul while so many headline comedians have come and gone.  One year they're at the Excalibur, then The Plaza and then there's their one way ticket to Laughlin. 

I didn't think I would enjoy the show as much as I did.  He opened the show at a frenetic pace going from prop joke to prop joke.  Didn't think the joke was funny?  No problem!  There's another one in 5 seconds.  It was like watching the biggest 5 year old wise ass with A.D.D. show off his box of toys.  Freakin hilarious!!  The rest of the show was just as great.  You'll definitely laugh a lot and have a fun time unless you don't laugh at cock jokes.  So yeah....eunuchs may be sensitive to Carrot Top. 

We sat in the second to last row.  There's not a bad seat in the house.  You can purchase the cheapest seats without hesitation if you're still skeptical.

"Excellent hospitality, superior beverages, and their uniquely designed glassware are truly remarkable. Specifically, I would highly recommend indulging in a Zombie cocktail served in a Bearded Clam glass, as it elevates the overall experience to an unparalleled level of enjoyment."

Love this restaurant!

I avoid all chain because they are so noisy and music playing like your at a club. Sometimes, I feel like stuffing a roll in the persons mouth next to me because they wont shut up on their cells. Afterwards, I feel like I need a padded room to recuperate.

Everything at Pho Nhat is wonderful. Great tasting food. Pleasant service. Quiet unless the TV is on or an occasionally loud person.

Visit this place...not fancy inside but the food is amazing!

If you are an aficionado of the works of the illustrious architect, Frank Lloyd Wright, it is imperative that you allocate sufficient time in your schedule to partake in a visit to Taliesin West, whereupon you shall be treated to an aesthetically pleasing experience that will undoubtedly leave an indelible mark on your memory. The duration of the guided tour we embarked upon was sixty minutes, which proved to be an optimal amount of time for us to thoroughly absorb the splendor of the surroundings while simultaneously gaining valuable insights into the intricacies of the architectural design. It is worth noting that alternative tour options are available for those who wish to indulge in a more extensive exploration of the premises.

We will be arriving at The Orleans on the fifteenth of this month, and this visit marks our fourth sojourn at this esteemed establishment. Our fondness for this hotel is unwavering, and we invariably experience remorse whenever we opt to lodge elsewhere. The premises are fastidiously maintained, the personnel are unfailingly accommodating, and the complimentary beverages offered to patrons engaged in gaming activities are an added bonus. While I remain uncertain regarding the precise nature of the compensations received by the previous respondent, I can unequivocally attest that The Orleans constitutes an exceptional lodging option for individuals seeking to avoid the frenetic atmosphere of the Strip while still enjoying a convivial experience. Our annual pilgrimage to this venue for the Vegas to Reno races ensures that our connection with The Orleans shall persist indefinitely.

"Sushi Samba is an establishment that holds a particularly esteemed position in my hierarchy of preferences when it comes to indulging in happy hour festivities during my sojourns in Las Vegas. To succinctly encapsulate the essence of this venue, I would employ the following triad of adjectives: refined, alluring, and sushi-centric. From their assortment of delectable and imaginative sushi rolls to their diverse array of potent potables, I consistently derive pleasure from my visits to this esteemed edifice...and regardless of the specific location on the famed Las Vegas Strip where I may find myself, I unfailingly ensure that I venture forth to the Palazzo and partake in a gratifying experience at Sushi Samba. My personal preferences at this culinary haven include the Berkshire Pork Belly complemented by butterscotch miso, a Caipirinha, and the assortment of eel and avocado rolls. The quality of service at this establishment has consistently met my expectations, with the bartenders exhibiting both cordiality and informativeness in their interactions with patrons. I must say that I am rather enamored with the conceptual fusion of Latin and Asian gastronomies (such as Chifa in Philadelphia) and believe that Sushi Samba executes this blend with remarkable proficiency. Following a prolonged and sweltering day spent reveling at poolside gatherings, Sushi Samba serves as my preferred destination for unwinding and satisfying my craving for delectable sustenance."

Since our initial assessment of Le Grande, we have had the opportunity to revisit this culinary establishment on multiple occasions, affording us the ability to sample a greater variety of their gastronomical offerings. Specifically, we indulged in the Roasted Corn Pizza, which boasts an innovative combination of flavors, including the richness of goat cheese and the freshness of basil, resulting in a truly decadent dining experience that left us utterly satiated. Additionally, we opted to sample the Smoked Salmon Salad, which, while lacking the same level of creativity as the aforementioned pizza, still managed to impress with its simplicity and emphasis on freshness. Lastly, we concluded our meal with a generously portioned Red Velvet Cupcake, which, when shared among three individuals, proved satisfying enough to warrant further exploration of their dessert menu. Following this delightful excursion, we eagerly anticipate the opportunity to investigate the culinary prowess of their newly established restaurant, Ingos Tasty Food, located conveniently across the street from Le Grande. Our forthcoming review shall provide further insight into the gustatory delights that this esteemed eatery has to offer.

My two youngest offspring are captivated by the Titanic's historical significance and have developed a profound interest in the subject matter. Their fascination has led them to indulge in various forms of media, including cinematic productions and educational programs focused on the renowned vessel. Additionally, they have expressed their creativity by constructing Lego models inspired by the ship's design. During our recent vacation in Las Vegas, we opted to partake in a guided excursion of the Titanic exhibition. We elected to forgo the audio headsets and instead, engaged in a self-guided tour. My word, what an incredible experience it turned out to be! The curated exhibit seamlessly guided visitors through a series of sequential stages, each one showcasing a unique aspect of the Titanic's story. The atmosphere was designed to immerse patrons in the experience, utilizing a combination of luminosity and celestial elements to simulate the ambiance of the fateful night. Visitors were provided the opportunity to engage with tangible components, such as a life-size replica of the ship's promenade and an authentic iceberg fragment. The piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance was undoubtedly the colossal remnant of the Titanic itself, a humongous, multi-ton relic that inspired awe and wonder. We devoted nearly an hour of our visit exclusively to marveling at its imposing stature. Upon conclusion of the tour, guests are invited to juxtapose their complimentary keepsake postcard, received at the onset of the excursion, against a catalog of individuals who either survived or perished during the tragedy. This singular location warrants inclusion as a premier attraction during any Las Vegas itinerary.

WOW ..... I have to agree with Rachel C. on this one.They have really cool  flavors and its HOMEMADE !
After listening to Marty Griffin ( KDKA) talk about Antinitys for a few days on his morning show,
I decided to try it out. After all , who doesn't like Ice Cream.
Well , I'm impressed. I got the Chocolate shake a few nights ago , and last night,
a Bowl of Vanilla Bean. GREAT Homemade flavor. No plastic added !
I have the Toasted Coconut on my list for this weekend.
This is why I love Pittsburgh and the small business flavor here !

I have had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Kang for an extended period of time, during which his exceptional proficiency and dedication to his patients have been consistently evident. Moreover, his staff has invariably displayed a warm and welcoming demeanor, ensuring that my visits have been thoroughly enjoyable. Regardless of whether I have required a routine cleaning or a more complex procedure, I have never experienced anything less than top-notch care. Furthermore, the innovative approach of allowing patients to select their preferred form of entertainment during treatment has served as an additional perk. Consequently, I have enthusiastically recommended Dr. Kang's services to numerous acquaintances and colleagues and will persist in doing so without hesitation.

Watching the masterful barbers at this establishment ply their trade with such dedication and meticulous attention to detail is an unadulterated delight; it is abundantly evident that they invest copious amounts of time, effort, and passion into their craft, culminating in a finished product that exudes precision and finesse. My companion's recent haircut, a timeless gentleman's cut skillfully executed by Cody, serves as a compelling testament to their proficiency and commitment to excellence. It is patently clear that these artisans hold their customers in the highest regard and are genuinely devoted to ensuring their satisfaction. Such exceptional service and expertise have earned the confidence of even the most discerning clientele, including the United States Marine Corps, whose members seek out these skilled barbers to maintain their impeccable appearance. This salon is an indispensable destination for anyone seeking a world-class grooming experience.

"Indubitably, one of my most preferred hotels and gaming establishments, offering an unparalleled level of luxury and sophistication! My recent sojourn with acquaintances served as a testament to the exceptional quality of this venue, as the opulently appointed accommodations boasted state-of-the-art technology, including remote-controlled curtains and lighting, which occasioned some amusement during our nocturnal retirement. The fastidious attention to detail in maintaining the premises, coupled with the tasteful integration of elements inspired by the Orient, sans excessive ostentation, only served to enhance the overall elegance of the ambiance. Moreover, the breathtaking water feature adjacent to the valet area constitutes a sight to behold, irrespective of whether or not one avails oneself of the valet service. In short, my affection for this establishment knows no bounds!"

My husband and I love coming here! We would go during the week, but it is out of the way unfortunately. So, we choose to come on the weekends, and we love it!

The service is always very friendly. We sit at the bar most of the time, but they have couches, chairs, booths, and tables to sit at.
