Their menu is very creative, stuffed ricotta pancakes, banh mi breakfast, and Bavarian benedict to name a few of the dishes you won't find anywhere else in Montreal. Definitely one of my favorite breakfast spots in Montreal!

"Optimally intoxicated, we pursued sustenance at an establishment renowned for its delectable offerings, Grand Lux Cafe. Conveniently situated in close proximity to Tao, this eatery boasts extended operating hours, catering to nocturnal patrons who crave satisfying fare following an evening of indulgent libations. Our visit transpired during the wee hours, yet the venue remained bustling with activity, a testament to its enduring popularity. We relished the poultry and waffles, a culinary masterpiece that defied expectations by virtue of its generous proportions, allowing us to share it with ease and still enjoy leftovers for subsequent consumption. Furthermore, we sampled the chicken flautas, paired with a verdant sauce that elevated the dish to celestial heights of flavor. While Grand Lux Cafe may lack the refined ambiance of Cheesecake Factory, its more affordable pricing does not compromise the quality or taste of its offerings. In fact, our server's kindness and attentiveness only enhanced our dining experience. For those seeking a satisfying, albeit unhealthy, post-revelry repast, Grand Lux Cafe is an optimal choice, superior to fast food alternatives."

"I embarked upon a journey to Las Vegas, boasting an unblemished complexion and unkempt brows, yet departed the city with a radically transformed appearance, courtesy of Vanity Flair; their team, proficient in catering to the diverse needs of the fairer sex, provided me with an indulgent experience that I would unhesitatingly recommend to any female seeking a comprehensive beauty treatment. Needless to say, my subsequent visit to Sin City shall include a return to this establishment as a matter of priority."

"Las Vegas's preeminent beer bar, boasting an unparalleled assortment of brews, featuring a consistently evolving array of taps showcasing exclusive, hard-to-come-by beverages that are unavailable at any other establishment. This venue has drawn the attention of industry luminaries such as Greg Koch from Stone Brewing, who has visited on multiple occasions to commemorate the substantial volume of Stone beverages sold therein. Throughout the year, they organize beer festivals that afford patrons the opportunity to sample novel, rarely encountered brews while socializing with fellow aficionados. An indispensable destination for any true devotee of beer culture."

Best vet in town! My dog gets excited when we pull up to the office. My Japanese chin had some tricky allergies that I could not get rid of. He would chew his flesh raw. I had been to several vets to try and treat his allergies. Commonweath and their amazing staff fixed him right up. He has never had any issues again!\nA friend of mine, had to put her cat to sleep a few months ago. The vet from commonwealth came to her house to put her cat to sleep in the comfort of the pets own home, The vet and the vet tech were AMAZING. Very caring and even mourned with us. It meant alot to my friend. I can't say enough good things about Commonweath Animal Hospital. They are Awesome!!!!!

"I have an unwavering fondness for this pizza establishment, which stems from their exceptionally priced slice promotions and the remarkable flavor profile of their culinary offerings; furthermore, I am also inclined to order their chicken wings, which are truly sublime and contribute significantly to my overall dining satisfaction."

This establishment truly embodies an exceptional ambiance for a hotel bar, particularly one that specializes in strip entertainment. Upon visiting this venue several weeks ago, I was pleasantly surprised by the reasonable prices of their artisanal brews and the welcoming demeanor exhibited by the bartenders. The atmosphere was conducive to social interaction, boasting multiple televisions broadcasting various sporting events and a spacious setting that fostered a sense of comfort. Furthermore, the culinary offerings proved to be impressive, specifically the beer and cheese dip appetizer, which hailed from the state of Wisconsin and met my expectations as a connoisseur of fine cheeses. My companion and I were satiated by the portion size, which exceeded our expectations for a mere snack. When in the vicinity, it is worthwhile to patronize this establishment, especially considering the abundance of extravagant forms of entertainment in the surrounding area. The atmosphere exudes a down-to-earth quality that warrants high praise, and thus, I unhesitatingly endorse this restaurant. Although I typically reserve five-star ratings for exceptional experiences, this eatery surpassed my expectations among the numerous bars and clubs I have visited in Las Vegas, including other establishments that share its Irish theme.

"The most scrumptious and delectable pizza I have had the pleasure of consuming, boasting a perfectly cooked crust and an abundance of flavorful cheese, elicited an unbridled expression of delight from my taste buds, with even my two-year-old offspring enthusiastically echoing my sentiments as we savored each bite."

"A culinary delight, reminiscent of the finest gastronomical experiences, was had at this establishment, boasting an affordable price point. A creative and innovative menu showcased a fusion of southwestern flavors within their casual offerings. Particularly noteworthy were the tuna nachos and mushroom quesadilla, serving as delectable precursors to the mouthwatering main courses. The chile burger and pork sandwiches, bursting with savory flavors, proved to be the piÃ¨ce de rÃ©sistance of our meal. In conclusion, a truly satisfying luncheon experience was had by all."

"Upon our return on several occasions subsequent to our previous assessment (at an eatery in close proximity to our domicile), we have had the pleasure of partaking in delectable culinary offerings, while also experiencing a notable enhancement in the quality of service, specifically with regards to the attentive and accommodating nature of the waiting staff, who have demonstrated a commendable dedication to ensuring the satisfaction and well-being of their patrons, and have done so in a manner that exudes warmth and personability; furthermore, the sausage gnocchi dish continues to hold a special place in our esteem, and we wish to extend our sincerest accolades to the establishment for their consistent delivery of exceptional gastronomic experiences."

"This eatery has become a cherished destination for my spouse and me due to their delectable pizza offerings, which are crafted from scratch using authentic Italian ingredients and cooked to perfection in plain sight. Although they provide an array of culinary options, our preference is to indulge in the pizza special, featuring both pepperoni and sausage atop two substantial 18-inch slices, accompanied by a beverage of choice, all for a remarkably reasonable price of $4.99. In my estimation, this represents an unparalleled value, particularly given the high quality of the fare."

"Complimentary wireless internet access shall be bestowed upon patrons who indulge in the luxurious experience of smoking cigars, while partaking in the consumption of cold beverages, specifically beer, at a price point that is eminently reasonable and rational. Moreover, the hospitality provided by the establishment's staff, particularly the exceptional individual behind the bar, shall contribute to an atmosphere that is both welcoming and extraordinary."

"The experience was utterly captivating from the onset to the conclusion. We were situated on the right-hand side, specifically between the furthest right and central seats, and approximately ten rows up from the floor. The seating arrangements were comfortable, complete with integrated cup holders for our convenience. ingress and egress were effortless, allowing us to freely transport refreshments from the concourse's concession stands into the auditorium. The performers delivered an awe-inspiring display; the verdant juggling maiden, the two gentlemen rotating within circular frames, and the young woman oscillating on and off the elastic platform showcased extraordinary agility and grace. The sole observation worth mentioning is that the duo of clowns, on a few instances, appeared to be killing time and their comedic presentations lost some of their initial appeal."

Select your base (white, wheat, or Gluten-Free), condiment, dairy or non-dairy cheese, and an abundance of fresh garnishes of your preference, all for the reasonable price of $8.95. Indeed, this ideology is quite appealing, as it does not facilitate telephonic orders, but instead encourages patrons to place their orders for takeout, thereby ensuring a more personalized and expedient experience. Furthermore, these slender crust pizzas are delectable and satisfying, making them an excellent culinary choice. Kudos to My Pie for establishing a location in close proximity to my humble abode.

My food boner went from 6 to midnight after walking in here. 

I'll never shop at another grocery store. Vons lost my business the second I took a look inside this place and shopped there for the first time.

I highly recommend shopping here if you live in the area. Highly.

"Gastronomical excellence of Mexican cuisine! Patrons afforded opportunity to sample diverse meats prior to placing order, rendering decision-making arduous due to multiplicity of delectable options. Personal preference dictated selection of three tacos for this writer, while significant other opted for a sizable wet burrito. Postprandial state of satiety ensued, yet craving persisted. Staff exhibited exceptional hospitality."

"I have an immense fondness for this diminutive sandwich boutique situated adjacent to a charming second-hand bookstore. Its culinary offerings include a diverse array of delectable breakfast and lunch selections, complemented by an assortment of refreshing Italian sodas, smoothies, and Boco beverages. 

During my recent visit, I opted for the California wrap, which encompassed an appealing medley of succulent turkey, creamy avocado, crisp sprouts, savory bacon, and rich mayo, accompanied by a fresh fruit garnish and a delectable cookie. The flavors were indeed, extremely satisfying. 

The proprietor of this establishment is remarkably affable and courteous. In addition, they provide convenient local delivery services, allowing patrons to effortlessly place orders via telephone or fax."

Chilaquiles... OMG the chilaquiles!

In case you don't know, chilaquiles is a Mexican dish of fried softened tortilla chips covered with salsa or mole and cheese and broiled. They are one of my favorite foods and I've ordered them at countless places. Border Grill gets them right. Very right!

If you don't care for chilaquiles, this review isn't for you.

"Amorous sentiments abound, with an incremental augmentation in the magnitude of the introductory courses, vis-Ã -vis their counterparts in the City of Angels. A culinary triumvirate, comprising a medley of leafy greens, shishito peppers, and mochi ice cream, elicited unadulterated delight. However, the lobster dynamite, a dish whose nomenclature evokes explosive connotations, fell short of expectations, thereby precipitating a divergence of opinion. Notwithstanding this variance, the ambient surroundings, replete with an aura of sophistication, contributed significantly to the overall dining experience."

My favorite meal in Vegas for this trip. I work as a freelance reporter and was carrying a heavy camera bag, so I was pleased when were showed to our table and the wait staff offered to take and store my bag...thank you!

 Our waiter was great, but on top of the already good service, the manager took a few minutes to talk to us as well and recommend a sister restaurant out in LA. The biscuits served ahead of time were delicious, the Caesar salad we split was great but nothing special (it's just a Caesar after all). 

  For dinner my friend and I both had Seared Day Boat Scallops*
Butternut Squash Puree, Brussel Sprouts, Pear, Pecans, Brown Butte. So good! Not as good as the similar dish at 230 Forest Ave in Laguna Beach. This dish needed a bit more texture. Maybe some crispy leeks on top. Very good but texture overall was a bit mushy. For a side we shared the truffled mac and cheese which was good, but I don't really care for broccoli in my mac and cheese...what's the point?! I also love a little bit of breading on top of a baked mac and cheese as well, but that didn't stop me from chowing down none the less.

No room for dessert this time but a great night of food. I'll put in on the list for a go back from Vegas along with Strip Steak at Mandalay Bay.

"Amusement, economical, and delectable. Although somewhat cacophonous for the senior demographic, this establishment offers an enjoyable experience encompassing melodic tunes, complimentary potations, and a copious amount of culinary delights, all of which can be savored by a group of four individuals at a cost of less than $50."

This phenomenal spectacle elicited an unbridled sense of wonder and awe, evoking a profound emotional response akin to being immersed in one of Goya's most haunting and surreal nightmares - an experience that was simultaneously unsettling and captivating. Interspersed throughout the performance were brief interludes featuring awkward and uninspired salsa and disco dance routines, reminiscent of poorly choreographed scenes from a low-budget television show. Despite these momentary lapses in artistic judgment, the production as a whole remained deserving of unreserved praise, earning a well-deserved five stars.

The female performers boasted imposing physiques, their muscularity rivaling that of highly trained athletes. Absence of a certain character, Captain Winky, sparked curiosity and raised questions regarding the authenticity of some of the performers. For those planning to attend this extraordinary event, strategic seating recommendations included avoiding the front row, which was susceptible to being engulfed in a thick, eerie fog generated by dry ice, and steering clear of aisle seats adjacent to the performer stairs, as they were prone to sudden, startling interactions with demonically attired dancers. Additionally, owing to the considerable length of the rows, selecting seats near the stairs (excluding those designated for performers) was advised to minimize inconvenience in case of necessary restroom breaks.

One of my preferred locations for obtaining scrumptious Montreal bagels is this establishment. The cost of the items on the menu is quite reasonable, the speed of the service is relatively brisk (primarily due to the fact that they only accept cash payments, which is greatly appreciated), and the quality of the bagels is exceptional. I have had the pleasure of sampling a wide variety of their bagel offerings, and my personal favorites are the Sesame and Rosemary bagels. It is highly recommended that new customers request the freshest bagels available, especially if it is their first visit and they have heard about the high level of quality associated with this location. The staff will gladly accommodate this request with a warm and welcoming smile. However, it is important to note that this establishment specializes solely in the sale of bagels, which means that customers are required to purchase any desired toppings or spreads separately, and then assemble their own bagel sandwiches at an alternative location. Although this may present a minor inconvenience to some patrons, there are several nearby cafes that may permit customers to prepare their bagel sandwiches on the premises, provided they purchase a beverage (this option is particularly suitable for individuals who prefer to consume their meals in a more leisurely setting). Nevertheless, it is essential to be aware of the fact that certain establishments may have reservations regarding this practice, and some may even display disapproval. Additionally, it is worth mentioning that the prices charged for items in the freezer are significantly higher than those found at the majority of other retailers.

"Indubitably, an exceptional culinary experience was had by all, with the Parmesan crusted filet eliciting sensations akin to the richness and creaminess of butter, while the Heart of Italy combo proved to be an irresistible indulgence, further complemented by the delectable zucchini strips, thereby solidifying Chef Rod's reputation as a masterful virtuoso in the realm of gastronomical artistry."

Although they are a little hard to spot from the street outside, it's absolutely worth visiting this coffee spot inside the skyscraper lobby.  We tried a bulletproof (americano with butter and coconut oil) for the first time here, and it absolutely rocked.  They were offering samples of a green smoothie, and that was delicious too.  The staff was fantastic; they gave us great insider advice on what to see in Pittsburgh.

Still envisioning the delectable lobster gnocchi, an unwavering yearning persists, evoking memories of its scrumptiousness; truly a culinary masterpiece. Exceptional service complemented the exquisite dining experience, as each patron received an additional glass of champagne accompanying their sweet treat, further enhancing the savory indulgence. Unquestionably, this establishment delivers superlative Italian cuisine.

"My affinity for Del Frisco's is unwavering, as I frequent this esteemed establishment not only during Charlotte Restaurant Week, but also on momentous occasions that warrant culinary celebration. The gastronomical offerings here are indeed delectable, with each dish meticulously prepared to avoid even a hint of overcooking, ensuring an unparalleled freshness that tantalizes my taste buds. Among their extensive menu, my preference gravitates towards the tender and juicy beef medallions, while my fondness for their turtle soup borders on obsession. Suffice it to say, I would enthusiastically endorse this fine dining experience to any individual seeking a gourmet adventure, despite the elevated prices that may deter some patrons."

"I have had the privilege of experiencing the iconic musical production, The Phantom of the Opera, on multiple occasions, and I must say that the Las Vegas adaptation, known as Phantom, remained remarkably faithful to the original narrative, with only minor alterations in pacing and scenery. Notwithstanding the occasional fusion of scenes and the judicious omission of certain lines, the fundamental essence of the story, as conveyed through both the musical arrangements and spoken dialogue, remained largely intact. Furthermore, the incorporation of advanced visual elements, such as pyrotechnics, trapdoors, and other unanticipated features, served to enhance the overall viewing experience, culminating in a truly captivating performance. The venue itself, located within the luxurious Venetian complex, offered an intimate setting, which allowed us to enjoy an unobstructed view of the production from our strategically positioned seats in the right side orchestra section."

"Extremely satisfactory culinary experience! Recently procured takeout from this establishment, and I must say, the grilled skirt steak and accompanying vegetables were truly sublime. My taste buds were thoroughly satiated by the delectable flavors and textures present in each bite. I am eagerly anticipating my next visit, at which point I intend to sample a greater portion of the menu's offerings."

"I derive immense satisfaction from the fact that they continually alter their assortment of flavors and afford me the opportunity to serve myself, thereby providing an unparalleled degree of autonomy and flexibility in my culinary experiences. Moreover, I am thoroughly impressed by the exceptional caliber of their offerings, which are procured at the most competitive prices, thereby ensuring an optimal balance between quality and cost-effectiveness."

We have had the pleasure of partaking in their culinary offerings on previous occasions, albeit in a more informal setting, but this particular visit marked our maiden experience indulging in a full-fledged dining extravaganza within the establishment's hospitable confines. A truly remarkable and satisfying episode it was, with nary a grievance to be registered, as the fare provided was of exceptional quality, the attentiveness of the staff left nothing to be desired, the tariffs were eminently reasonable, and the array of delectable options was nothing short of stupefying, boasting an impressive diversity that included certain items heretofore unseen on other Mexican menus we have had the privilege of perusing. It is altogether likely that this eatery will assume the status of our preferred venue for indulging in richly flavored Mexican cuisine for an extended period, as we are eager to sample a sizable portion of the menu's offerings.

"The proficient and adept team at AZUSA Builders, led by the erudite and meticulous Scott, consistently deliver exceptional results through their punctuality, professionalism, and unwavering commitment to excellence, making them an unequivocal recommendation for any individual seeking top-notch construction services."

"Exceptional Boba's indeed! I have an unwavering predilection for the Taro flavor at any establishment that purveys such delectable beverages, and this particular venue prepares it with unparalleled proficiency, expertly blending the ingredients to create a sublime harmony of flavors. The personnel, though youthful in appearance, display an assiduous work ethic and a commitment to providing expedient service, ensuring a seamless experience for patrons. Unfortunately, due to my recent relocation to PHX, this esteemed establishment is now geographically distant from my abode, yet I unfailingly prioritize visiting during the sweltering summer months, as the refreshing nature of their offerings serves as an ideal respite from the oppressive heat."

I just moved here at the beginning of the month and Athena was the closest salon.  It was really nice on the inside, and I was given a full tour of the spa by Oliver.  Very upscale and good quality.  It is unassuming in appearance from the outside, but  luxury on the inside.\n\nI received a cut and color which was about 2 hours to complete in full.  I was looking for that, so it made me pretty happy.  After living in Southern CA, I think the prices here are about the same if not more reasonable than they were in OC.  It's not cheap, but then I expect to pay more to get a good hairstyle that I like.   I think I have found a keeper here!

3 ladies came with a field supervisor. They were scheduled for 10 am and they were there perfectly on time. I walked the house with the supervisor and showed them what I wanted cleaned. Let me tell you they went above and beyond and scrubbed my entire house! It's never been cleaner! They were thorough  but did not waste any time. I would highly recommend Pristine Cleaning to anyone.

This is my favorite PetSmart store in the entire Las Vegas Valley.  Why?  Well, for one the staff is always helpful and nice.  My boyfriend and I got our Rats Cyrus and Adelle from here since they were a female pet store.  Adelle's temperament wasn't exactly a kind one so we ended up giving her back to the store and got Dawn.  These two rats together were so sweet together.  Unfortunately, Cyrus contracted a disease and left us to be with other rats in heaven.  Now, it's just Dawn and us.  We figured to just keep her without any other rats in case she had the disease too.

Anyway, we didn't know how to raise rats and didn't really know what to do with them.  Luckily, there was a young female clerk who knew a lot about small animals and gave us all the knowledge we now know.  She was so helpful and took the time with patience to explain how to be parents of rats.

Also, everyone seems to be happy working here every time we're here to get our doggy and ratty stuff.

excellent offbeat sandwiches and original home made soup.

i never thought cream cheese could be used in so many different ways, with so many different accompanying flavors. i was VERY skeptical when i first saw the menu, but have been more than satisfied with everything i've ever ordered here.

there is a great backyard patio which is open during the summers. best of all, this place is a stone's through from the mountain, and we all know that nature + tasty sandwich = best thing ever.
Fantastic ambiance and food, I'm excited to have this place in my neighborhood....it feels like you live in a real city

"An ideal location for a satisfying repast following an extended nocturnal excursion, this eatery boasts an impressive array of libations and culinary offerings that are consistently of high quality and freshness, bearing a striking resemblance to the esteemed Cheesecake Factory, which is widely renowned for its delectable fare; specifically, the establishment's pizza, adorned with an assortment of wild mushrooms and asparagus, paired with a refreshing house salad, proved to be an absolute epicurean delight."

This place is amazing!!  Best pizza in town!  Staff is super friendly and food comes out fast.  Owner is fantastic and makes sure everyone is happy.  Cannot say enough about this place.  Take-out is just as good as when I'm at the restaurant.

MEATBALLS- an edible delight that warrants a sixty-minute round trip excursion for this writer.  The cost is reasonable, and the culinary experience is sublime!  The dining area is spotless, well illuminated, aesthetically pleasing, brimming with character, and masterfully designed for efficiency.  IKEA's corporate strategy is nothing short of brilliant, and the company's commitment to customer satisfaction is evident in every aspect of the dining area and showroom.  The staff members are consistently enthusiastic about assisting patrons, sporting authentic grins that convey their dedication to providing exceptional service.  This venue offers a multifaceted experience that combines retail therapy and gastronomic indulgence, all while accommodating one's progeny and demonstrating a laudable concern for ecological sustainability by eschewing single-use plastic bags at checkout.  Don't forget to bring reusable carriers for your purchases, and be sure to sample their signature meatballs complemented by a tangy cranberry sauce!

Gorgeous! Very high end beach club. It's Vegas so you know the drinks at the clubs will be through the roof. Now if you want to have a quick meal here, enjoy splurging 15-20 bucks on salads and such. It was too rich for my blood, so I had to pass on the food. Beautiful decor all around. The water is a glistening ocean blue and the security is tight. Let's say we girls had too much fun dancing on those poles with water trickling down our faces and such, but fellas...no pole dancing for you! Once you place your limbs on to the pole dancing area, you are swept off in a millisecond. Haha I have no complaints about the club, the only one is that I wasn't able to see ZEDD because he was out \"sick\" according to the staff.
Best subs, period! Although it is almost always busy (even when I go at night), it is worth the wait. Affordable and fast service as well!

My most preferred lodging establishment in Las Vegas, and undoubtedly one of the most luxurious accommodations I have had the pleasure of experiencing, offers an impressive array of amenities that contribute to its exceptional quality. Frequently, this esteemed hotel offers advantageous packages for their standard suites, which boast an assortment of cutting-edge features, including remote-controlled window treatments, separate living areas, indulgently comfortable sleeping surfaces, dual sinks in the bathroom, and, most notably, profoundly deep soaking tubs that invite relaxation and rejuvenation.

The gaming facilities within the hotel are certainly enjoyable, but they are surpassed by the shopping and culinary experiences available. The Grand Canal Shoppes offer an extensive selection of high-end retail options, with Basin White being a personal favorite, offering an array of exceptional bath products that can be thoroughly enjoyed when utilizing the deep soaking tubs in the suites. Additionally, the hotel features several dining establishments serving delectable cuisine, such as Bouchon, which offers a delightful brunch menu near the 10th floor pool, while the Bouchon Bakery, conveniently located near the hotel elevators, serves scrumptious chocolate croissants for a quick breakfast option. For dinner, Canaletto, with its mouthwatering roasted pear ravioli, and Postrio, crafted by the renowned chef Wolfgang Puck and featuring a savory meatloaf dish, are both excellent choices.

"Indubitably astounding culinary offerings! This establishment boasts exceptional clientele service and serves as an optimal location for ingesting delectable fare. It is highly recommended that patrons sample either the Eggs Benedict or Loco Moco dishes, both of which have garnered widespread acclaim for their unparalleled flavor profiles."

"This culinary establishment is utterly remarkable! Not solely due to their delectable victuals, but also their exceptional clientele service! Upon arrival, we were promptly accommodated, despite the fact that not all members of our party had arrived simultaneously. Such expediency is truly uncommon in the hospitality industry. Our repast was served with haste, and the staff maintained an assiduous attitude, expeditiously removing vacant plates and inquiring as to whether we desired any additional items. Such considerate and attentive behavior exemplifies exceptional customer service. It is truly impressive that Scott, the manager, recalled our presence from a previous visit, demonstrating his dedication to fostering enduring relationships with patrons. Furthermore, the cost of dining at this establishment is eminently reasonable, particularly considering the superior quality of the cuisine and the ambiance. In conclusion, this eatery offers the finest AYCE sushi in town, and its contemporary decor, inviting atmosphere, and lively musical selection further enhance the overall dining experience."

"Approximately one month prior, my roommate and I visited HTC - Tempe, taking advantage of their promotional offer of $10 piercings. On an impulsive whim, we opted to acquire piercings, with me receiving a piercing on my upper ear and my roommate undergoing a belly-button piercing. Prior to the procedure, I experienced trepidation, however, upon entering the establishment, the personnel were exceptionally cordial and provided comprehensive explanations regarding the quality of the earrings and other materials utilized. It became apparent that the business prides itself on employing only the highest caliber metal for its piercings. Subsequently, we interacted with the piercer, who exhibited a similar level of friendliness, offering assurance and engaging in conversation while conducting the procedure with minimal discomfort. In fact, the experience was so enjoyable that I harbored a desire to obtain an additional piercing. The atmosphere within the establishment was tranquil, and the staff displayed a profound understanding of their craft, contributing to an overall positive impression."

It has been an extended duration of time since my last visit to Carlos and Pepe's, and upon my return, I was met with a stark contrast in the establishment's appearance, which had undergone a significant transformation. Ascending to the bar area, I was taken aback by the striking beauty of the renovations that had been implemented. The wait staff informed me that a new menu had also been introduced, and I opted to sample the grilled chicken quesadillas, which proved to be a delectable selection. Additionally, an extensive array of beverages was available, including an impressive variety of brews. Unfortunately, my schedule did not permit me to linger, but I shall certainly make a point to return in the near future.

MD Anderson's treatments are in dire need of aerial transportation facilitation, and I ardently desire to avail their services with the utmost celerity and amicability, devoid of any pecuniary constraints or inconvenience, courtesy of United Airlines' competitive fares; for, in my opinion, Spirit Airlines' subpar customer service and unfriendly staff leave much to be desired.

"This diminutive eatery, boasting a mere eight to ten tables, proffered an exceptional culinary experience, augmented by superlative service. Our decision to dine here was predicated upon copious accolades gleaned from the virtual sphere, and we were not disappointed. During our four-day sojourn in Montreal, this establishment proved to be the apogee of our gastronomical exploits. We began our repast with the chicken heart pate, a delectable amuse-bouche that effectively whetted our palates for the gustatory delights that were to follow. Subsequently, we indulged in the braised pork belly, a succulent, slow-cooked masterpiece that literally fell apart at the touch of our utensils. Lastly, we sampled the duck ravioli, a sublime pasta dish replete with the rich, gamey flavor of duck confit. In conclusion, we unreservedly endorse this restaurant to any individual seeking a truly memorable dining experience."

Two meticulously crafted mixed drinks. The Buffalo Wing appetizers. A visually appealing and flavorful assortment of fresh produce, including a chopped vegetable salad masterfully prepared by Puck, featuring an harmonious blend of baby arugula, shaved fennel, succulent grapes, prosciutto di Parma, and a tangy balsamic dressing, accompanied by another salad boasting housemade burrata fresh mozzarella, and a delectable combination of savory Italian sausage and black olive pizza, cooked to a golden crisp. Furthermore, the hospitable and attentive service provided by Bernard, along with a warm visit from Executive Chef Eric Klein, culminated in yet another extraordinary dining experience at Spago, much to the delight of our group of discerning patrons.

"An diminutive yet charmingly secluded lounge, ideally suited for a tranquil morning coffee, metamorphoses into an enchanting piano bar in the late hours of the evening, thereby offering a unique and divergent ambiance; regrettably, this unpretentious gem remains largely undiscovered by the masses, and let us maintain its secrecy, shall we? For those seeking respite from the customary Las Vegas spectacle and desiring a relaxed atmosphere, this unassuming venue is eminently suitable."

we drove from cornelius to charlotte to try Flying biscuit as there are so few breakfast options in Lake Norman area. Wow worth the drive. most amazing biscuits and gravy EVER (chicken gravy)- delish. Everything was good. Worth driving for a memorable meal-
Bet Thai Iced Tea and Coffee anywhere! Great food, too! We always stop in whenever we are in Vegas. Service is excellent, prices are good.

"Local Dish is unequivocally my preferred regional dining establishment, and I unwaveringly order the identical dish during each visit due to its exceptional quality and flavor, which precludes any desire to explore alternative options. Their signature Local Dish Burger is truly sublime; a flawlessly cooked patty is complemented by an assemblage of rich pimiento cheese, succulent bacon, and savory spinach, all nestled within a delectable pretzel roll. Merely contemplating this culinary masterpiece provokes an intense salivatory response! Additionally, I have sampled (courtesy of fellow patron's orders) the delectable chicken and waffles combination, the scrumptious chicken wings (according to my daughter, the most superior in town), the tantalizing Pulled Pork BBQ sandwich, and the divine cheese fondue (although augmented toast points would enhance its enjoyment). Local Dish offers an unparalleled dining experience, boasting extraordinary fresh cuisine, prompt and genial service, and a warm, inviting ambiance. My endorsement for this exceptional eatery cannot be overstated; it is an unrivaled treasure in Fort Mill, making it my top choice for dining, surpassing the need to travel to urban areas."
Love going to Peachwave! Yogurt is delicious and lots of toppings! Customer service is great. I love going and trying all the different favors!

I love burgers. Even got a list dedicated solely to my pursuit of the perfect burger.  Did Burger Bar crack my top three? Not quite but they do make one hell of a burger. I also appreciate the different 'fries' options - skinny, sweet potato, steak and onion rings. The sweet potato were good but pale in comparison to the onion rings. Oh, the onion rings. I can't wait for the SF outlet of Burger bar to open so I can get some of your crunchy goodness on a weekly basis.
Got the Marino Sandwich and Bob's Favorite.  Okay, my first time here.  Delicious.  I'll be back.  Stopped here on a whim.  Had read about it, never could find it.  It's a do over.

"This establishment offers exceptional thin crust pizzas, characterized by their crispy texture and flavorful toppings, all of which are freshly prepared and presented in an unpretentious manner, devoid of excessive oiliness. Additionally, their salads are equally impressive, showcasing a diverse array of fresh vegetables and tasteful dressings. It is worth noting that this venue tends to experience heightened popularity during Friday and Saturday evenings, rendering it advisable to consider placing an advance order for takeout, if desiring to avoid prolonged waiting periods."

How is it that one gym can possess all the greatest trainers in the known universe? I am baffled by it. The trainers that run this gym are fantastic. They are upbeat and positive, while still being genuine. In that they don't annoy the crap out of you with the normal personal trainer BS. Just that fake, inattentive, jargon that you can get out of a workout DVD.

You are being personally trained. The trainers actually take the time to learn your name. They watch you and somehow keep track of everyone in the class, your strengths and weaknesses. If you go often enough they certainly remember your level between classes. They constantly encourage your strengths so you know what you are doing right. They also remind you of what you do wrong, but in a very courteous, straight-to-the-point, non-judgmental way. I love that they aren't afraid to correct you.

You are getting personally trained at a bargain price of around $3-$7 a class. Plus they don't focus on you constantly so you don't get performance anxiety! That's why personal training doesn't work (too much attention for too short of a time... in this class you get attention in short bursts).This is the perfect workout class mostly because of the trainers. But the simple gym setup, music and atmosphere are also all perfect. I hope to get into more advanced MMA training, but I think I will always keep a membership here, due to the friendly atmosphere and endlessly challenging but fun workouts.

We indulged in our maiden visit to this esteemed establishment yesterday in the company of my maternal figure, who has had the pleasure of frequenting this venue on multiple occasions and has consistently lavished praise upon its virtues. Our experience was characterized by a trifecta of excellence, specifically:  
1. Service - The staff members we interacted with exhibited an unwavering commitment to cordiality and helpfulness, a sentiment that was echoed by the valet personnel who attended to our vehicle with utmost dedication.  
2. Facility and Grounds - The meticulous attention devoted to maintaining the cleanliness and olfactory ambiance of the premises was patently evident, a testament to the fastidious efforts of the diligent cleaning crew.  
3. Rooftop Pool - The aquatic expanse situated on the uppermost level of the building elicited unadulterated amazement, boasting a refreshing lack of chlorine-induced irritation and an unmistakable quality of water softening, rendering it an absolute delight for immersion.  
4. Overall Experience - The cumulative nature of our visit transcended mere satisfaction, evolving into a tranquil and serene escapade, thanks in no small measure to the expert ministrations of Linda, my massage therapist, whose friendly demeanor, considerate approach, and remarkable physical strength imbued the session with an unforgettable quality.

"Remarkable! We have been patronizing this establishment for over seven years and have consistently enjoyed exceptional dining experiences. My six-year-old daughter selected this venue for her birthday celebration this year, and the culinary offerings did not disappoint. We have sampled various items on the menu, including the chicken, pork belly, bulgogi, and Kalbi, and each dish was expertly prepared and presented. My former spouse, who spent time in Korea during his military service, introduced me to this restaurant, and it remains his preferred Korean dining destination in Arizona. The sushi options are also quite impressive. Richard, the proprietor, is extremely cordial, and the staff exhibits exceptional hospitality. I would highly recommend this eatery to any individual seeking a satisfying Korean or sushi meal."

So happy i found this shop. I only got a touch up but freak did an amazing job. He cleaned my pepsi logo so good. My lines were weak n broken and color was almost see through and he packed in so much color and made my out lines real crisp. I wish I went to him for the tattoo originally . I will go back for sure to get my other one touched up and to get a brand new one. The shop was clean, real professional. I've already recommended the shop to two people so far and will tell more people when I go back to work.

"I undertook a personal obligation to visit this establishment, and subsequent to my arrival, I must say that my expectations were not only met but indeed surpassed. My sibling and I opted for two separate dishes, the fish tacos and Flautas respectively, which we shared between us. It is worth noting that the Flautas were prepared to perfection, with an emphasis on the culinary technique employed in their preparation, and accompanied by an exceptional guacamole. Additionally, the rice and beans served as an excellent complement to our meals, while the fish tacos themselves were a masterclass in flavor profile management, with the freshness of the fish being particularly noteworthy. Furthermore, I must commend Frank, whose exceptional customer service and warm demeanor have secured a special place in the hearts of both myself and my family; we eagerly anticipate our next visit."

We have had the pleasure of partaking in culinary indulgences at this esteemed establishment on multiple occasions, and we must say that our dining experiences have been nothing short of satisfactory, thus leading us to harbor a marked preference for this venue over its neighboring competitor, Samurai Sam's, which, although offering a comparable array of delectable dishes, falls short in terms of both the quality of its fare and the warmth of its hospitality.

Gotta say it's one of the better chain restaurants around in the valley!

American-Italian pizzas and pastas sounds pretty simple, but Oregano's is one of those places that's a must try.  With several locations from Scottsdale, Tempe, Chandler, and even Tucson; you really don't have much reason not to go!  

This time around I ordered the Clark St. Meat pizza along with trying out my friends anti-pasto salad.  Again, simple, but tasty.  The salami, peppercini pepper, and parmesan cheese on the salad was very light and not over powering with dressing like most places.  The pizza I ordered thin crust and yes the crust was perfectly toasted and not soggy as I would expect with all the meat ingredients atop.  Tad bit of spice and no need to add more peppers to heat it up - yum!  

Overall, food was great and service is very good.  Well trained staff members, courtesy and attentive - A plus in my book! Enjoy!

"This culinary establishment proved to be rather satisfactory, particularly during the morning repast. I opted for an omelet filled with fungi and spinach, accompanied by a side of potatoes, all of which were augmented by a delectable rosemary-infused crÃ¨me fraÃ®che. The flavors were indeed tantalizing, eliciting a desire for more. My companion, however, had a differing experience with their meal, expressing that while the burger was cooked to perfection, it lacked a certain je ne sais quoi in terms of flavor. Nonetheless, the sweet potato fries accompanying the dish were a delight, their taste enhanced by the aforementioned creamy condiment."

"I have an unwavering fondness for this establishment, which has been the recipient of my patronage on multiple occasions, both for breakfast and lunch, with the latter being my preferred meal. The manager, or perhaps the proprietor, has consistently displayed a remarkable level of cordiality, benevolence, and helpfulness during my visits. On a previous occasion, when the eatery was still operating under the name 'Two Hippies,' I inquired about the availability of iced coffee, and despite its absence from the menu, the manager went above and beyond by preparing a special iced version just for me. The culinary offerings are undoubtedly delectable, and the setting's unique charm further enhances the dining experience."

"I frequent this establishment with unwavering regularity, and I must say that the culinary experience afforded by the California burrito is utterly phenomenal, bordering on the sublime. In point of fact, it is my considered opinion that this delectable dish constitutes the apogee of the menu, eclipsing all other options in terms of sheer gastronomical excellence."

"I have an unwavering fondness for this establishment, and I frequently indulge in their culinary offerings, typically once or twice a week. As an ardent devotee of Pho, I find their rendition of this delectable dish to be particularly satisfying, while my significant other is enamored with the sesame chicken. Moreover, we often partake in the pleasure of dining within the restaurant's cozy confines, which boast an intriguing array of decorative elements and furnishings that contribute to a warm and welcoming ambiance, especially during the cooler months when the outdoor seating area is particularly inviting."

If you plan on attending a Pirate game be sure to park in one of the parking garages in town and walk across the Roberto Clemente Bridge. The bridge closes to vehicle traffic on game days for pedestrians only.  A statue of Clemente is adjacent to the bridge as you enter to ballpark. The bridge has a great photo opportunity. Enjoy the game!!!

"The Sunday night prime rib special is utterly remarkable, boasting an impressive triumvirate of culinary delights that includes a fresh salad, a delectable side dish, and a scrumptious dessert. My gastronomical experience with the prime rib was nothing short of extraordinary, as the tender, juicy meat literally dissolved in my mouth, leaving a lasting impression of sheer delight. Notably, the texture of the prime rib was optimally cooked, avoiding the common pitfalls of toughness and chewiness often associated with undercooked meat. In fact, the prime rib was so exceptional that all four members of our party opted for the identical special, each pairing it with distinct sides to facilitate a convivial sharing experience. Needless to say, I wholeheartedly endorse this dining extravaganza."

I contacted four arboricultural services to solicit quotations for the removal of an enormous mesquite tree in our rear yard, and Conrad from Chip Off the Old Block arrived promptly the following day to provide his appraisal. He demonstrated great civility and advised me to ensure that each prospective contractor possessed comprehensive insurance coverage, as his firm did. His tender emerged as the most economical option, and he persistently endeavored to secure my patronage without resorting to forceful sales tactics. Thus, I consented, and within two days, his team arrived and successfully extracted the unwieldy tree within a mere three hours. I was utterly astounded by their proficiency in scaling the branches and descending substantial segments of the tree without causing damage to the multitude of vegetation surrounding the mesquite. I was thoroughly delighted with every aspect of their work, including the stump grinding process. This company exemplified consummate professionalism in all aspects, including their punctuality, as they never failed to meet appointed deadlines. Their communication during the project was exceptionally effective, constituting top-tier quality. The clean-up process was executed with immense thoroughness, leaving the area in a state of complete tidiness. I wholeheartedly endorse Chip Off the Old Block without a single reservation.

I thoroughly enjoy witnessing a few resourceful individuals assume responsibility and transform an unsightly blight into a thriving communal hub. What was once a mediocre establishment offering questionable products now serves as my go-to venue for a delectable sandwich.  
I'm gradually exploring their extensive menu and can confidently attest that both the caprese and "ham and cheese" are utterly scrumptious. The latter, in fact, consists of prosciutto and fresh mozzarella, thus the quotation marks.  
If you choose to "like" the Noda Bodega on Facebook, you'll be treated to a visual representation of their daily special, strategically designed to induce hunger (feed, hungry; clever, right?).  
Their beer collection, though limited, boasts an impressive array of artisanal and microbrews, including a couple of gluten-free options. The wine list, while modest, offers an assortment of affordable and flavorful varieties. Additionally, they stock an array of intriguing non-alcoholic beverages to complement your meal.  
As the sweltering summer months approach, I predict they'll struggle to maintain a well-stocked inventory of their delectable ice cream. Ben & Jerry's, Bryer, Snicker, and an assortment of other frozen delights will surely be in high demand.  
I'll unquestionably frequent this establishment with regularity, eager to indulge in their culinary offerings.

My husband and I visited because we have never eaten Vietnamese food before. The staff was amazing! We met the chef, had Beef Pho and Shrimp Spring Rolls, everything was delicious and fresh. We will definitely be back!

"Gourmet-quality, plant-based donuts and associated baked goods that are also budget-friendly.

The upper two tiers of the display case contain items that are devoid of both lactose and ovum, whereas the lower shelf harbors pastries fabricated with ingredients derived from animals. Payment methods accepted include cash exclusively.

To optimize the consumer experience, it would be advantageous to implement signage that facilitates the identification of the various products, or at the very least, a system of labeling that distinguishes the vegetarian options from their non-vegetarian counterparts."

"Savorous cuisine, exceptional personnel, and reasonable pricing conflate to create an unparalleled dining experience at this esteemed establishment. My recent visit afforded me the opportunity to indulge in their extensive buffet, which featured, to my delight, an authentic mango lassi draft. Such an unpretentious gem, this eatery stands out as the premier Punjabi-style Indian buffet in Arizona, ensuring my certain return."

"It is with immense pleasure that I extol the virtues of this esteemed culinary establishment, which has secured a position of unwavering reverence in my gastronomical hierarchy. My significant other and I partake in a weekly pilgrimage to this gastronomic Mecca, whereupon we indulge in an array of delectable dishes, each one more scrumptious than its predecessor. The citrus-infused chicken, reminiscent of the sun-kissed groves of Orange County, is a personal favorite, its flavorsome tenderness tantamount to a symphony of taste buds. The Hong Kong soup, a veritable melange of oriental essences, harmonizes the palate with its rich, velvety texture and delicate balance of spices. And, lest we forget the eggplant pork, a dish so divine that it defies mortal comprehension. Suffice it to say that any item on the menu, be it appetizer or entree, is guaranteed to satiate even the most discerning epicurean inclinations. The proprietors of this gastronomic wonderland, Diane (whose name I hope I have rendered appropriately) and her team, embody the very essence of hospitality, their warmth and attentiveness engendering a sense of welcome and familiarity that is nothing short of exceptional. In short, this restaurant is a paragon of culinary excellence, a true gem in a world of gastronomical mediocrity."

"Serendipitously, I chanced upon this quaint bakery nestled within a historic edifice that formerly housed a medical practice during the 1940s, which I found to be utterly captivating. The establishment boasted an array of delectable pastries, but one particular dessert piqued my interest: the Buttermilk Pie. Upon sampling a portion of this culinary masterpiece, adorned with a rich caramel sauce, I was struck by its unparalleled excellence. Thus, I opted to procure two slices for takeaway, much to the delight of my companions. It is worth noting that while purchasing an entire pie is an option, the bakery offers the convenience of buying individual slices for those who desire a more modest portion. Furthermore, I acquired some organic Peanut Butter Dog treats, devoid of artificial additives, for our canine companion, who displayed an unbridled enthusiasm for these delectable morsels by performing an impromptu tap dance. This charming bakery offers an assortment of mouthwatering cakes and other baked delights, making it a truly exceptional local venue."

"The proprietor also fulfills the roles of hostess, waitress, chef, and mixologist, which is truly remarkable in and of itself.  I opted for the most unconventional dish on the menu, specifically braised goat meat served with mashed yam and cassava foliage. Following the meal, Esther expressed amusement, stating that she had never witnessed a Caucasian individual consume their entire meal prior to my visit. 

She possesses exceptional culinary skills and is proficient in creating an assortment of potent rum-based cocktails. Although the surrounding area may appear somewhat questionable during evening hours, it is essential to embrace the experience and relish the ambiance. Observing her diligent work ethic only reinforced my appreciation for my own office employment. 

Following the meal and in the parking area, Esther remarkably asserted that I had overtipped her and attempted to return a portion of the gratuity. I insisted that she was deserving of every penny and expressed a desire to provide even more compensation considering the multitude of responsibilities she juggled. I genuinely admire her dedication and commitment to providing an authentic Caribbean dining experience. While the cuisine may be too adventurous for certain individuals, I encourage you to sample it and form your own opinion."

We arrived at this establishment due to the fact that the tofu hut was overflowing with patrons and my significant other had an intense craving for barbecued delicacies. I must admit that I was taken aback by the exceptional quality of the hospitality we received. Our server was persistently circulating around the dining area, ensuring that all tables were adequately attended to. Upon the arrival of our culinary selections, she exhibited remarkable dedication to her duties by assisting us in initiating the cooking process and periodically returning to facilitate the turning of the foodstuffs and dividing them into manageable portions. Truly outstanding service and a satisfying dining experience.

No wait time, I was in and out in 10 minutes. Price is reasonable as well, I paid $15 for standard 10 prints card. Staff was very polite and knowledgeable. I also appreciated her gentle touch when she rolled my fingers. Ample parking & super close to UNLV. I'll be back when I'm done with my nursing school.

My goodness, I have missed you.  We headed to Madison for our 1st anniversary and since we booked the hotel I was trying to get my hands on a large cooler so I could stock up on my loved and very missed items at Trader Joe's.  Thank you husbands coworker for the mighty fine cooler you provided!  

This is a particularly nice and well stocked Trader Joe's!  The parking, as everyone claims, truly is a bit of a pain in the ass - oh well, parking at the one I frequented in Chicago was a bigger pain in the ass.   The staff here is just as nice as any other TJ's, maybe a little nicer.  I was surprised by how well stocked everything was considering how busy it was and that it was a Sunday morning.   We walked out of here with $180 worth of deliciousness and we have now decided to purchase a deep freezer - well, we've been wanting to for quite some time, but this little trip and 1st time trip for my husband really helped seal the deal I think - and make a trip from good ol' Wausau every other month or so.  

My god I've missed this place.

"In the city of Pittsburgh, an establishment serving soup dumplings has commenced its soft-opening phase, and we had the privilege of partaking in their second day of luncheon service. Upon our arrival, we observed a marked improvement in organizational efficiency compared to the majority of establishments during this initial stage. Our server, though somewhat novice, exhibited a certain level of proficiency in attending to our needs, ensuring that our dining experience was largely unencumbered by any significant delays or mishaps. The quality of the edibles served was indeed impressive, particularly the soup dumplings, which boasted an optimal temperature and texture that was thoroughly satisfying. Furthermore, the hand-pulled noodle soup, augmented by the presence of wontons, proved to be exceptional, with noodles that demonstrated remarkable resilience and texture, rivalling those sampled during a recent excursion to Hong Kong. Additionally, the green onion pancake was noteworthy for its chewy consistency and a delightfully salty flavour profile that was redolent of freshly chopped scallions. Lastly, it is worth mentioning that our tea, served steaming hot, was replenished with alacrity throughout the duration of our visit, constituting a welcome departure from the customary lukewarm beverages often encountered in local eateries. In conclusion, our inaugural visit to this eatery was eminently satisfactory, and we eagerly anticipate our next opportunity to partake in their culinary offerings."

Seriously loved this place. (\"Love\", actually, since I'm still here. Great food, gluten free options, very friendly. Hope they can make a go of it. The house salad had a wonderful variety of flavorful, fresh greens. The Rigatoni Salsiccia and the Penne Genovese were great.

"This eatery boasts an enchanting ambiance, characterized by an intimate setting that seamlessly complements its exceptional culinary offerings and impressive service. Upon entering, we were greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere, further accentuated by the friendly demeanor of the staff. Our dining experience was nothing short of extraordinary, as we indulged in a delectable array of dishes, including a mouthwatering risotto starter and a flavorsome vegetable terrine, both of which showcased the chef's remarkable expertise in creating culinary masterpieces. Furthermore, the beverages we sampled were equally impressive, with a refreshing twist on the classic Pimm's Cup being a particular highlight. Notably, despite our lack of a reservation, we were graciously accommodated without any undue delay or inconvenience. Ultimately, this restaurant is a must-visit destination for those who value an intimate, relaxed setting where the emphasis is squarely placed on the quality of the cuisine."

"I opted for the convenience of having my meal delivered by RoadRunner, and I must say that their culinary offerings did not disappoint; in particular, their Japanese lasagna was a highlight, boasting an unparalleled level of flavor and texture that elevated it to a league of its own, thereby solidifying its status as my go-to dish whenever I patronize the establishment."
Hands Down.... BEST Indian food and restaurant in PHX!! Better than old Bombay Spice!!! Lamb Chops to die for! Lamb vindaloo spicy and savory and chicken masala second to none! Must Try!!!!

Extremely helpful!  My coolant was leaking out and one of the manager Edward Gomez took the time to look at my car and no doubt he found exactly where the leak is. They did not have the part and i needed to get it ASAP. He gave me information of where they might have it in stock. He went above and beyond helping me out knowing that I am not buying anything from there. I am thankful and appreciate what he did.

Stayed here in June because of the central location, price & what they offer.  Would return to stay here again during future Montreal visits. Great for couples & families (if only because of the large rooms).\n\nHad no issues whatsoever, very clean & good service whenever needed. GREAT city rooftop with lounge chairs for a summer evening. BIG rooms with fully stocked kitchen. Free WI-FI. Fitness centre small (2 treadmills, couple of bikes, small weight room) but does the job. Indoor pool was smallish & usually full with kids. Complimentary continental breakfast spread was pretty decent (fruit, oatmeal, toast, bagels, etc). For a better breakfast, Eggspectations is a 10 minute or less walk away on St Catherine Street. Don't miss the Italian restaurant a few doors down, fantastic pizza!

Bday eat fest continued....boy, where to begin;  how about the \"nom nom wings\".  O.M.G!!  They absolutely were the BOMB!  They tasted like cocheechong (you Koreans know what time it is when it come to that flavor, out of sight!!).  Then my wife took a bite of her Kalbi burger and her eyes rolled to the back of head; I thought oh know (wink wink) but I knew we had a winner, but wasn't expecting this\" \"this is the BEST burger I've ever had\". I took a bite and cried a little I think cause it was sooo good\"!  If you've not been you've got to try this joint!!

A must stop for spring training fans. Always make it a point to come here on our yearly trip.  They're known for their ribs but i havent had anything on the menu i didt like. Love the ambiance with all the sports memorabilia everywhere.

I was directed to this establishment by my running cohort, and my initial presumption was that it resembled any typical retail outlet; however, upon entering the premises, I was swiftly disabused of such notion due to the exceptional quality of their hospitality, which encompassed an attentive demeanor and a keen interest in addressing my concerns regarding my feet. Previously, I had experienced numerous difficulties with blisters, but the staff at this store exhibited unwavering dedication in proffering solutions and experimenting with diverse methods to alleviate my discomfort. Specifically, Joe, Flash, and Karen displayed remarkable helpfulness, and I unhesitatingly endorse this store for anyone seeking running or walking necessities.

All I know is. The Hubs and I were hungry so I yelped a burger joint in PHX. I was all Bae this place has 254 reviews .. Let's go there ! We were in PHX from Prescott for the day. Got the Teriyaki Burger Rocket size and fries ! delishioursh ! Hit The Spot ! The owner even chased us to the parking lot to make sure we enjoyed our Food  Yay!!!!!

Great school. ASU truly strives to be a world-class university, and they are really serious about being a leader in \"the technology of tomorrow,\" especially in biotechnology. While not strictly a tech school, I wouldn't be surprised if ASU was directly involved in the transhumanism movement that is already upon us.

"The culinary server proffered her hospitable demeanor, which was greatly appreciated amidst the eerie tranquility permeating the newly established eatery, nestled within the rear sector of the parking complex. Promptly, the comestibles arrived, their diminutive proportions serving as a caveat to prospective patrons contemplating an order. Furthermore, it is advisable to exercise caution when requesting piquant fare, as the fiery essence may prove overwhelming. Personally, I opted for the poultry-based curry, accompanied by garlic-infused naan and a trio of savory samosas, the latter of which proved to be the epicurean highlight of my repast."

Keeping this short but (hopefully) sweet. The best show I've seen in Vegas - and I've been to many. This is more musical tribute than true Cirque experience as it's not as over the top in tumbling, acrobatics etc but it more than makes up for it in sheer nostalgia and entertainment value. 

You don't have to be an ardent MJ fan to love this show. In fact, I'm inclined to believe that the more marginal the fan, the more overwhelming the show is. You simply forget the sheer number of hits he had. The catalog is astounding. 

One tip, don't sit in the front, sit toward the back middle or better, row AA of section 2. So much going on all over you won't have to strain your neck turning around.

Simply amazing.

Still retaining an unwavering affection for this establishment, I must say that nothing has altered in terms of its inherent appeal. My infatuation with their Hefewiezen has reached an unprecedented level, particularly during the sweltering summer months. Notwithstanding my reluctance to indulge in a Kiltlifter for an extended period, I must admit that their menu has evolved into one of my most cherished bar menus within the entire region. Consistently offering delectable, high-quality culinary delights that cater to the gastronomical inclinations of any beer enthusiast, Four Peaks has truly outdone themselves. So enamored am I with their Hefewiezen and Carne Asada, that I opted to incorporate them into the menu for my nuptials. Although I facetiously allude to having served their Hefewiezen at my wedding, I assure you that it was not a possibility due to the unavailability of small kegs. However, we did manage to include their scrumptious Carne Asada (albeit without the accompanying tortillas, much to my chagrin) and the guests were effusive in their praise throughout the evening. Kudos to Four Peaks for their exceptional offerings!

"There exists no negative aspects pertaining to this establishment. The culinary offerings are utterly delectable! The visual presentation of the dishes is so aesthetically pleasing that it almost seems a shame to consume them. The hospitality demonstrated by the staff is truly exceptional! The ambiance of the venue is thoroughly enjoyable! Furthermore, the pricing for the superior quality provided is remarkably reasonable. This hidden treasure has become my preferred destination when entertaining acquaintances for a casual morning repast. On a recent visit, we opted to sample two breakfast burritos, one of which was customized with the addition of chorizo - an absolute delight! Whilst awaiting the arrival of our fare, we were presented with a complementary serving of chipotle popcorn to savor. As we were nearing the conclusion of our crepes, the attentive server emerged, bearing a platter of rose marshmallows accompanied by a torch. He subsequently proceeded to roast the marshmallows directly before our eyes, imparting a profound sense of theater to the experience. Upon completion, he cordially expressed, 'It's on the house. Enjoy, gentlemen!' Additionally, upon checking in via Yelp, I was gratified to receive my refreshing lemongrass tea at no additional cost. It is my second visit to this establishment, and each subsequent encounter only serves to enhance my already favorable impression."

"It was a Friday afternoon during lunchtime when we arrived at the establishment, and much to our surprise, it was teeming with clientele. Following a brief wait for a spot at the bar, we quickly realized that we were among the few patrons who weren't regulars. The atmosphere was reminiscent of the iconic television show 'Cheers,' where the staff was familiar with their customers' preferences before they even took their seats. Before long, we felt like part of the family. We placed an order for frites, and while my companion opted for the V burger, I decided on the Avocado BLT. To accompany our meals, we also indulged in several beers, including peche lambic and a variety of other options for my partner. Upon the arrival of our culinary creations, the bartender recalled that my companion had requested his burger be cooked to a medium doneness. However, upon inspection, it appeared that the burger was more well-done than medium. The bartender promptly offered to return the dish, but my companion graciously declined and chose to consume it regardless. The bartender then proceeded to the window to instruct the kitchen staff to ensure they monitored their product quality. In conclusion, what more could one desire in a dining experience? Belgian taps, an exceptional dry-aged burger crafted with Nueske bacon and organic greens, all of which were generously provided by Brasserie V. Our gratitude extends to the establishment for such a pleasurable visit."

I love Mac's!  I am there every Wednesday night for bike night with the other 100+ bikers!  Very fun environment, it is noisy but with as many fans are trying to pack into the place it is understandable.  The BBQ is great, the beer selection is unheard of, and the mac and cheese is to die for!  Nothing like hearing a big burly biker order a side of mac and cheese! ;)\n\n5 stars!!!!

"It would be inaccurate to express any dissatisfaction with Aloha Specialties, as they proffer delectable Hawaiian cuisine at reasonable price points, albeit in copious quantities that may require an extended waiting period during peak hours. Despite the lengthy queue, the staff maintains an efficient pace, ensuring a prompt receipt of orders. Although the eatery only accepts cash payments, the abundance of nearby ATMs mitigates any inconvenience. While some menu items may elicit skepticism due to their unconventional preparation methods, such as the briefly deep-fried saimin or excessively shoyu-drenched poke, I prefer to adhere to familiar options, specifically the Teri cheeseburger and a diminutive serving of saimin. This combination satisfies my craving for a taste similar to that of Washington Saimin, which regrettably shut down in Honolulu."

"The culinary offerings at this establishment are not only salubrious and satiating, but also cater to an array of dietary preferences and restrictions, including veganism and vegetarianism, with an added provision for gluten-free options. Furthermore, the proprietor takes great pride in showcasing innovative, plant-based interpretations of classic sandwiches, such as the Melvin, which serves as a suitable alternative to the traditional Reuben. Additionally, the owner makes a concerted effort to engage with patrons, extending a warm welcome and offering generous samples of novel menu items. Despite the bustling atmosphere, the staff maintains a cheerful demeanor, readily addressing any questions, concerns or requests that may arise."

"Dr. Crow possesses exceptional proficiency in his field; my apprehension was palpable, as I was experiencing considerable discomfort. Despite my attempts to tolerate the pain, it proved unyielding; thus, I sought divine intervention through prayer. Moreover, I experimented with a home remedy involving warm water and salt, but alas, it failed to alleviate my distress. Consequently, I required a root canal, which filled me with trepidation. My anxiety was evident, as I was observed to be perspiring copiously."
"I must confess that during the procedure, I did not experience any significant discomfort. Indeed, Dr. Crow's demeanor was pleasant, and his ability to connect with patients was impressive. His sense of humor, though somewhat corny, served to mitigate my unease. Presently, I find myself awaiting my turn in the waiting room, accompanied by my offspring. It is amusing to surmise that my son, Erhart, may be harboring thoughts of incredulity."

Excellent people to do business with. We were referred to them from another Boulder City business and they did everything they said they would!  We needed work on a boat trailer and they were very helpful and knew what they were talking about, which can be rare these days. Would have no problem going back to them.

"Several years ago, I relocated to a dwelling that had yet to feature a functioning shower facility, thereby presenting me with a formidable predicament. Either I could visit my mother's abode daily for the purpose of personal hygiene maintenance or gradually become increasingly unkempt and resemble a vagrant, awaiting the eventual arrival of our unreliable plumber who appeared to be under the influence of controlled substances. Happily, Poundstretcher offered a solution for the nominal fee of three pounds sterling. A showerhead capable of attachment to the bathtub faucet, touted as possessing greater potency than its electrically powered counterpart, according to the packaging. Thus, visions of an invigorating cleansing experience flooded my mind, potentially rendering the services of the aforementioned plumber unnecessary. However, this was not meant to be, as the connector frequently dislodged from the tap, resulting in a pressure level analogous to the rate at which liquid flows down one's grandfather's leg following his third glass of sherry during the Yuletide season. In effect, I was attempting to cleanse myself utilizing a leaky faucet. Notwithstanding the brevity of my elation upon mistakenly assuming that a minimal expenditure had effectively addressed all my existential difficulties, I shall perpetually cherish Poundie's, purveyors of inconsequential and valueless merchandise."

Where do I initiate this recount of my culinary odyssey? It was an unforgettable experience, replete with gastronomical delights that left me in a state of epicurean bliss. Among the dishes that earned my unequivocal endorsement were the delectable hot crab legs, accompanied by a savory clam chowder embellished with bacon. Furthermore, the scallops cooked to perfection and presented in their shells, complemented by a flavorful spinach and Panko crumb mixture, were nothing short of exquisite. My palate was further indulged by the sumptuous Alaskan cod, skillfully prepared and served atop a bed of velvety mashed potatoes.  

My gastronomic exploration continued with a delightful mushroom ricotta pizza, its flavors harmoniously balanced and expertly crafted. Additionally, the polenta, enriched with tender beef cheek and a generous portion of mushrooms, was a culinary masterpiece. The cream cheese wontons, with their delicate texture and rich filling, were yet another highlight of this extraordinary dining adventure. 

Moreover, the sushi selection boasted an impressive array of fresh, high-quality ingredients, artfully arranged and presented in classic rolls. The Mexican-style corn, adorned with a tantalizing combination of mayonnaise, chili, and butter, was a welcome departure from the usual fare. Although I was compelled to pause and reserve some space for the impending dessert extravaganza, my curiosity was piqued by the prospect of sampling the stuffed baked potato and Mac n cheese.  

The grand finale of my dining experience was, without a doubt, the assortment of captivating desserts. The crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e, with its perfectly caramelized sugar crust and velvety custard center, was nothing short of sublime. Furthermore, the made-to-order crepes, which I lavishly topped with bananas, caramel sauce, Nutella, and whipped cream, were an unmitigated delight. Lastly, the flan, with its silky texture and delicate sweetness, brought the evening's gastronomic journey to a satisfying conclusion. 

It would be remiss of me not to mention the enthralling ambiance that permeated the establishment, fostering an atmosphere of elegance and refinement that complemented the exquisite cuisine.

Mix is actually a restaurant that turns into a lounge/ club at 10pm. It's located on the top floor of TheHotel at Mandalay Bay. Since it's basically a roof top bar/restaurant the view is amazing. You have the option to either sit in our outside on huge comfy couches while taking in the view. The drinks are strong and delicious. They start off around $16 a piece. Try the Violet. The decor is sophisticated and trendy. The music is the latest and the club is always packed. Mix is a definite must see.

"Taco Bell possesses an unparalleled level of excellence, with their smothered burrito representing the epitome of culinary mastery and available for a mere $3 for a beef variant. I customarily opt for an additional chipotle sauce component in my burrito, which, when combined with the generous serving size, satiates my hunger thoroughly. The restaurant's menu exhibits a praiseworthy penchant for variety, with periodic changes that prevent monotony and maintain a heightened sense of excitement among patrons. Furthermore, the establishment's considerate staff often inquires about my preference for sauce during the drive-thru process, a thoughtful gesture that sets them apart from their contemporaries. Another notable aspect of Taco Bell's offerings is their exceptional beverage selection, specifically the Mt Dew Baja Blast, which stands as a paragon of its kind and rivaled only by the equally impressive Mt Dew AM (a symbiotic blend of orange juice and Mt Dew). My fondness for this establishment extends beyond their reasonable prices and superior quality, as I derive immense satisfaction from dining here at least once a week."

"The proprietor, Mr. Kim, possesses exceptional proficiency in rectifying an array of mobile device malfunctions, thereby rendering his services truly remarkable and unparalleled. His adeptness and efficiency are exemplified by the expedited completion of tasks, ensuring a brief duration of downtime for clients' devices. Furthermore, his prices are unmatched within the Las Vegas region, making them the most economical option for individuals seeking top-notch repair services. As a resident of Los Angeles, I unequivocally endorse Mr. Kim's enterprise, Premier Telecom, as my optimal preference for mobile device maintenance, even when situated in Las Vegas. My unwavering admiration for Mr. Kim's expertise and dedication to his craft is underscored by my unreserved declaration of affection towards him."

I have been an ardent cinemaphile for approximately fifteen years, during which time I have consistently demonstrated a profound aversion to sitting for extended periods of time in those minuscule, uncomfortable seats that are typically found in traditional movie theaters. Upon learning about the advent of the Galaxy Theater, I was utterly enthused! The concept itself was nothing short of revolutionary.

I have had the privilege of visiting this esteemed establishment on multiple occasions, and each time, I have been thoroughly impressed by the exceptional quality of the amenities provided. The chairs, in particular, are a marvel of modern engineering, boasting ample proportions, superior comfort, and even a diminutive mobile tray for the convenience of consuming food and beverages.
