It is worth mentioning that the theater offers alcoholic beverages, although I must confess that I am not particularly fond of them. Nevertheless, my companions seem to derive immense pleasure from indulging in a cold beer or two while enjoying the cinematic experience.

On a recent Saturday, my spouse and I accompanied our family to witness the cinematic masterpiece known as Captain America. Unfortunately, I had not had the opportunity to partake in dinner prior to the screening, so I opted to sample some of the delectable offerings available at the concession stand. While the cost of my meal ($19) could be considered somewhat prohibitive, I must admit that the culinary delight that I received was well worth the expenditure. The bratwurst, in particular, was a veritable gastronomic revelation, with four distinct varieties to choose from (cheese jalapeÃ±o, brat, beef dog, and another option that escapes my memory), all of which were adorned with an assortment of genuine toppings, including sauerkraut, lettuce, cheese, and a pickle, among others. To say that I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the bratwurst would be an understatement.

In conclusion, I must reiterate that the Galaxy Theater has consistently delivered an exceptional experience on each and every occasion that I have had the privilege of visiting. Furthermore, I feel compelled to divulge that presenting one's ticket stub at the adjacent yogurt shop will result in a modest discount, a fact that may prove advantageous to those who seek to augment their cinematic excursion with a frozen treat.

"Dr. Scafidi is a remarkably skilled chiropractor, and my recent visit two weeks ago served as a testament to his proficiency. As an individual who has sought the services of numerous chiropractors throughout my life, I possess the ability to discern between practitioners who exhibit a thorough comprehension of their craft and those who do not. My scoliosis, which significantly impacts my overall physiology, requires a nuanced approach to effectively address its various repercussions. Dr. Scafidi demonstrated a keen understanding of the complex implications associated with this condition. Following his adjustments, tissue work, and pressure point therapy, I experienced a notable reduction in migraines and general discomfort. Additionally, I observed a significant improvement in my sleep quality, enjoying longer periods of restful slumber each night compared to the mere four or five hours I had grown accustomed to prior to his treatment. It appears that the alleviation of my diverse aches and pains has contributed to my improved nocturnal recuperation. Consequently, I intend to continue seeking Dr. Scafidi's expertise, as his services have yielded tangible benefits for my well-being."

During my journey to Moab in my off-road jeep, I encountered a substantial steering dysfunction, which prompted me to seek assistance at Kincade's, whereupon TJ, the proprietor, accommodated me without delay and rectified the issue. Additionally, Randy, a skilled technician employed by Kincade's, performed a comprehensive lubrication of all the grease fittings on my extensively customized vehicle, including a few fittings that necessitated the removal of the rear drive shaft, thereby averting a potential mechanical breakdown during my rock crawling excursion. It is worth mentioning that the staff at Kincade's not only demonstrated exceptional proficiency in their craft but also exhibited remarkable courtesy and hospitality, further enhanced by the well-maintained and organized state of their office and shop facilities. If I were a resident of Phoenix, I would unhesitatingly entrust all my vehicles to Kincade's for any necessary maintenance and repair work, and I extend my sincere gratitude to both TJ and Randy for their exceptional service.

"Consistently exceptional culinary offerings complemented by an extensive and diverse beverage selection, particularly in regards to beer, which boasts an impressive array of options that cater to discerning tastes and preferences, thus ensuring a satisfying dining experience for patrons."

"My sentiments regarding this establishment are utterly euphoric! It vastly surpasses the culinary experience offered by Lotus of Siam, with its delectable pad thai and tom yum dishes being of unparalleled quality. Furthermore, the extensive array of plant-based options catering to both vegans and vegetarians is truly impressive. The service we received was remarkably efficient, warm, and personable, with the staff demonstrating an exceptional level of attentiveness and recall, even recognizing a friend who had not visited since January! Unquestionably, this Thai eatery reigns supreme in Las Vegas."

Just so happened to be in the 'hood on Sunday afternoon, dropping my  oldest daughter off at a friend's house. 

Well, well, well, there's Poliberto's, and I have my partner in crime with me, my baby, closer to 11 now than 10 !  Here's my chance- I rarely order fries for myself unless I have "someone" to share them with.  Let's pull on in, shall we, for, ummm... dinner ruining snack?  Early dinner?  You decide, but we're gettin' some Carne Asada fries today!

O.M.G.

And my friends, I have moved my rating up to a 5.

My daughter opened them in the car.  We picked at them a little.  We liked.  

At the base of this massive mound of food are fries, cooked 'til crunchy.  They are seasoned well.  They are topped with a big ol' pile of cheese and massive quantities of carne asada.  Adding to the party, they are doused with sour cream and guacamole.  

She found the forks.  We picked at them some more.  We joked about not having any when we got home.  We talked about going back for another container.

I'd say we killed about 1/3 of these evil morsels by the time we got home.

This place is so good!

Everything we got was sooo fresh tasting and well-seasoned that I am day dreaming about eating the leftovers for lunch right now!

We started with the spring rolls and wonton egg drop soup, both of which were delightful!  For the main dishes we got basil tofu, Singapore noodles and eggplant tofu. I was really impressed by all, but especially the Singapore noodles, which were not greasy or dry and expertly seasoned. The shrimp in them were not over cooked or rubbery at all. 

So surprised by the quality of the food from a Chinese takeout/delivery place!

"This culinary establishment undoubtedly ranks among my most cherished dining venues within the Las Vegas metropolitan area. Whenever I have the pleasure of hosting guests, I invariably recommend that they incorporate a visit to this restaurant into their itinerary. In fact, we had the privilege of partaking in their delectable offerings just this past weekend, indulging in an array of dishes including the succulent stuffed dates, the richly flavored Machengo mac and cheese, the fresh and tangy ceviche, two orders of the savory sliders, the tender chicken skewers, and the briny mussels. Additionally, we quenched our thirst with a pitcher of refreshing Sangria, complementing our meal with a variety of other sweet treats such as the heavenly banana-nutella sandwiches, the decadent chocolate bread pudding, and the delightful lemon berry tarts. Every single individual in our party thoroughly enjoyed each and every dish, leaving us all utterly satiated. I assure you, my dear reader, that my enthusiasm for this eatery is not in the least bit exaggerated or misleading; my gastronomical expertise is unparalleled, and my opinions are always genuine and reliable."

My workplace has recently relocated to Tivoli Village, thereby affording me the opportunity to partake in culinary indulgences at this establishment on three separate occasions within the past week. Each experience has been thoroughly enjoyable, with the fare being of exceptional quality and my spouse expressing immense satisfaction with the affordable beverages available on tap following a prolonged period of physical exertion associated with the move.  
 We have sampled their chicken club pizza on multiple occasions, and it has consistently met our expectations, boasting an abundance of fresh toppings and a cooking method that has resulted in a crispy crust complemented by a flavorsome sauce. 
 In addition, we have attempted their white pizza, which, although palatable, could potentially benefit from an increased quantity of garlic, according to my personal taste preferences; however, this may merely be a subjective observation. 
 Furthermore, we have shared orders of chicken fingers and garlic parmesan chips during a midday meal, and both dishes have proven to be delectable options. The chicken fingers possess a satisfying crunch on the exterior, while maintaining tenderness and juiciness within, accompanied by a flavorsome batter and a dipping sauce made from honey mustard that has been well-received. The garlic chips, though slightly greasy due to their novel preparation, have delighted our taste buds with their sublime texture and rich flavor. 
 The pricing policy of this eatery has been reasonable, as the portions have been generous, leaving both my companion and myself feeling satiated, and the total cost, inclusive of gratuity, has yet to surpass $25. 
 Given my new workplace location, I predict that this venue will become a regular destination for my future luncheons.

I like the fresh and easy near me, well kinda near me on Dysart.\nBut after telling a few folks about the place they say they do not find it. So as I was driving bye today, I can see why. The sign is so small and from the street not really noticable. This is too bad.

The Art of Detail Auto Spa is incredible!!! Everyone on staff is knowledgeable and incredibly detailed in everything that they do. Art and his crew are out of the ordinary because they like to have fun. When these guys show up they handle their business and have fun the whole time. I highly recommend this business to anyone and everyone I know!

I recently had the privilege of visiting Las Vegas for the first time, and after five decades of being brought up in an Irish Catholic family in New England, I had the absolute pleasure of indulging in the most delectable Irish cuisine I've ever had the pleasure of consuming. However, what truly set this dining establishment apart from others was the exceptional quality of the service provided by the staff, which was undoubtedly the friendliest and most hospitable that we encountered throughout our stay in the city. So much so, that we felt compelled to return for a second evening of feasting, such was our immense satisfaction with the culinary delights offered by this esteemed eatery. As a matter of fact, the staff's warmth and welcoming nature filled me with a profound sense of pride in my cultural heritage. Furthermore, the corned beef and cabbage, as well as the fish and chips, were nothing short of spectacular, boasting flavors that were simply unparalleled. In light of our unfortunate experiences at two other restaurants, where we were disappointed by either subpar service or unimpressive fare at exorbitant prices, discovering this hidden gem was truly a blessing in disguise. Thus, I would enthusiastically endorse and recommend this particular establishment, as well as any other similar establishments situated on the eastern coast, particularly those in Maine and New Hampshire, to anyone seeking a genuinely delightful dining experience. My sincere gratitude extends to the management and staff of this exceptional restaurant for providing us with such a shining beacon of excellence amidst a city renowned for its bright lights and bustling atmosphere.

"In the event that ambiance is a factor in your culinary pursuits, it may be advisable to seek alternative dining establishments, as our experience during a recent Saturday evening visit proved less than satisfactory in terms of occupancy. However, upon perusing the menu, it became apparent that our primary focus should have been the delectable Chicken Tikka Masala, which surpassed all expectations and rendered any reservations regarding the accompanying Naan bread's slight aridity inconsequential. Consequently, we shall refrain from exploring other options for Indian cuisine in the future."
This place is one of my favorites. Everything is always so fresh and their soups in a bread bowl are to die for. The staff is always friendly and fast. They also deliver and do catering.
the rocking chairs in the middle is pretty neat. very southern... only airport/place in the tri-state area that has jamba juice.\n\nfree wifi if I remember correctly...

We consume midday repasts at this establishment with a minimum frequency of once per week, as it consistently boasts an atmosphere of frenetic animation, which can be attributed to the delectability of their culinary offerings. It is our recommendation that you partake in a shared dining experience with a companion, selecting a deluxe calzone and a spicy chicken salad for division between the two of you. Patrons have expressed unanimous approbation for the pizza muffins, which are indeed of exceptional quality. It is worth noting that we are unaware of any individual who has sampled their fare and been disappointed, and furthermore, the prices are eminently reasonable.

I am reluctant to compose this assessment due to the possibility of it becoming congested within the facility, and let's be realistic, who desires to endure a delay when they are feeling unwell? This urgent care center has become my primary healthcare provider since it is staffed by experienced emergency room physicians, and patients are not subjected to the customary "physician's assistant" approach. In actuality, during my initial visit on Labor Day in 2010, the doctor on duty dispatched me to the emergency room and accurately diagnosed me following a month of incorrect diagnoses by my current leading medical professional. Yesterday, I sought medical attention at this establishment as I was experiencing a common cold (which was insignificant) and an inner ear infection (a significant concern since I work as a flight attendant and must travel, which is strictly prohibited while suffering from an ear infection). Despite the prolonged wait time of approximately an hour and a half, once I was admitted to see the physician, the examination lasted merely 15 minutes, and I was able to leave the premises quickly. This medical facility maintains exceptional cleanliness, organization, and professionalism, and every staff member is incredibly friendly and courteous. I highly advocate for this location; it is advisable to make advance reservations if you are worried about the waiting period. Additionally, please remember to cover your mouth when you cough and protect your nose when you sneeze for the sake of good hygiene practices.

I love this place.  Best Thai restaurant in Phoenix....even better than the Thai I have had since moving to the Bay Area a few years ago.  When we come back to the Valley...a trip to Siamese Kitchen is a must.

I used to work close by and would eat lunch there frequently.  My wife would drive across town...I think she was more into the food than hanging out with me.  The food was always fresh, delicious and incredibly flavorful.  

The prices are great, the quality is great and the two ladies who run the place are great.

"An extensive array of options, a warm and welcoming team, and an culinary experience that is truly exceptional! It would be remiss of me not to enthusiastically endorse this establishment. I implore you to pay a visit to this venue and sample their delectable fare for yourself. Additionally, for your convenience, Carnegie Coffee also offers their signature donuts, obviating the need for a trek to Crafton should you be unable to partake in the full gastronomic journey."

"This family-owned minuscule concatenation of pizza restaurants is my preferred destination in Arizona for obtaining a pie. Although I have yet to explore Pizza Bianchi, I have been informed that there is a protracted waiting period of approximately one and a half hours, which renders it somewhat impractical for me to visit, given the sweltering temperatures in Phoenix. However, I have had the pleasure of dining at Grimaldi's, which offered a satisfactory culinary experience. In contrast, Nellos serves extravagant pizza, boasting an in-house production of their own sausage, adhering to the traditional Chicago style. Additionally, they offer Sicilian-style pizza, but I tend to favor the thin crust variety. Their salads are also quite generous and delectable. The ambiance at Nellos appears conducive to watching a sporting event or enjoying a pint, with an array of excellent beers available on tap. Furthermore, the presence of a local artist among the ownership group ensures a visually engaging environment, even during the absence of a Diamondbacks game. The Gilbert restaurant's atmosphere is particularly appealing to me, with its spacious outdoor patio being an ideal setting. However, the artist/owner operates the Scottsdale location."

"I have had the pleasure of partaking in the delectable cuisine offered by Basil during the midday hours on multiple occasions, with each visit showcasing an array of flavors that never fail to impress. The basil rolls, in particular, are a personal favorite of mine, possessing a certain je ne sais quoi that sets them apart from others of their kind. When in the mood for noodles, I find myself gravitating towards the Pad Kee Mow, Pad Thai, and Pad Woon See, all of which are expertly prepared and presented with a level of finesse that is truly commendable. However, it is the Pad Prik that truly steals the show, with its rich, velvety red curry sauce that is simply divine and not to be missed by those who appreciate the nuances of well-crafted curry dishes. In short, Basil offers an unparalleled Thai culinary experience in Charlotte, one that I highly recommend to anyone seeking a taste of authenticity and excellence."

"Amorous inclinations towards an array of melancholic tastes, coupled with the singular nature of this establishment as the sole purveyor of Harry Potter confectionaries and butterbeer within the township, precipitates our repeated visits to this delightful emporium. My romantic partner, in particular, takes great pleasure in the verdant hue of Green River soda, thus ensuring our future patronage. The shop's cordial staff and the implementation of a punch card system, offering discounts for frequent customers, further enhance the appeal of this unique gift shop and its extraordinary inventory of items, suitable for a diversity of celebratory occasions and generous gestures."

"Prodigious excursion precipitated prolonged queues on occasion, yet the culinary indulgence awaiting patrons at the end of this tenuous journey rendered such inconvenience utterly negligible. The simplicity of the menu further contributed to an unencumbered dining experience for those who relished the opportunity to partake in the delectable offerings of this esteemed establishment."

"We have had the pleasure of visiting this establishment for the first time today, and we must say that our initial impression has been overwhelmingly positive. The proprietor greeted us with great warmth and hospitality upon our arrival, and his assistance throughout the check-in process was indeed appreciated. The premises are remarkably well-maintained, with a fastidious attention to detail that is readily apparent in every aspect of the facility. Our four-year-old daughter has been thoroughly entertained since our arrival shortly after the 9:30 am opening time, and her continued enjoyment is a testament to the diverse array of activities and playthings available to children of various ages. It is gratifying to observe that the venue has attracted a diverse clientele, including mothers, fathers, and childcare professionals, all of whom seem to be enjoying the experience alongside their little ones. The abundance of toys, costumes, ride-on vehicles, and other play materials has created a veritable wonderland for young minds to explore and discover. We are unquestionably delighted to have discovered this gem of a destination for our beloved offspring."

Chicken and Waffles:

Chicken is brined for 3 days, then pan-seared and finally roasted for 8 hours before being served with a light tangy mushroom/vegetable sauce next to 4 quarter waffles infused with bacon and chives with optional vanilla bean whipped butter and a sweet honey syrup.

I would eat here again.

"My affection towards Hyvee knows no bounds, as it has been a transformative addition to the East Side; their commitment to providing wholesome victuals and exceptional customer service has fostered a profound sense of appreciation within me. As a vegetarian, I find their assortment of nutritious edibles and frozen delights particularly impressive, not to mention their diverse selection of juices and smoothies. Moreover, I am delighted by their carrying of my preferred fig and walnut yogurt, conveniently located within the healthy section of the store. Lastly, I must commend them on their judicious pricing of wine, which frequently falls under the category of 'on sale'."

I have partaken in the culinary delights offered by this establishment on two separate occasions, and I can unequivocally state that I will most certainly return for further indulgence in their delectable pizzas.  The packaging and presentation of the food are ingenious and evoke a sense of novelty, while the freshness of the ingredients is readily apparent in each bite.  It is a testament to the dedication of the staff that they take great care in ensuring that every patron leaves satisfied, as their commitment to excellence in service and quality of product is palpable.  Furthermore, the provision of gluten-free options earns my wholehearted approval, even though I have yet to sample them personally.  My experiences with the New Yorker pizza have been nothing short of delightful, and the accompanying garlic knots have elicited a visceral response of pleasure.  The generosity of the portion size has afforded me multiple meals, which has been a welcome surprise, and the flavors have remained vibrant even when consumed at room temperature.  While I have yet to explore their ice cream cups, I eagerly anticipate doing so in the near future, accompanied by a friend whom I shall invite to partake in the joyous experience that is this restaurant.  In conclusion, I implore you to pay this establishment a visit, as the staff's warmth, courtesy, extraversion, helpfulness, and general amiability are certain to leave a lasting impression.  Indeed, the mantra "live long and prosper" is particularly applicable in this context.

Two Hispanic artisans devoted three days to meticulously applying diverse hues throughout my domicile, exhibiting exceptional preparation and unwavering proficiency in every aspect of their work! I wholeheartedly endorse them in every respect! Their reasonable pricing for flawless execution makes them eminently commendable.

"As a novice to the locality, I opted for this establishment based on the favorable feedback proffered by previous patrons. The tariff was remarkably reasonable, which rendered it an even more appealing option. My automobile presented with a rather conspicuous scratch, which was efficiently rectified within a span of two days. Additionally, the exterior and interior of my vehicle were thoroughly cleansed, sans any supplementary cost. The staff members exhibited a warm and welcoming demeanor, extending their services to include complimentary transportation to and from the facility during the duration of the repairs. I shall unquestionably revisit this establishment in the future."

"Oh Royal, how I adore this establishment! Its positioning is utterly flawless, situated mere steps from the light rail and en route to the academic hub. The accessibility is unparalleled, and the expansive outdoor terrace will prove to be an idyllic setting during these crisp autumnal mornings. The coffee served herein is of the finest quality, expertly crafted by the affable baristas who exhibit unwavering dedication to their craft. The ambiance of this venue aligns seamlessly with my personal preferences; the harmonious blend of industrial and rural elements fosters a uniquely welcoming atmosphere. Whether seeking a tranquil refuge to immerse oneself in literary pursuits or a productive haven to accomplish work-related endeavors, Royal unquestionably offers an unrivaled experience that is sure to satisfy even the most discerning patron."

"Oh my goodness, this culinary establishment is truly a gastronomical paradise on earth! Upon dining here, I felt as though I was featured in an episode of 'Good Eats' or a special on the Food Network, due to the creative fusion of flavors presented on the extensive menu options. The combination of ingredients on the 'fatty' menu induced a state of nostalgia, while simultaneously overwhelming my senses in the most delightful manner imaginable! It was as if my taste buds had undergone a metaphorical explosion! Furthermore, the'skinny' menu offered an equally delectable experience, making me feel as though I was indulging in a guilt-free culinary escapade, despite the fact that I wasn't. 

The ambiance of this eatery is utterly captivating, and the staff members were incredibly cordial and accommodating. They even possessed an array of healthy selections suitable for my two-year-old child, who suffers from unfortunate dairy and gluten allergies. In conclusion, I was thoroughly impressed by the exceptional quality of this restaurant. 

I would highly recommend the mouthwatering chicken and waffles dish from the 'fatty' menu, as well as the savory chick with mango salsa and basil yogurt dip from the'skinny' selection. However, it is important to note that each item on the menu has the potential to satisfy your cravings and leave you feeling content. 

The most appealing aspect of this dining establishment is its ability to cater to a diverse range of tastes and dietary preferences. The spacious outdoor patio area was also noteworthy, providing a comfortable setting for al fresco dining and even welcoming furry friends. Without a doubt, I shall return to this culinary haven with my companions."

"I am thoroughly enamored with this establishment! During our previous residency in the northwestern sector of town, we had the pleasure of frequenting this venue on a consistent basis. Their Almond Milk Tea, augmented with boba, constitutes one of the most delectable beverages I have had the privilege of consuming! Unfortunately, due to our recent relocation to the southwestern quadrant of town, we find ourselves in a state of profound longing for this esteemed purveyor of refreshments, as no comparable alternatives exist in the vicinity. Whenever my fiancÃ© engages in a round of golf at Painted Desert, I entreat him to procure tea from this location for me. It would be enormously gratifying if they were to consider inaugurating an additional branch in the near future, preferably in the Henderson area, to cater to the needs of patrons such as myself who are currently deprived of their exceptional offerings."

"Gourmet burgers, fabricated in a culinary paradise, are augmented with an unconventional ingredient, cheese curds, a novelty that has yet to gain widespread recognition beyond the borders of Wisconsin, but their creamy texture and subtle tanginess complement the rich flavors of the beef patty, while onion rings, thinly sliced and crisped to perfection, serve as a tantalizing accompaniment, prompting an unapologetic display of gluttony that defies conventional dining etiquette."

If you crave an exceptional haircut and a flawless coloration, then it is imperative that you request the services of Michael, an accomplished stylist who possesses an unparalleled proficiency in his craft. Bear in mind that procuring a satisfactory coiffure can be a tedious and arduous process, particularly for individuals with hectic schedules or parental responsibilities. However, Michael's remarkable efficiency and reasonable pricing make him the optimal choice for those seeking a prompt and hassle-free salon experience.

Prior to my relocation to Las Vegas in 2006, I had been frequenting a prominent salon in Los Angeles, where I had become accustomed to receiving exemplary service from a seasoned stylist. Nevertheless, upon settling in Las Vegas, I was hesitant to entrust my tresses to an unfamiliar stylist, fearing that they might not meet my expectations. It was only through the persistent encouragement of my sibling that I decided to take a chance on Michael, whose reputation for excellence had earned him widespread acclaim.

Upon entering Michael's salon, I was immediately struck by his warm and engaging demeanor, which put me at ease and made the experience all the more enjoyable. Moreover, his exceptional expertise and ability to select the ideal color for my complexion resulted in a finished product that surpassed even my previous stylist's efforts, who had been tending to my locks for fifteen years! The time-efficient nature of Michael's work was also noteworthy, as I was able to achieve a fabulous hairdo in a mere fraction of the time it took at other salons.

It is no exaggeration to say that Michael has an extraordinary gift for his craft, and his dedication to providing each client with an exceptional experience is genuinely admirable. His passion for his work is evident in every aspect of his interactions with clients, making the entire process a true delight. For anyone seeking a superior hairstyling experience, I would enthusiastically recommend Michael without reservation. In fact, my subsequent moves to Los Angeles have left me yearning for the exceptional service that Michael provides, and I eagerly anticipate my next visit to his salon.

"My inclination is to reserve five-star ratings for exceptional culinary experiences, but the quality of the dishes we sampled at this establishment warranted such an accolade. The pan-seared salmon, with its crispy exterior and succulent interior, was a prime example of a flawlessly prepared piece of fish. The harmonious blend of flavors and textures in the green chile pork pot pie, coupled with the satisfying crunch of the pastry crust, further solidified my positive impression of the restaurant. To complement these delectable dishes, I opted for a glass of their reasonably priced house chardonnay, which proved to be a suitable accompaniment to our meal. The ambiance of the establishment exuded a relaxed, bohemian vibe, fostering an environment conducive to both dining and lingering, while the diverse beverage options, including artisanal cocktails and specialty coffee drinks, catered to a wide range of tastes. Furthermore, the restaurant's proximity to the downtown area made it an appealing alternative to the overpriced and perhaps mediocre dining options in the vicinity. As an added perk, our Yelp check-in rewarded us with a complimentary cookie, the peanut butter variety of which was particularly scrumptious, although the s'mores cookie was likewise delightful."

I customarily resort to utilizing Yelp as a platform to express my grievances regarding various establishments, but I must say that Sunchain has rendered me speechless with their exceptional customer service; it's truly impressive. Throughout the past year, I've had the pleasure of frequenting this establishment, and each time, I've been greeted with an effusive smile and an unwavering commitment to ensuring a satisfying experience. The ambiance is consistently spotless, and the prices are utterly reasonable.

"If you seek the pinnacle of excellence in gel, glitter, et cetera, look no further than Lynn's expertise. As a patron of her services since her relocation to Las Vegas, I can unequivocally attest to her exceptional proficiency. Your financial investment not only procures the tangible designs and glitter, but also the assurance of quality artistry. In essence, you receive an optimal return on your investment. Despite my current economic constraints as a starving student, I shall eagerly resume utilizing Lynn's services when feasible. Additionally, Dawn has demonstrated exceptional customer service and interpersonal skills, even though I have yet to experience her artistic prowess firsthand."

When an experiential encounter transpires with absolute flawlessness, I am compelled to confer upon it a perfect quintet of stellar ratings. The hospitable hostess, in conjunction with the attentive waitstaff and culinary artisan, collectively manifested a demeanor that was both cordial and accommodating. \n\nMy gastronomical desires were satiated by a caprese sandwich of unparalleled quality, the constituent elements of which were carefully selected and artfully assembled. The pannini rolls, freshly baked each morning, served as the foundation for this epicurean masterpiece. This dining establishment has unequivocally earned my endorsement as a veritable victor in the realm of gastronomy.

Another one of the budget afternoon shows in Vegas that suprises you. It is quite entertaining. Well worth the admission of ($20 to $30) for some laughs and good tricks. 

He likes to mix the show with other performers in Vegas, so you will get a well rounded show (not just magic). 

Go to this show and use the ticket stub to get discount entrance to other vegas shows.

"This particular lodging establishment ranks among my most preferred in Las Vegas, primarily due to the fastidious upkeep of my accommodations and the breathtaking panorama that greeted me each morning. The streamlined check-in process facilitated an effortless transition into my upgraded quarters, which afforded me the opportunity to indulge in the various luxuries and services available on the premises. Its prime location, coupled with the impressive array of amenities and exceptional customer care, served to enhance my overall experience and solidify this establishment's standing as one of my top choices in the city."

"The epitome of culinary excellence, Chili Dogs 'All The Way' reign supreme in their quintessential 'carolina style' manifestation, proffering an unparalleled gastronomical experience that would be remiss to overlook. Optional inclusion of slaw serves to enhance the flavor profile, while the burgers themselves are an exercise in culinary perfection."
After my airbrush tan upstairs at Bronze Beauty of Las Vegas, I was hungry and picked up a large tomato and basil pizza. It was incredible. Best pizza in town by far!

It was a Sunday morning at 11:30 am, and my companions and I had managed, albeit somewhat miraculously, to vacate our quarters by the designated checkout time and descended to the second floor of the Imperial Palace, where the renowned Hash House Harriers was situated. A considerable throng of patrons had gathered outside, yet we were summoned to our table within a mere ten minutes. 

As we traversed the establishment, we endeavored to surreptitiously peruse the offerings at neighboring tables, and our curiosity was piqued by the gargantuan proportions of the dishes. We strongly advise sharing a meal, lest you wish to leave feeling satiated rather than ravenous. 

Our trio opted for the Tractor Driver Combination, accompanied by griddled French toast, corned beef hash, and the signature eggs Benedict. I had the pleasure of sampling each dish, and my taste buds were treated to an unforgettable culinary experience. To complement my French toast breakfast, I indulged in a rejuvenating Bloody Maria, my first encounter with this particular variation employing tequila instead of vodka. The concoction proved to be truly exceptional, effectively alleviating any lingering symptoms of indigestion and intoxication. 

My French toast remained largely untouched, comprising two formidable slices measuring two and a half inches in thickness and five inches in length, exquisitely seasoned and accompanied by a grilled banana. Our server exhibited remarkable proficiency, ensuring that our glasses remained filled and our coffee mugs were constantly replenished. 

The sole drawback, apart from the restaurant's location within the Imperial Palace, was the absence of dedicated restrooms. Patrons must embark on a quest through the casino to locate suitable facilities.

"Indubitably delectable! If you possess an ardent fondness for culinary indulgences, you will unquestionably adore this establishment. Moreover, if you bear a resemblance to my spouse and myself, you will depart from the vintage shop with several gastronomical treasures in tow! We sampled the burger and chicken sandwich â?both were utterly sublime. The sweet potato chips and tater tots were nothing short of extraordinary, eliciting an unwavering craving for more."

"This shopping center has consistently demonstrated its longevity, showcasing its age with remarkable finesse. It is unquestionably an expensive location, given the frequency with which establishments are either shutting down or relocating within the mall's premises. Notwithstanding this, it boasts an impressive array of diverse retail outlets and dining options both within and surrounding the mall. Additionally, it features a respectable children's play area, accompanied by a tax-exempt snack bar conveniently situated nearby. Of particular note is the double-decker carousel, offering two rides for a mere $5, with accompanying adults able to partake in the experience alongside their offspring at no additional cost. While it serves as an ideal refuge from the sweltering summer heat, one must inevitably return to the blistering temperatures within their vehicle upon departure."

"I am envisioning myself situated on a picturesque, sandy beach proximal to Kona, Hawaii, whereupon I find myself yearning for the delectable offerings of Da Poke Shack, and yet, much to my dismay, it remains an unattainable reality. However, in a most serendipitous turn of events, Poke Express has emerged as a beacon of hope, proffering the identical culinary experience that I have been pining for. The mere thought of partaking in their succulent poke dishes elicits an unbridled sense of euphoria and an unwavering commitment to indulge in this gastronomical delight whenever the craving arises. The only fleeting moment of disappointment stems from the absence of rice during my initial visit (the uncertainty regarding its availability lingers), though this minor setback does little to diminish my unwavering enthusiasm for the exceptional quality of the poke. In point of fact, I eagerly anticipate the prospect of revisiting this culinary haven and savoring the delectable flavors that Poke Express has to offer."

Salon Faith is a great place for all of your hair care. They are very friendly and helpful. My 14 year old daughter gets the best treatment ever at this place. She love the fact that she gets the full hair treatment every time she makes honor roll at school. She hasn't missed honor roll yet!

I have been by this place several times now. Also now that I am far more aware of what I am eating, I pay attention.
So today I went in. I found out this place has been here for 10 years.
It is a bakery, as well as an Eat in or to go dinner.
So much to choose from in here as well.
Bread, cookies, bagels,Pizza dough,muffins, etc, etc, etc...

I also really like that you can buy your own mixes on everything and make it your self if you so want to do it.
Menu for meals is great and when you see all the food places they supply to you will be surprised as well.
The even sell all types of cakes. You can order them form the book complete with decorations.
It is not all too cheap in here. But, A little extra effort is worth the extra price ,I think.
When we are all swelling up like Balloons changing your diet can do wonders.
I will be happy to come back here. Yeah, for a great find!

"Five stars are attributed to the all-encompassing ambiance, delectable cuisine, and captivating atmosphere that permeates the establishment, thereby creating an unforgettable dining experience. My recent visit culminated in a thoroughly enjoyable occasion, during which I relished a straightforward rice and orange chicken dish, while also having the opportunity to sample their sushi offerings. The contemporary decor and strategic lighting, characterized by a dim yet refined ambiance, further enhanced the overall dining experience. It is worth mentioning that the fond memories associated with this location are augmented by the fact that I requested my significant other's hand in romantic partnership during our visit, thus slightly skewing my assessment. Nonetheless, this eatery will persistently hold a unique place in my heart."

"It is utterly delightful to experience such unbridled joy, my dear friend! The laundry facilities boast an impressive array of state-of-the-art washers and dryers, which undoubtedly contribute to the overall efficiency of the establishment. However, it is the aesthetically pleasing appearance of the male staff members that truly captivates my attention. Their well-groomed visages are a testament to their dedication to personal grooming and hygiene. I must admit that I am intensely curious about the skincare regimen employed by the manager, as his complexion exudes a radiant and youthful glow that belies his age. Might I suggest a visit to a reputable dermatologist or esthetician for a consultation on the most effective treatments and products tailored specifically to his skin type? After all, a vigilant focus on maintaining healthy skin is crucial for both personal and professional success."

Jeff, the culinary maestro, left an indelible impression on our gastronomical experience during our initial visit to this esteemed establishment, as his delectable creations and exceptional hospitality conflated to form an unforgettable encounter; we eagerly anticipate the advent of his dinner service, which promises to be a culinary odyssey of epic proportions.

"Following an arduous day of peregrination, we opted to indulge in a delectable repast at The Keg, whereupon our culinary expectations were not only met but indeed surpassed by the consummate skill and proficiency of Paul, our server. Arriving mere moments prior to the throngs of patrons customarily associated with the evening hours, we were afforded the opportunity to sample the establishment's gastronomical offerings in relative tranquility. Upon divulging my dietary restrictions, specifically my aversion to fungi of the genus Fungi (which, it must be noted, were featured prominently throughout the menu), Paul kindly assured me that suitable accommodations would be made to ensure the absence of any mycological ingredients in both my salad and the poultry intended to crown it. The kitchen manager, cognizant of my concerns, graciously emerged from his domain to provide explicit assurance that the requisite precautions had been taken to preclude any possibility of cross-contamination during food preparation. My dining experience was utterly devoid of dissatisfaction; indeed, I was thoroughly impressed by the exceptional quality of the cuisine and the attentive, courteous service accorded to us by Paul. The location of this esteemed eatery, situated as it is on historic St. Paul Street, merely served to enhance the overall appeal of the dining experience. In conclusion, my sincere endorsement of The Keg is unequivocal and unreserved, and I would unhesitatingly revisit this culinary gem at the earliest opportunity."
Delicious buffet:  looking forward to late lunch, before 3;pm.\nEaten here before, and will definetely keep going back.\nI never tire of their dishes...just yummy!

Yelp, I can always count on you!  As I will probably continue to note ad nauseum, I am looking for good sushi since moving to Pittsburgh.  I think I may have found another contender!  

First of all, the service is spectacular.  The staff is attentive and so kind.  Everyone seems genuinely interested in providing a positive experience.  Secondly, they have a full bar.  This means a lot, since most BYOBs in the 'Burgh charge a corking fee (WTF?).  I was able to order a small house sake for $5 and it paired so nicely with my meal.

We started with the gyoza, which was fried crispy (I'm used to pan fried).  Good, but a bit greasier than what I'm used to since it was deep fried.  I went for one of the sushi dinners, which included miso soup and salad.  The miso was yummy!   Perfectly seasoned and not burn your face off hot.  The sushi was really great. Huge pieces of fish when it comes to the nigiri and my roll was quite tasty. 

I think most people wouldn't expect a good experience like this on Carson, but the ambiance was nice too.  I saw a couple having a delightful date in front of me, while I had a girl's night with a friend.  Did I mention that the price was right?!  

In short, my favorite  find so far.  I'd love to see more specialty rolls on their menu, but they do SUCH a great job with what they've got.  I'm a happy camper!

Wow!!!!  This place is AMAZING!!!  As soon as you walk in the aroma tantalizes you.  The first bite was all it took.  The pulled pork melted in my mouth and the mac & cheese...mmmmm good.  This is as good as it gets.  I will definitely be back for more.

"From the initial warm salutation to the consummate farewell, our dining experience at this esteemed establishment was nothing short of exceptional, with each element of the meal surpassing our expectations and culminating in an unforgettable gastronomical journey. The Martini, skillfully crafted by the bartender and adorned with a splash of Leech, served as the perfect precursor to the delectable culinary delights that were to follow. The cuisine, boasting an impressive array of flavors and textures, proved to be nothing less than superlative, while the wine list, thoughtfully curated and presented with insightful recommendations by our attentive server, complemented each dish flawlessly, all without breaking the bank. Throughout the evening, the staff's attention to detail and commitment to ensuring our satisfaction were palpable, making us feel truly valued and appreciated. We would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone seeking a refined dining experience, and we eagerly anticipate our next visit. As a final note, we must emphasize the generous portion sizes, which practically compel one to share the bounty with others, thereby transforming the meal into a convivial occasion that transcends mere sustenance."

My acquaintance and I decided to partake in a culinary excursion to this eatery on a particular day, and our gastronomical expectations were exceedingly surpassed. Our individual dishes were nothing short of delectable, and the presentation was aesthetically pleasing. Notwithstanding the absence of a designated children's menu, the establishment accommodated our juvenile companions with remarkable hospitality, ensuring their dining experience was tranquil and enjoyable. Subsequent to perusing their evening menu, I developed an ardent desire to revisit and sample their diverse seafood offerings, despite the somewhat elevated prices. The quality of service and ambiance were additionally commendable.

I acted as a convivial aggregation of six individuals who partook in a culinary celebration commemorating my progenitors' quadragintennial nuptial milestone. Prior to the appointed date, I arranged for a reservation through the digital platform known as OpenTable, taking care to mention in the "comments" section that this was a momentous occasion for my parental units. Upon the arrival of our hospitable server, he extended felicitations and well wishes to my mother and father, thereby creating a sense of exclusivity and inaugurating a memorable evening. My concerns regarding the selection of the Grand Concourse as the venue for this momentous occasion were assuaged by the exceptional quality of the facilities, the delectability of the cuisine, and the proficiency of the staff. The ambiance of the riverfront dining area, despite initial reservations, proved to be an agreeable and snug setting, further enhanced by the captivating panorama of the nocturnal city skyline. Our attentive server exhibited a praiseworthy level of dedication to ensuring an optimal dining experience for our gathering, while the victuals themselves were quite palatable and served in generously proportioned helpings. I would unhesitatingly return to this establishment and eagerly anticipate the prospect of exploring the primary dining area during a future visit.

Ingos has a great atmosphere and food is great.  They use grass fed meat for all burgers and there are incredibly important reasons why grass fed is so much better. Both nutritionally and in treatment of animals.  All the other items on the menu are great as well, they have great beers, apps and other menu items besides burgers. The only recommendation I would offer the restaurant has to do with their \"to go\" burgers.  I'm not sure if it has to do with the bun and/or the way you request the burger to be cooked but only when I order to go I almost always get a soggy bun which I of course do not like. Eating at the restaurant this never happens.  Great place

"As a native of Los Angeles, I frequent Phoenix to visit my siblings, and this establishment is an indispensable component of my itinerary. The exceptional quality of the bartenders, cuisine, and hospitality renders it an absolute necessity for anyone in the vicinity of Peoria and the 17 freeway."

This club exudes an unparalleled level of excellence across all aspects, boasting a stunning physical appearance that is nothing short of breathtaking and an atmosphere that exudes exclusivity, making it feel decidedly high-end and opulent. Not only does it possess a striking visual appeal, but it also offers an enjoyable experience that is genuinely entertaining. The unique combination of factors, including the thin air allowing golf balls to travel impressive distances, slower-playing greens compared to those found in California and Nevada, and an abundance of natural water features such as streams, lakes, and waterfalls scattered throughout the 18 holes, culminates in a truly exceptional and memorable golfing experience. 

Furthermore, the staff maintains a warm and welcoming demeanor, providing attentive and accommodating service that makes each patron feel like royalty. This level of hospitality is by no means unusual for a facility of this caliber, but what truly sets it apart is the exceptional quality of its culinary offerings. The food served at the club is not only delicious but also surprisingly affordable, with prices comparable to those of a casual cafÃ© rather than a high-end golf course. Specifically, the buffet breakfast stands out as an absolute highlight, offering an impressive array of options that surpass even some more expensive breakfasts, while the buffet lunch provided after the golf tournament is equally impressive in its quality and variety. Additionally, the waitstaff provides impeccable service, further enhancing the overall dining experience. For anyone seeking to indulge in the luxurious lifestyle associated with country clubs, this club is an absolute must-visit destination. Following a day spent on these grounds, one cannot help but feel inclined to adopt an affluent moniker like Chaz and engage in leisurely activities such as yachting, highlighting the transformative power of this club's opulent ambiance. While the cost of playing a round of golf may seem steep, the experience is undoubtedly worth every penny.

"Wow, that was utterly remarkable! While meandering along Fremont, we decided to attend an impending comedy performance, and boy, am I glad we did! The comedian was unequivocally sidesplitting; his humor was nothing short of pure brilliance. Throughout the entire production, the audience was incessantly overcome with laughter. I cannot emphasize enough how imperative it is to witness this spectacle if you find yourself in the vicinity of Fremont Street or, indeed, anywhere in Las Vegas. It's well worth the journey, and the cost is a veritable bargain. In fact, I would willingly pay triple the price to experience his comedic mastery once more."

Tammy and Shelly are super sweet servers!theyre my favorite, I have usually done pick up orders in the past since I work near by, I dined in only once after work with coworkers. The steak fries are my favorite and their burgers are simple and taste homemade which is why I like them so much. I don't really eat this type of food but it's perfect for a delicious cheat meal splurge. If I'm gonna be bad it's gonna be with something this good!!

Honestly I was hesitant to try the cold toppings, but I was glad I had it.  I have had NY pizza, Chicago pizza and this was totally different.  No grease dripping off the pizza.  Nice change from the norm.

"Utterly surreal culinary experience that transcends the mundane and enters the realm of gastronomical nirvana. A veritable familial dynasty, this esteemed eatery has captivated my taste buds on no less than eight occasions, with each visit showcasing an unwavering commitment to excellence. Upon entering, one is immediately enveloped by a warm, hospitable ambiance, courtesy of the gracious staff who personify the very essence of refined service. The fare? Nothing short of a sensory revolution, with each dish expertly crafted to tantalize the palate and satiate even the most discerning of appetites. From the tender, flavorful veal offerings to the heavenly handmade pasta creations, every bite is a masterclass in culinary virtuosity. And for oenophiles, an unparalleled wine list that promises to indulge even the most exquisite of tastes. My fervent anticipation to partake in this epicurean odyssey yet again is, quite simply, insatiable."

This place is amazing. A friend brought me here when I was visiting from out of town and I was really impressed. This may be my new favorite Thai food place. They have a ton of creative options on the menu that look delicious. When I told the waiter I was a vegetarian, he said that they could make 90% of things vegetarian. I asked whether that included using beef broth and fish sauce and he clarified that they use vegetarian broth and a veggie substitute for the fish sauce for all of the veggie dishes. Amazing! I got a delicious noodle dish that I'm now craving again. My friend got peanut chicken and sticky rice with mango, both of which looked delicious. I would definitely recommend this place.

"During my nuptial sojourn in Edinburgh, my spouse and I had the pleasure of encountering Treacle, a watering hole that boasted an eclectic ambiance reminiscent of both anime and contemporary romance, albeit with a slightly excessive flair that bordered on kitsch. However, this superfluous embellishment was promptly forgiven due to the establishment's impressive beverage selection, which showcased an array of inventive concoctions that elicited nothing short of astonishment from yours truly. Throughout our multiple visits to this enchanting venue, I indulged in a trio of tantalizing tipples, specifically the Pear and Violet Mule, the Silver Fern, and the Elderflower Fix, each of which presented a harmonious blend of flavors that was both refreshing and singular. Although we did not partake in the culinary offerings, the enticing aromas and visual presentations emanating from the kitchen suggested that they, too, would have been a gastronomical delight."

"The culinary experience was truly exceptional! The extensive menu proffered an array of delectable options, including the tantalizing strawberry pancakes that showcased an unparalleled depth of flavor. Furthermore, the Mexican omelette, augmented with carnitas, jalapenos, and pico de gallo, was an unmitigated success. Kudos to the kitchen for their commitment to diversity, as it enabled us to sample a wide range of dishes without any trepidation. We are eagerly anticipating our next visit!"

During our prolonged excursion from Phoenix to Provo, we engaged in an exhaustive search for suitable dining establishments along our route, specifically while traversing Las Vegas. Following a meticulous examination of online reviews and ratings on our mobile devices, we opted to halt at Old School, situated in the northern sector of the city. With some trepidation regarding the unfamiliar ambiance and culinary offerings, we decided to venture inside and partake of a meal. Upon ordering the Vegas meets Italy pizza, we were thoroughly delighted by the harmonious fusion of flavors, encompassing a diverse array of cheeses, fresh tomatoes, and a tangy date sauce. Such a refreshing deviation from the customary pizza toppings left us feeling utterly satiated, and we shall unquestionably make a point to revisit this eatery upon our return journey.

"My single pupil composed a critique for YELP! Club pertaining to Cheesecake Factory, thereby this genuinely represents Fiorella's assessment (6th grade learner):\n\nMy encounter at Cheesecake Factory proved to be remarkably enjoyable. The hospitality we received was of an exceptional quality due to the gracious and accommodating demeanor displayed by our server, Angelo, throughout the ordering process. The tidiness of the establishment was quite commendable, taking into account the substantial workload that the servers must undertake in order to maintain a clean environment, given the vast number of clientele they serve. Although there was a brief delay in being seated, it was entirely reasonable, considering the immense popularity of Cheesecake Factory among patrons. In conclusion, my experience was thoroughly satisfactory, and I would unhesitatingly advocate this eatery to acquaintances."

I underwent a preliminary visit to Tipton Orthodontics in advance of a significant maxillofacial surgical intervention, which involved a bilateral sagittal split osteotomy procedure, wherein the surgeon would section the upper and lower jaws, followed by a posterior displacement of the mandible and an anterior repositioning of the maxilla. The staff at Tipton Orthodontics exhibited exceptional cordiality and amicability throughout my preoperative preparation, ensuring that I was adequately prepared for the impending surgical procedure. My sincere gratitude is extended to the entire team at Tipton Orthodontics.

Please note that the format of the output will be like this:

The text is: [ORIGINAL TEXT]
The modified text is: [MODIFIED TEXT]

So, please make sure to include both parts in your response.

We arrived at this establishment this evening subsequent to perusing several luminous endorsements from acquaintances on the social media platform known as Facebook. As an individual hailing from the eastern coast, I must admit that my initial impressions were tainted by a healthy dose of dubiety regarding the authenticity of the local seafood offerings. Nonetheless, I am utterly delighted that I opted to partake in this culinary adventure, as the overall experience transcended my expectations and left me in a state of unadulterated euphoria. The hospitality we received from Will, our server, was truly exceptional and greatly enhanced our dining experience. His dedication to ensuring our satisfaction was unwavering, and his efforts surpassed the excellence of the succulent shrimp dishes. We shall most certainly return to this eatery in the future, and we fervently hope that they will consider extending their hours of operation to include Sundays, thereby allowing us to indulge in their delectable cuisine during the weekend.

The cocktails are the absolute best in the city. Try the Aviation and the Citizen.

They keep all the best dishes on the menu while also adding other creative dishes. I hope they keep the pastrami pork belly for ever.

The service is always exceptional. Sit at the bar if you don't like to wait even a minute for another cocktail.

I have been there about thirty times, and I have never had a less than stellar experience.

"Community Florist has become my go-to destination for all things floral, as I have had the pleasure of utilizing their exceptional services on multiple occasions. Not only do they offer a vast array of breathtakingly beautiful blooms, but their team of skilled artisans possess the unparalleled ability to transform my vague ideas into exquisite, personalized masterpieces that flawlessly complement any setting or occasion. Whether it be for a joyous celebration of love, a somber commemoration of loss, or simply to brighten up my salon, Community Florist has consistently delivered top-notch floral arrangements that surpass my expectations. Moreover, their flexible payment plans and accommodating approach to working within my budget have been a welcome respite from the usual rigidity encountered when dealing with other florists. It is genuinely reassuring to know that such a remarkable establishment exists, ready to assist me in creating unforgettable memories through their extraordinary floral creations. Kudos to Community Florist for their dedication to excellence and for sharing their passion for flowers with the world!"

"My culinary excursions are not exhaustive, as I only chronicle establishments that exhibit exceptional qualities. This quintessential, time-honored Italian restaurant merits effusive praise. Any assessment short of five stars would be a deliberate attempt to skew the rating system. Following a recommendation from the concierge at the Marriott, I commend those capable of discovering this gem without relying on a taxi. Its unassuming exterior belies the bustling atmosphere that awaits patrons who venture down the stairs and pass through the utilitarian entrance. Gastronomes will revel in the diverse array of delectable dishes, as the menu boasts an extensive selection of authentic Italian cuisine, graciously translated by the staff upon request. The wine list, similarly comprehensive and exclusively Italian, complements the culinary offerings. Even the sugar packets hail from Italy, reinforcing the establishment's commitment to authenticity. The owners proudly showcase their Old World heritage, delivering an unparalleled dining experience. The daily soup special, stingray soup, defied my expectations, comprising a rich seafood broth infused with shredded stingray fin, embodying the essence of Italy's coastline. The menu brimmed with enticing options, compelling me to choose the Osso bucco, a flavorsome delight. My spouse opted for the fettuccine with mushrooms, which garnered equal acclaim. Without hesitation, I would return to this gastronomic haven. In fact, I requested that the staff summon a taxi to facilitate my return to the hotel, given its proximity to the historic district, albeit slightly removed from the beaten path."

I went in for a Brazilian wax so I was a little nervous. Immediately, she made me feel comfortable. You can tell she has a lot of experience because she was thorough & quick. I can't wait to schedule a facial & massage with her. Thanks for the awesome experience!

This eatery warrants an unequivocal expression of amazement (and it is not a ubiquitous occurrence to encounter a Chinese restaurant in Montreal that does so!) due to its commitment to serving genuinely authentic Chinese dishes, such as the Steamed Pork Dumplings with Rice Flour Wrapper (è±?éºµå), which are arguably the most scrumptious and flavorsome variant of this particular dish that I have had the pleasure of indulging in within the city limits of Montreal, and are on par with, if not surpassing, the quality of their Americanized Chinese counterparts, such as the time-honored General Tao Chicken.

The proprietor of this establishment exudes amiability and the staff members are incredibly helpful and accommodating, emphasizing that their primary focus lies not solely on the culinary aspects but also encompasses exceptional customer service; this dedication to excellence is exemplified by their meticulous attention to detail when preparing takeout orders, ensuring that each dish retains its unique flavor profile and overall appeal.

Lastly, it is indeed a rare and welcome find to discover a bring-your-own-wine (BYOW) restaurant in Canada that not only boasts an impressive array of delectable dishes but also maintains a steadfast commitment to providing an exceptional dining experience for its clientele; kudos are extended to this establishment for their unwavering dedication to gastronomic excellence!

"An extraordinary recreational establishment boasting a plethora of amenities, including an indoor running track, a basketball court, multiple tennis courts, a swimming pool, and even a racquetball court, among others. Additionally, this expansive venue offers a renowned children's play area, known as Kids World, which promises an enjoyable experience for families with young ones. I highly recommend visiting this exceptional facility and relishing in its vast array of recreational opportunities. Furthermore, feel free to follow me on Twitter at the aforementioned handle, where I regularly share updates and insights related to health, fitness, and lifestyle."

"I thoroughly concur with Stephanie B's sentiment; having brought up two offspring and having had numerous experiences in hasty care facilities over the past three decades, I can unequivocally attest that this particular establishment was, by a considerable margin, the most exceptional. The personnel, encompassing the receptionists, nurses, and medical practitioner, demonstrated an unwavering commitment to benevolence and warmth. My spouse received expedited attention, which was mirrored in the brief duration of his visit (a mere thirty minutes), during which time the remaining individuals who required medical intervention had already been attended to. It is my fervent recommendation that if you find yourself in the vicinity of NE Phoenix/Scottsdale and are in need of an Urgent Care facility, you would be well-advised to pay a visit to this exceptional institution."

Look for Charlie. This guy really knows his stuff! He was able to diagnose the problem with our car quickly and fix it. Excellent customer service. I highly recommend using them. Charlie is like a car detective!

L'Atelier - does that mean "the best butter". Call me ghetto if you want, but one of the best things we had here was the french  Echir  butter. I could put this butter on anything and it would shine with pride. 

We went with one Prix Fix and many carte items to accompany. This wound up working really well for us and I'd recommend the strategy to others. 

Essentially every ting was great - langoustine fritter, tuna belly, gelee, suckling pig (oui oui), mashed potatoes (they are known for them and BTW they are like 35% "butter") and more. The beef rib eye was good, but the Poached baby Kussi oysters with French butter we the highlight for me - two orders please.

A more entertaining way to have a phenomenal meal...

Great tea store!  The owner is always on site and is the most knowledgeable tea person that I have ever met.  They have samples of all of their teas to smell before purchasing, such a great idea.   They also have a nice store with plenty of neat items to purchase.

"I have an immense fondness for this diminutive, specialty confectionery store, whereupon I indulge my craving for sugary delights! It is highly recommended that you gratify your taste buds by partaking in their delectable offerings, specifically the scrumptious milk chocolate gummy bears that constitute my preferred treat! The customer service experience is truly exceptional, characterized by a level of proficiency and cordiality that renders it utterly remarkable! Additionally, they offer glittered cotton candy, an item that elicits my utmost delight and serves as a testament to their commitment to providing a diverse array of sweets that cater to the varied preferences of their clientele. Indeed, the sheer joy that I derive from frequenting this establishment is further amplified by its proximity to my place of employment, thereby rendering it an ideal venue for me to indulge in some much-needed retail therapy during my breaks."

This particular venue fulfilled our expectations. Prior to attending a cinematic presentation, we opted to partake of sustenance at the bar area. Our dining experience was characterized by prompt and attentive service, complemented by delectable fare. Specifically, we highly recommend the fried green beans served with a creamy aioli dipping sauce - an unquestionably delightful culinary indulgence. Additionally, during our visit, we sampled various pieces of sushi, including a spicy tuna roll. Although the roll did not exhibit the artistic assembly typically associated with expert sushi chefs, its freshness and flavor were undeniably impressive, rendering its visual appeal irrelevant in light of its gustatory satisfaction.

"Spectacular culinary indulgence characterized our dining experience at this esteemed eatery. Our server assured us of an unparalleled gustatory delight, and his assertion proved veracious. The Kobe Skirt Steak boasted a tenderness that nearly rendered it dissoluble in the mouth, its flavorsome excellence unsurpassed. The Buffalo Mozzarella, adorned with a succulent roasted red pepper, tantalized our taste buds with its sublime quality. While the Ribeye proved satisfying, it paled in comparison to the Kobe Skirt Steak's unrivaled richness. Likewise, the Brussels Sprouts, though delicious, failed to surpass the delectability of the chef's other offerings. A notable mention must be made of the Potato Puree, whose creamy texture and subtle flavor proved a welcome complement to the meal, despite being somewhat superfluous. The ambiance of the restaurant itself exuded warmth and comfort, although it did require some time for our party to acclimate to the ambient temperature. An additional aspect worthy of mention concerned the presence of a photographer, who circulated among the patrons, capturing memories of their dining experience. Unfortunately, the cost associated with procuring these images struck us as somewhat excessive and detracted from the overall refinement of the dining experience."

"Upon experiencing an unfortunate haircut at a salon in town, a friend recommended Danielle, whose exceptional proficiency in both cutting and coloring techniques had been lauded by numerous patrons. Thus, I decided to take my friend's advice and schedule an appointment with Danielle, which proved to be a judicious decision. She exhibited a keen interest in understanding my preferences regarding styling routines and desired alterations, demonstrating a commitment to customizing her services to meet the unique needs of each client. The color she applied was truly remarkable, boasting an impressive luminosity that garnered copious compliments. In fact, the final result was so natural-looking that it seemed as though no alteration had occurred, which was precisely the intended effect. Moreover, Danielle's expertise extended beyond merely cutting and coloring, as she offered valuable guidance on maintaining healthy, lustrous locks. Such was her adeptness that I felt compelled to treat my mother to a similar pampering session during her visit, eager to share the benefits of Danielle's talents with my loved ones. For anyone seeking a skilled stylist in Las Vegas, Danielle is an unquestionable choice, assuring a satisfying experience for those who place their trust in her capable hands."

"Yardhouse unquestionably elicits an ardent affection from us due to their consistently impressive culinary offerings and exceptional customer service. Specifically, their delectable chocolate soufflÃ© has captured our hearts; it's a minuscule yet sumptuous delight that provides a divine conclusion to a satisfying dining experience. At a mere $3, this sublime dessert is sure to satiate any chocolate aficionado seeking a genuine, high-quality treat without the customary mediocrity associated with run-of-the-mill restaurant interpretations of a classic chocolate cake. Furthermore, their Southern Fried chicken and Enchilada Stack have proven to be equally delectable options, solidifying Yardhouse's reputation for delivering flavorful, expertly crafted meals that transcend expectations based on menu descriptions. Notably, their Mac & Cheese embodies an impressive fusion of diverse cheeses, mushrooms, and chicken, resulting in a dish that defies its seemingly straightforward name. Moreover, our experiences at Yardhouse locations in Denver and Las Vegas have demonstrated a remarkable consistency in quality. Lastly, it would be remiss to overlook their extensive selection of beers, which serves as another testament to this establishment's commitment to providing an exceptional dining experience."

I am completely new to this painting party night out, but as someone who is less than artistic, Erica helped me to paint something I was very proud to share with others!  I really had fun while painting the medium difficulty patriotic flip flop piece.  The atmosphere was relaxing and I thoroughly enjoyed painting alongside my friend and other very friendly people nearby!  Erica was thorough in communicating the directions, painted so I could not only hear the  instructions, but see her technique as she painted the same project according to her verbal instructions.  With approximately thirty other painters in the private room at Nacho Daddy,  I appreciated having a second artist helping Erica on the floor and both of them answered the couple questions I had about technique and how to improve a particular area on my painting.  Both of them were extremely helpful and came around often to refill paints and provide positive feedback and encouragement.  Erica encouraged creativity for those more adventurous folks and really seemed to enjoy teaching all of us the techniques required for everyone to go home with a one of a kind painting in just a couple short hours. For anyone looking to attend a paint party, I would strongly encourage you to check out Vegas Painting Parties!  I will definitely be going back sometime soon!

"Elegant ambiance, ambient illumination, and proximity to various LCD televisions facilitate an optimal dining experience at this establishment. The culinary offerings are indeed delectable, and I would highly recommend the $25 teriyaki chicken entree. Unlike the conventional preparation methods employed by other eateries, Sushisamba's interpretation of chicken teriyaki is truly exceptional. Upon presentation, the dish consisted of succulent, flavorful chicken situated atop a bed of vibrant purple mashed potatoes. The juxtaposition of textures and flavors was utterly delightful, as the potatoes provided a pleasing contrast to the tender, moist chicken. Furthermore, the subtle infusion of teriyaki sauce complemented the dish without overpowering the natural flavors of the ingredients. In conjunction with the mashed potatoes, this creation proved to be an unparalleled gastronomic indulgence. Additionally, the sushi options available at Sushisamba merit consideration. Unlike customary sushi presentations, these rolls are gently enveloped in rice, thereby allowing the inherent flavors of the components to take center stage. Although the kobe beef roll was somewhat lackluster, the assortment of diverse rolls showcased innovative combinations of ingredients. However, I must caution against the selection of oysters, as they fail to distinguish themselves from the norm."

My son recently celebrated his eighth birthday at this venue, and the experience was nothing short of exceptional. Upon departing, he exclaimed that it was the "Best Birthday Party EVER!" which unequivocally warrants a perfect rating. The facility is meticulously managed, and the staff exudes friendliness and helpfulness, ensuring that every detail is taken care of and that the guests' needs are consistently met. The premises boast three distinct rooms that can be combined to create larger spaces, accommodating diverse party sizes. Punctuality is paramount, and the staff adheres to schedules with precision, ensuring a seamless experience. While external food is restricted, exceptions are made for fruit and vegetable platters and special adult meals. However, customized cakes are welcome. The in-house pizza and wings are delectable, and we opted to supplement our menu with sandwiches from Panera Bread, much to the delight of the adult attendees. Laser tag was an unexpected highlight, offering a thrilling experience that surpassed expectations. The spacious arena featured multiple rooms and levels, cleverly designed to provide an engaging and immersive adventure. Accurate lasers heightened the enjoyment, transforming the activity into an addictive and entertaining pastime. In conclusion, my personal experience was so thoroughly enjoyable that I eagerly anticipate revisiting this venue with my son in the near future.

I love the Marquee. Had so much fun here and I didn't have a drop of alcohol I just danced the night away holding my water glass( was recovering from previous antics but still gotta look social). 

Came here on a Monday night. Guestlist ladies in free and everyone the doorman the security guards the bartenders were super nice. 

DJ Dirty South was fun. The dance floor was crowded with people. I love Vegas cause the guys look so nice dancing in their suit jackets and slacks. Classy is good. The light show, the confetti the, glow sticks and marquee glow tubes they were handing out were fun to swing around. Everything screamed party and fun but classy. Dance! Dance! Dance! 

Woot! Woot! Can't wait to come back.

We kinda hung out here, they were having an Elvis competition night.  We were hanging out by the bar.  We decided to get a couple of drinks, I was going to just stick to something simple, like a margarita!  Well someone pointed out there special drinks, there in huge cups.  I can't remember what we got, but they sure were good. \n\n You can keep the cup, and your refills are only $13.00.  The initial drink is $16.00  Usually we get our drinks at one of the other outside bars, and they just weren't worth it!  From here on out, I know where I'm getting my drinks on Fremont street

"Zinc Bistro elicits an unwavering affection from yours truly, as it proffer a culinary experience akin to that of its Parisian counterparts. The gastronomical offerings are undoubtedly of superior quality, thanks to the fastidious attention to detail by the waiting staff. Upon entering the establishment, one cannot help but be enamored by the quintessential Parisian ambiance that permeates the space, replete with a bar area reminiscent of those found in the City of Light. The soup, salad, and entree options are all meticulously prepared and artfully presented, ensuring a gratifying dining experience for even the most discerning patron."

I go to D's almost every Wednesday night for a beer and a veggie dog after an hour of bouldering at the Wall.

Their beer selection changes often, and I've never been disappointed.  If I don't know what the beer is, they'll often bring over a sample to try to make sure I like it.

The veggie dogs are great, the cheese fries are great, and I've never had a problem with the service.   It can get crowded when a game is on, but just grab a beer and wait for a table.

Pros: Fun menu, great draft beer selection, beer cave!
Cons: Sometimes crowded and loud
