Notably, the presence of an egg within the burger proved a novel aspect for him, but he embraced it wholeheartedly and expressed his eagerness to replicate the experience during our forthcoming visit. 

Although we do not partake in beer, the venue's provision of a bar, coupled with Jessie's remarkable skill in crafting margaritas, satiated our desire for a delightful beverage. In fact, we may opt to sample their wine offerings during our next visit, given their extensive selection. 

In conclusion, this novel establishment has earned our unwavering endorsement, and we eagerly anticipate our return, primarily due to my unrelenting yearning for that exquisite macaroni and cheese.

"GLUTEN FREE FRIENDLY!!! We had an exquisite dining experience at this establishment last evening! WOW! We were afforded the luxury of sitting outside by the water in Las Vegas, which offered a picturesque ambiance akin to being transported to a different location altogether, aside from the arid desert climate. The patio boasts misters that effectively regulated the external temperature, creating a comfortable setting for al fresco dining. Upon entering the eatery, one encounters an impressive wine store with an extensive selection of reasonably priced wines. Patrons can select any bottle from the collection, pair it with their meal for a mere $10 surcharge, and indulge in a delightful wine and dine experience! The hospitality we received was exceptional! Our server and the culinary expert demonstrated a willingness to accommodate our dietary requirements and apprise us of ingredient specifics and potential allergens. The restaurant features live musical performances, which included a skilled guitarist during our visit. His talent was truly captivating. From the menu, we opted to initiate our culinary journey with the burrata cheese and heirloom tomato salad, accompanied by the soup of the day - a rich butternut squash complemented by crab meat - which was utterly sublime! For our main courses, we savored the scallops partnered with tomato and baby broccoli, as well as the seared swordfish garnished with a zesty red pepper sauce. The portion sizes were generous, leaving us thoroughly satiated! We eagerly anticipate our return to sample the remaining menu items that we regretfully missed out on during our initial visit. The sole drawback worth mentioning is the necessity for the restaurant to revamp their online menu to showcase several novel dishes that appear delectable and intriguing."

The occurrence of a particularly unique and specialized requirement pertaining to an external entryway prompted us to seek out the assistance of various retailers, including Home Depot's competitors; however, it was only Home Depot's sales representatives who demonstrated a willingness to go above and beyond in their endeavors to identify and provide a tailored solution that met our specific needs. Following the acquisition of the door, a significantly greater amount of effort than what is typically expected was necessary in order to facilitate its installation, a process that was executed with exceptional precision by a highly skilled and meticulous installer who ensured that the surrounding area was thoroughly cleaned and free of debris upon completion of the work. Notably, this entire experience was made available to us at a price point that was not only competitive but indeed advantageous. Our sincere gratitude extends to each and every individual involved in this transaction.

As a nascent entrepreneur, I had an arrears of two years in submitting my commercial levies, which was a consequence of my unfamiliarity with the intricacies of fiscal compliance. However, Lizeth, an employee of iQ Taxx, displayed exceptional decorum and patience in addressing my numerous queries, providing exhaustive explanations that clarified any ambiguities I harbored. Moreover, she apprised me of the advancement of the task from inception to culmination, ensuring that I remained cognizant of the proceedings at every juncture. My interaction with iQ Taxx has been extremely satisfactory, and I would enthusiastically recommend their services to any burgeoning venture seeking to navigate the labyrinthine realm of taxation. (509 tokens)

The dining experience is more than I'd expect from a place like this. It's like I'm dinning at a 5 star restaurant-- I'm exaggerating, of course--with people coming over and asking how my food is, asking if I need anything else, taking away my plates. Can I give you a tip for god sakes? 

I'm always impressed when people learn my name and that definitely earns points from me. Right now, I'm obsessed with their pan seared salsa verde shrimp tacos.  You gotta try them! I have horrible cravings for those bad boys.

They also make sure you keep coming back.  One time, they messed up my order and because of it, they gave me a card that entitled me to one free taco for my inconvenience.  I wasn't even mad or upset about it, but I wasn't gunna pass up a free taco either.
Stopped by for my birthday meal and received an excellent steak, excellent service and a free desert.  The manager came by twice to make sure all was well......

"Indubitably, my most optimal dining experience in Las Vegas, and indeed, in quite some time. This esteemed establishment unquestionably merits all five stars for their exceptional service, culinary offerings, ambiance, and overall experience. 

Service: 
We arrived sans reservation and were apprised of a waiting period of one hour and thirty minutes, prompting us to take a stroll and observe the Fountains at Bellagio spectacle. Subsequently, our hostess informed us that upon our return, she would provide us with a buzzer. Following the display, we returned, awaiting only a brief three-minute interval before being seated. We requested a table on the balcony, and despite solely having a side balcony table available, the staff graciously accommodated our request, allowing us to patiently await the cleaning of a central table without the slightest inconvenience. Our server maintained a jovial demeanor and offered insightful recommendations of dishes to sample. 

Food: 
We initiated our culinary journey with the delectable Duck confit, accompanied by a side of spinach complemented by cranberries, and oh my goodness, it was utterly sublime! The duck literally melted in my mouth, leaving me in a state of gastronomic nirvana. I opted for the expertly cooked steak, paired with hand-carved French fries and adorned with caramelized onions, while my companion savored the seafood special. The fare was not only exquisitely prepared but also remarkably satisfying. 

I wholeheartedly endorse Mon Ami Gabi for a delightful dining experience and eagerly anticipate my next visit, craving another taste of their heavenly duck confit."

I must admit that my initial reluctance to engage in a rental agreement with this particular establishment was precipitated by an abundance of unfavorable critiques and subpar evaluations; nevertheless, I am now grateful that I chose to disregard such reservations. As a financially challenged college student and career transitioner, I opted to avail myself of their services during the Thanksgiving holiday week, primarily due to the fact that they offered the most competitive pricing through Expedia's booking platform. Upon arriving at the airport parking area, I was greeted by Jim, the shuttle driver, who exhibited remarkable benevolence by providing me with detailed directions to a neighboring shopping center and even took the time to write them down for my benefit. The gentlemen stationed at the counter were equally as cordial, engaging in a convivial conversation with the clients ahead of me, who hailed from New York. The process of checking in was remarkably efficient and straightforward, thanks to the fact that I had previously procured insurance coverage through Expedia, resulting in my obtaining my vehicle in less than ten minutes after arriving at the counter. The assortment of automobiles available in the parking lot predominantly consisted of recent models, ranging from 2011 to 2012. During my excursions to the mall and South Carolina, I diligently adhered to Jim's directions, which proved to be faultless. I would like to extend my sincere gratitude to the staff members for facilitating my sojourn in South Carolina and express my appreciation for Jim's assistance in guiding me to various destinations. Based on my positive experience, I wholeheartedly endorse this rental agency, and I hope that my testimonial will serve to alleviate any apprehensions harbored by potential patrons.

I had to go from B to E, and it only took about 10 minutes. I thought that I'd have to change terminals but nope! Great shops and restaurants, very clean, easy to get around, beautiful gardens inside too

"Our most recent culinary discovery has rapidly become our preferred dining establishment. The youthful personnel at this eatery exemplify exceptional customer service, which we believe stems from the company's cultural values. Their diverse array of delectable options, including soups and salads, has captured the palates of both my spouse and myself, such that we now frequent this venue on a weekly basis. However, we do lament the absence of nutritional information pertaining to their menu items, despite our repeated inquiries and attempts to access said data via their website."

"I have an immense fondness for this establishment. The proprietors are exceptional individuals who have demonstrated a remarkable dedication to their craft. I had the pleasure of introducing my family to their delectable gelato, which yielded an unwavering satisfaction. Each flavor is carefully conceived and executed utilizing only the freshest ingredients, resulting in a truly unique and tantalizing experience for the taste buds. My personal favorites were the sweet corn, chocolate mousse, and pistachio varieties. The latter was particularly noteworthy, as its rich, velvety texture and subtle nutty undertones left an indelible impression on my palate. The hospitable owner, Luigi, went above and beyond to ensure that my children were similarly enthralled by the array of flavors available. Their joy was palpable, and it was heartening to witness such genuine enthusiasm. It is encouraging to see a business thriving in the downtown area, fostering a sense of community through its commitment to quality and authenticity. I would highly recommend a visit to this gelateria; indeed, I am confident that one's expectations will be not only met but exceeded. In addition, the proprietors have announced plans to offer pints, quarts, and cakes in the near future, further expanding the scope of their culinary offerings. Furthermore, they intend to incorporate homemade cookies into their repertoire, destined to become the foundation for delectable ice cream sandwiches."

Due to an unforeseen flight delay, US Airways provisionally accommodated me at this esteemed lodging establishment for the evening. My, what an impressive hotel! 

Following a brief telephonic conversation, a shuttle promptly arrived at the aerodrome within a mere 15 minutes, transporting a hospitable driver named Eddie. He facilitated my procurement of an evening repast by offering recommendations for local dining establishments while the front desk attendant, who was exceptionally obliging, efficiently processed my check-in procedures. Their customer service surpassed expectations. 

Upon entering my temporary abode, I was struck by its opulence, featuring a well-appointed kitchen, a commodious living area replete with television, a sizable sleeping chamber equipped with yet another television, and a capacious bathroom boasting modern fixtures and recent renovations. The abundance of towels and complementary coffee only further enhanced my stay. 

In the morning, a veritable cornucopia of gastronomical delights awaited me, providing ample sustenance for not one, not two, but three satisfying meals! Each item was meticulously prepared and bursting with flavor. 

Were I to encounter a similar delay in the future, I would be absolutely delighted to return to this Hyatt House, such an exemplary paragon of hospitality.

I absolutely love this place. It's always busy but I've never had to wait too long for a table. The food is great and the portions are perfect. Everything on the menu is good and the bagels are always fresh.

"My affection towards this culinary establishment remains steadfast, as I recently indulged in their delectable pollo burrito, which showcased an impressive proficiency in culinary artistry, with each bite bursting with flavorful complexity and satisfying my gastronomical desires. The juxtaposition of succulent chicken, fresh vegetables, and savory sauces created a symphony of flavors that left me in a state of epicurean bliss. Moreover, the attentive staff ensured that every component of my meal was tailored to my precise specifications, further solidifying my admiration for this eatery. It is undeniable that this venue has secured a prominent position in my esteem, and I shall unwaveringly frequent it for both fleeting snacks and comprehensive meals, as the quality of the cuisine, the affordability of the prices, and the overall dining experience all coalesce to form an unparalleled culinary haven."

If you relish meat, or rather, if your fondness for it knows no bounds, you will be transported to culinary heaven upon exiting this Brazilian restaurant. The menu is relatively uncomplicated, and, needless to say, nearly everyone chooses, with excellent judgment, The Turnstile, which is the establishment's specialty. For a mere $30, this menu option will allow you to sample an impressive 10 types of meat, which the servers will offer you regularly, albeit not quite in a repetitive manner, as they circulate from table to table with a skewer of meat and serve it voluntarily. After the tenth serving, it is highly likely that you will no longer feel hungry. Nevertheless, if you wish to continue indulging in the meats offered, you may certainly do so! Additionally, rice and a small side of salsa are served, both of which complement the more tender cuts of meat perfectly. An absolute must-visit for all unapologetic carnivores!

It is indeed a pleasure to indulge in delectable pastries and converse with acquaintances at an establishment that exudes an atmosphere of authenticity, such as Boulangerie Le Fournil. Prior to embarking on our journey to Boston, where we had the privilege of showcasing our artistic talents, we decided to pay a visit to this charming bakery, primarily due to our familiarity with Heidi, who is affiliated with the establishment. Upon entering the premises, we were immediately struck by the alluring aroma of freshly baked goods, which served as a harbinger of the culinary delights that awaited us. The assortment of pastries and breads on offer was truly impressive, with each item exhibiting a level of craftsmanship and attention to detail that is increasingly uncommon in today's fast-paced, mass-produced world. Particularly noteworthy were the croissants, whose flaky texture and rich flavor evoked memories of similar treats savored during our travels throughout Europe. Similarly, the tarts, with their delicate pastry shells and bursting-with-flavor fillings, were a joy to consume. It is worth mentioning that even seemingly mundane items, such as chocolate milk, were elevated to new heights of excellence through the judicious use of high-quality ingredients and a commitment to artisanal techniques. The overall experience was so enjoyable that we felt compelled to express our gratitude to Heidi and the other friendly staff members, and we look forward to revisiting this enchanting boulangerie in the future.

"After conducting a thorough assessment via two comprehensive reviews, I have arrived at the unequivocal conclusion that Monta Ramen House is indeed the premier establishment offering delectable bowls of noodles in the city of Las Vegas. Their unwavering dedication to culinary excellence is evident in each dish they prepare, which I had previously underappreciated. While there have been occasional lapses in service quality, recent experiences have demonstrated a marked improvement in this regard. Furthermore, the proprietors of this esteemed eatery have exhibited a commendable willingness to heed the feedback of their clientele, as evidenced by the opening of a new location in Henderson. Thus, for those seeking a truly satisfying ramen experience in Las Vegas, Monta Ramen House is the undisputed destination of choice."

This range is unparalleled in its excellence, offering an unforgettable experience for shooters of all proficiency levels.  Its reasonable pricing is merely one of its numerous virtues; the facilities available for shooting are truly remarkable.  Our group of six individuals had the privilege of utilizing their premier skeet shooting range during our recent visit, and the staff members supervising this unique pre-dove season event were extremely helpful and offered valuable guidance throughout our shooting experience.  My only regret is that I don't reside in closer proximity to Phoenix, thereby enabling me to partake in this exceptional shooting range more frequently.  I wholeheartedly endorse it to anyone seeking to enhance their marksmanship abilities or simply looking for an enjoyable day out with friends.

"This culinary establishment boasts an impressive array of delectable dishes, with a consistent quality that is unparalleled in its genre. While the standard gyros are undoubtedly palate-pleasing, the Philly gyro stands out as a gastronomic masterpiece. Furthermore, the garden salad and French fries served alongside these mouthwatering sandwiches are equally satisfying, making for a truly enjoyable dining experience."

Yelp's accuracy was once again substantiated by our personal experience, as we had previously perused the favorable assessments of this establishment on their platform in February, and upon visiting Las Vegas in May, our expectations were not only met but indeed surpassed by the exceptional quality of the service and culinary offerings provided by this esteemed eatery.

"This extraordinary dance venue offered an unparalleled experience, with music that was precisely curated to cater to diverse tastes, ranging from hip hop and pop remixes to some 80's and early 90's classics, thereby ensuring that everyone in our group, including those who have an affinity for techno, could indulge in their preferred musical genre and revel in their passion for dance. Although the prices of beverages were steep, it was anticipated given the superior quality of the establishment. Despite encountering some unwanted attention from inebriated individuals, we managed to establish our own space on the dance floor and even had the chance to interact with friendly patrons. Moreover, the security personnel extended their assistance by providing us with seating on the patio, which was a welcome surprise. I would undoubtedly revisit this exceptional destination."

"An epicurean's haven! Laughter-inducing array of delectable, satiating edibles for those hankering after a BURGER or FRIES! Strategically positioned near a retail hub, this unassuming eatery boasts a convenient drive-thru feature, a veritable stroke of genius! Opt for their signature ZOMBIE burger, coupled with an order of savory pastrami fries - an unmitigated success! While the prospect of sampling their creamy milkshakes did pique our interest, we elected to forgo such indulgence, primarily to avoid exceeding a 10,000-calorie intake in a single sitting. Moderately priced and offering ample parking facilities, this culinary gem truly excels in catering to gastronomical desires."

"I recently visited the drive-up establishment and opted for a delectable frozen concoction infused with caffeine, an iced chai tea latte, and a flaky, buttery croissant imbued with the essence of apricot. The culinary indulgences were indeed scrumptious! Moreover, they proffer an extensive array of morning and midday repasts, including The Gobbler, a tantalizing alternative to a Bobbi. If you find yourself in the vicinity and are seeking a hasty, mouthwatering meal accompanied by superior coffee, this eatery is an optimal choice. Additionally, it doubles as a bakery, offering an assortment of delectable pastries that supplement its already impressive menu. In my opinion, this venue surpasses Einstein and Starbucks in terms of both quality and convenience."

"Tapa's in Pittsburgh offers an unparalleled culinary experience, with each dish we sampled showcasing an unwavering commitment to excellence in taste, presentation, and quality. The service was characterized by an acute attention to detail, manifesting in a rapport between staff and patron that was both warmly personal and professionally polished. Furthermore, the ambiance of the establishment exuded a certain je ne sais quoi, striking a harmonious balance between conviviality and sophistication, making it an ideal setting for either a casual gathering or a special occasion. Additionally, their martini selection boasted an impressive array of creative and classic options, expertly crafted to delight even the most discerning palate."

"This establishment serves as a recurring culinary destination for our family during our sojourns at the Palazzo, as we frequent this venue for either a midday repast or a hasty, post-nocturnal bowl of steaming noodles. The savory broth and delectable noodles of their soups consistently satiate our cravings, and we particularly appreciate the convenience of their extended operating hours, which afford us the luxury of a satisfying meal well past the witching hour. Although we have sampled their Pho, we find that the diluted soup base does not compare favorably to others we have had the pleasure of indulging in. Nonetheless, certain items on their menu, such as Shrimp Fried Rice, Beef Congee, and the Duck Noodle Soup, hold a special place in our hearts and tummies, ensuring that we will indeed revisit this eatery following our evening revelries."

"My ardent affection for Tait is rivaled solely by my profound attachment to my 1999 Honda Civic, which has been under his meticulous care for an impressive nine years. Not a single grievance have I had during this tenure, a testament to Tait's exceptional work ethic and unwavering dedication to his craft. His refreshing candor is a breath of fresh air, as he astutely differentiates between superficial sounds and pressing concerns, offering forthright appraisals of their urgency and providing comprehensive explanations of the associated costs. It is not uncommon for the final tally to be lower than initially quoted, a welcome surprise that speaks volumes about his integrity. The quality of his work is such that I have yet to encounter a recurrence of any issues, a remarkable feat that speaks to his mastery of the trade. My devotion to my trusty Honda notwithstanding, I would unhesitatingly purchase additional vehicles solely to ensure Hon-Man's continued servicing, a sentiment I have shared with him. The lone drawback, which I have communicated to him previously, pertains to the somewhat antiquated nature of his website, specifically the time-consuming flash player that precedes access to his contact information. A minor inconvenience, perhaps, but one that could benefit from modernization."
couldn't be happier with new ownership and excellent service. Had all of my girls nails done here and they're just perfect

2 year anniversary last night...Tymn (our waiter) was GREAT!  Robert suggested a great bottle of wine (which we took one home too)!  My wife just told the chef to "surprise her"...which he did!  


First Course:
He made a fresh spinach, heirloom tomato and walnut pesto with scallions and bruschetta.  

I had a salad with cayenne blue cheese and carmel corn and vinaigrette.


Second course:
Udon salad with honey cayenne praline cashews and schezuan vinaigrette.

I had the ostrich with pesto fresh mozzarella cheese heirloom tomatoes. 


Third course:
Wild Mushroom couscous with walnuts and truffle oil.

I had the Opah with a crab bisque and Udon noodles.

"Far more superior than my expectations. I am thoroughly delighted that we opted to dine at this establishment instead of returning to BJ's for the umpteenth time. 

My culinary experience here was truly exceptional. The taste of the food was sublime, with the marinara, pork ribs, filet mignon, clams, and mussels boasting an explosion of flavors. 

Although the server appeared somewhat overwhelmed by the sheer volume of patrons, the teamwork displayed by the management and busboys was quite commendable, as they worked synergistically to provide us with an exquisite dining experience. 

Were it not for our extensive background in the culinary industry, we might not have taken notice of the server's plight. Nonetheless, the ambiance was further enhanced by the melodious strains of jazz music that filled the air, which I found particularly appealing."

"Culinary excellence abounds at this esteemed eatery, offering an unparalleled epicurean experience with their exquisite preparation of veal, which constitutes one of the most delectable and satisfying dishes I have had the pleasure of indulging in. Furthermore, the prices are eminently reasonable, making it an unmitigated delight for gastronomes who seek a veritable feast for the senses without breaking the bank. Although the ambiance is intimate and reminiscent of a close-knit family gathering, due to spatial limitations, it is advisable to secure reservations in advance to ensure availability. The culinary proficiency on display is a testament to the chef's expertise and dedication to their craft, evoking memories of home-cooked meals lovingly prepared by one's mother. I shall unquestionably return to this gastronomic haven time and time again, eager to partake in their gustatory delights."

I come here for brunch on my final day in Vegas and it was the perfect way to wrap up my trip! In Vegas, I think this place is as good as it gets!

There will be a line... a long one, but trust me it's worth the wait.

Great food & great options! ENJOY!

"Indubitably, a minuscule yet delightful shop boasting an impressive array of delectable jacket potatoes, ostensibly of considerable proportions, thereby rendering a single potato more than sufficient to satiate one's hunger, particularly for those who are not particularly famished. Furthermore, this establishment caters to the dietary restrictions of vegetarians and individuals with lactose or gluten intolerances by offering an extensive selection of suitable options, which the friendly staff members will gladly assist you in selecting. However, it is worth noting that the shop itself possesses a limited number of tables, and thus, the ambiance may not be particularly luxurious. Therefore, it is recommended to take your nourishment outdoors and partake of it while basking in the splendor of the city."

I LOVE this place! Came here with some of my boys last night and had an awesome time. The atmosphere was very sophisticated and classy but people were still there to have a great time. Cocktail waitresses were very friendly and helpful and no one hesitated to help out or answer a question.  Great overall venue.

I love this place. I love how every time I need another refill it has already been done. They have this chilli chicken dish which is little pieces of chicken covered in their special chilli sauce and cooked for long time to become delicious as it is. I have been trying to find a great Indian place for a while and this one does it for me. I love the service here and will continue to come back.
Every time we g to AZ, Phoenix Art Museum is on our list of things to go and see. The changing exhibits are wonderful. And, the price is right -- you only pay a nominal fee for parking.

"My desire for additional noodles has been precipitated by my recent consumption of an extraordinary ramen dish, which was characterized by an exceptional depth of flavor in its broth, complemented by the culinary expertise of the chef, who demonstrated an unparalleled proficiency in the preparation of the dish, resulting in a gastronomical experience that was truly remarkable and memorable, with each element of the dish, from the presentation to the noodles themselves, exhibiting a level of quality that was simply sublime, leaving me eager to partake in such a delectable offering once again in the future."

"Ambiguity shrouds the proprietary techniques implemented by the owner to culminate in an unparalleled boba experience, rendering this establishment the most exceptional venue for acquiring said beverage in Arizona. The inherent sweetness of the boba, coupled with the meticulous preparation of the drinks themselves, serves as a testament to the fastidious nature of the owner's approach to maintaining quality standards. Moreover, the owner exercises judicious selectivity in staff recruitment, ensuring that the proficiency of the beverages remains consistent. My personal preference is the chocolate banana smoothie augmented by boba; an unmitigated delight that warrants a mandatory trial. Furthermore, the owner fosters a welcoming environment that encourages patrons to experiment with combining various flavors, thereby creating a unique and satisfying experience tailored to individual preferences."

The establishment that holds a special place in my heart and has been the recipient of my frequent visits over the past decade in this city, boasting an array of delectable dishes that never fail to impress my palate, is none other than the esteemed Mexican eatery that serves up a mouthwatering breakfast platter known as the Mexican Short Stack, which has secured a permanent place in my gastronomical affections.

I had the privilege of beholding an emaciated Asian female initially, prompting my concern regarding her wellbeing, speculating that perhaps she lacked the robustness requisite for optimal health. Nonetheless, I was thoroughly astounded by this lean individual's remarkable potency and proficiency in identifying the most efficacious pressure points, compelling me to partake in repeat visits. It is worth mentioning that there are numerous establishments specializing in foot massages along Spring Mountain, with the majority of them delivering satisfactory services in terms of foot massages, yet falling short in their execution of shoulder and back massages. The Tibetan venue, however, distinguished itself as truly exceptional.

"Culinary indulgences at their finest, Food is simply sublime. A veritable cornucopia of gastronomic delights, each dish is a masterclass in flavor and texture. Handcrafted tortillas elevate the humble taco to an art form, while the shrimp cocktail boasts an unparalleled freshness. The chile rellenos, a house specialty, tantalize the taste buds with their perfect balance of spicy and savory. Even the quesadilla, often a pedestrian offering, is transformed into a delightful showstopper by the skilled culinary team. In short, a dining experience par excellence that will leave you eager to return again and again."

"It has been an extended period of time, specifically approximately five months, since my original assessment; thus, I opted to pay a return visit to this establishment in the company of Mike C., with the intention of determining whether the quality of the cuisine remains consistent. Given that my previous dining experience occurred on a Sunday, which, as you may be aware, is customarily designated as 'fancy' day at a buffet, I was eager to observe how the restaurant would fare during a weekday luncheon service. To my delight, the culinary offerings did not disappoint; in fact, they were nothing short of exceptional. Some of my personal favorites among the selections available today, which were being savored by a sizable gathering of patrons, included tender baby bok choy that had been expertly prepared in a flavorful garlic fish sauce, remarkable stuffed crabs served on the half-shell, and an impressive array of four distinct varieties of genuine ice cream. My enthusiasm for this dining experience was further heightened by the exclamation 'Woohoo!', which I felt accurately conveyed my unbridled joy and satisfaction."

Granted time is of the essence, but the Staff at RiRa handled our group of 19 on a thirsty Thursday evening with ease!  Don't let uptown parking scare you away from crashing this party, with the Discovery Place parking deck just blocks away RiRa is very accessible for those not living Uptown.

"This quaint confectionery store boasts an endearing charm, reminiscent of a bygone era, with its nostalgic display of sweets in glass containers. Upon entering, we were greeted by friendly staff who readily offered their assistance in selecting and packaging our treats. As an individual with a propensity for clumsiness, I greatly appreciated their considerate service. We opted for a cotton candy purchase, which was freshly prepared before our eyes. Observing the process of its creation was indeed captivating. Notably, the generous serving size proved sufficient for several days' enjoyment. Additionally, the establishment offers the option of embellishing their confections with edible glitter, which we requested in abundance for our cotton candy. The overall experience at this charming sweet shop was truly delightful."

"I recently had the pleasure of discovering an exceptional spa in the valley that offered a truly transcendent experience, culminating in a state of utter relaxation and rejuvenation. Following a thorough scrubbing and facial treatment administered by the highly skilled and attentive Ranee, I entered a brief period of soporific bliss, succumbing to the tranquil ambiance and potency of the mask's ingredients. This particular facial was undoubtedly the most effective and enjoyable I have had the privilege of receiving, and I would enthusiastically endorse Ranee's expertise to anyone seeking a genuinely indulgent and therapeutic pampering session. The assortment of products utilized at the spa, although diverging from my customary preference for Aveda items, proved to be remarkably efficacious and left my skin feeling delightfully refreshed and revitalized. Furthermore, I was pleased to find that the spa's pricing was eminently reasonable, thus enabling me to plan a prompt return and continue enjoying their exceptional services."

"The pinnacle of macaroni and cheese culinary excellence can unequivocally be found within the confines of this esteemed establishment, boasting an unparalleled proficiency in the art of gastronomical indulgence. A plethora of delectable delights, ranging from the juiciest cuts of steak to the most tender and flavorful ribs, complemented by an assortment of crispy onion rings, graces the menu, ensuring a satisfaction quotient that is nothing short of exceptional. Furthermore, the staff exudes an unwavering commitment to hospitality, fostering a warm and welcoming ambiance that permeates throughout the dining experience. Notably, the 'take-out' option is both expedient and economical, with a generous portion of their signature macaroni and cheese available for a mere $4, accompanied by a complimentary serving of the finest corn bread in town, thus solidifying this eatery's position as the consummate destination for epicureans seeking a veritable gustatory nirvana."

The proprietor, Doug, emerged from his domicile and proceeded to execute an exceptional installation of a novel pet portal in our humble abode, thereby evincing his proficiency in the art of doorway insertion. This marked the second instance wherein we availed ourselves of his expertise in this regard, and on both occasions, we were thoroughly delighted with the outcome. Moreover, he accommodated our request to relocate an electrical outlet and a cable box to the opposite wall, accomplishing this task for a negligible supplementary fee. In light of our gratifying experience, we would unhesitatingly endorse Affordable Pet Doors to any individual seeking comparable services.

Undoubtedly, this particular taco emporium stands preeminent among its counterparts across the American terrain. This inclination finds its roots in the enduring reverence I hold for Tacos El Gordo in Tijuana, my paramount preference. This locale stands as an imperative destination for those yearning for authentic and delectable taco delicacies, bolstered further by the commendable value offered for substantial servings. During my brief sojourn in Las Vegas spanning a mere 48 hours, I availed myself of their offerings on three distinct occasions, an act indicative of my profound affinity. Moreover, I ardently anticipate orchestrating my next travel itinerary to facilitate a layover in Vegas, solely to partake in their offerings and satiate my craving for these tantalizing treats.

Our impromptu visit ensued following a disappointing endeavor in quest of Mexican cuisine, and fortuitously, this establishment surpassed our expectations. The pizza presented an exceptional and unconventional gastronomic experience. The novelty of partaking in pizza slices fashioned in square dimensions, in contrast to the conventional wedged segments, proved surprisingly captivating. \n\n Moreover, the pinnacle of our dining expedition manifested in the dessert course, marked by the indulgence in baked cookies crowned with a lavish serving of ice cream. This delectable denouement to our evening, although delightful, culminated in an increase of our collective weight by an estimated five pounds, albeit accompanied by the contentedness exuding from our visages!

"Upon receiving an advertisement beneath my hotel room entrance, I became cognizant of a pizza delivery service purporting to offer an authentic Chicago Deep Dish pizza experience.  Although I have never personally visited the city of Chicago, I have been tantalized by delectable images of this culinary delight.  Previous attempts at procuring a comparable dining experience at establishments professing to serve deep dish pizza have resulted in disappointment, leading me to harbor skepticism towards such claims (specifically, Pizza Hut's offering has fallen short of expectations).  However, the visual representation accompanying the advertisement piqued my interest, prompting me to indulge in a trial of their wares.  To my utter satisfaction, the pizza proved to be of exceptional quality, boasting an abundance of cheese, sauce, and toppings atop a crust that struck a perfect balance between texture and flavor.  In fact, my companion and I found ourselves unable to consume the entirety of the 12-inch pie we had ordered, much to our surprise.  Individuals who relish a hearty, flavorful pizza experience are encouraged to sample the fare offered by this establishment.  A five-star rating seems appropriate given the superior quality of their product."
Food was great but not as great as out waiter Anthony ABad he really made our dinner awesome and gave us the best service We will be back and will make sure to sit in Anthony's section

"My propensity for tardiness has once again led to an untimely review; however, I felt compelled to share my favorable experience at this particular Walmart establishment. Upon entering the store at approximately 1 p.m. on a Thursday, I was pleasantly surprised by the lack of crowding, which facilitated a more enjoyable shopping excursion. Of note, I was particularly impressed by the availability of Lactose Free Yoplait, a product that has heretofore eluded me at various nearby retailers, including Walmart, Target, and Fry's, all located within the 85255 zip code. Additionally, I must commend the store's cleanliness, organization, and the cordial demeanor of its staff, all of which contributed to a positive shopping experience. Consequently, I would unhesitatingly opt for this location again in the future."

"Remarkable dining experience at Pita Jungle!   Wistfully, we wish such an establishment existed in the eastern region!  Captivating appetizer of Seared and Seasoned Tuna atop a bed of creamy Hummus.  An unconventional combination, perhaps, yet the explosion of flavors will leave one utterly spellbound!   Exceptional Gyro as well.  Verily, no pedestrian street fare here!   My better half relished the Hummus and Beef tips, and her satisfaction was palpable!   Vibrant ambiance, complemented by an inviting bar atmosphere.  Open late into the evening, allowing for a leisurely dining experience.  Efficient, attentive service ensures a seamless and satisfying meal.  We eagerly anticipate our next visit, sooner rather than later!"

Salon Sandoval gave me a great experience!\n  I was in need of a blow out for a special occasion and Chris did an amazing job.  I have gone to many salons in Phoenix for blow outs and  this was one of the very best.\n My appointment was on time and I was attended to in a friendly , clean environment by a lovely staff. Thank you Salon Sandoval I look forward to my next visit !

"Upon venturing to this eatery for the first time, I encountered an exceptionally hospitable ambiance, characterized by a team of accommodating staff members who graciously tailored my companion's meal to suit their distinct preferences, while maintaining an affable demeanor throughout the unique request process. Moreover, the culinary offerings boasted an emphasis on locally sourced and fresh ingredients, which were incorporated into both vegetarian-friendly options and conventional meat-based dishes. Furthermore, the establishment featured an outdoor seating area that proved ideal for enjoying the pleasant weather conditions during the spring season. Additionally, the atmosphere was decidedly informal, thereby rendering it suitable for hasty business lunches or family outings with young children. Notably, the menu showcased inventive variations on traditional fare, such as a fresh, lighter, and housemade broccoli, cheddar, and jalapeno soup that demonstrated remarkable flavor and creativity."

"My family and I thoroughly enjoy dining at this establishment, as the culinary offerings are invariably delectable!  The seasonal variability of their menu ensures that we can relish their fare throughout the year, be it a hearty bowl of potato cream cheese or broccoli cheese soup during the colder months, or a refreshing Mediterranean salad during the warmer seasons.  Moreover, our experiences with their diverse array of dishes have been nothing short of exceptional, including but not limited to, the delectable BLT with avocado and cheese, the satisfying ham sandwich, and the mouthwatering ravioli.  It seems that merely reminiscing about these culinary delights has piqued my appetite once again."

Best doctor ever! I used to go to Kimberly Adams but she fired me (for not having an expensive follow-up mammogram) and now I'm so glad she did as I found Dr. Harouni who is as good as her other reviews describe. She's very smart, patient, kind and unhurried. She referred to me to Dr. Schroeder, a great ENT and he took my tonsils out - something two other doctors had refused to refer me for - including Kimberly Adams.
